scn DLC02OA3CommandTentDoorScript
;This prevents the Player from exiting the tent before acquiring the objectives from Lt. Morgan and you have strike team and gear requisition forms.
short freeToLeave
begin OnActivate Player
if freeToLeave == 1 activate else
if ( DLC02OA3.OA3BriefingDone == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC02OA3TentDoorMessage elseif ( DLC02OA3.OA3BriefingDone == 1 ) if DLC02StrikeTeam.STDeployGo == 0 || DLC02StrikeTeam.STHaveReq == 0 showMessage DLC02RequisitionWarningMessage else set freeToLeave to 1 Activate
endif
endif
endif
end

scn DLC02SimExitDoorScript
Short IsAnimating Short HasFlicked Float Timer
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) SetLocationSpecificLoadScreensOnly 0 Player.Moveto DLC02SimChairREF if ( DLC02ProtectorMcGrawREF.GetDead == 0 ) SetStage DLC02OA4 60 else SetStage DLC02OA4 70 endif endif
End
Begin OnLoad
Playgroup Forward 0 Set timer to 1.25 Set IsAnimating to 1
End
Begin GameMode
If IsAnimating == 1 If IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0 Playgroup Left 0 Set IsAnimating to 0 endif endif
End

scn DLC02ListeningPostTechnicianSCRIPT
;// sitting vars short sitOnce
short doAOnce short doCOnce short radioUsed
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;-----------------------------------------
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;//////////// ;// are we in combat and not dead? ;//////////// IF isInCombat == 1 && getDead == 0
;// which runner are we? IF getSelf == DLCCommCenterRunnerA && doAOnce == 0 setAV variable01 1 set doAOnce to 1 addToFaction DLC02AmericanCaptiveFaction 5 removeFromFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction EVP ELSEIF getSelf == DLCCommCenterRunnerC && doCOnce == 0 setAV variable01 3 set doCOnce to 1 addToFaction DLC02AmericanCaptiveFaction 5 removeFromFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction EVP ENDIF
ENDIF
;//////////// ;// after we've sat, the radio has been used ;//////////// IF sitOnce == 0 && getSitting == 2 set radioUsed to 1 set sitOnce to 1 ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
IF (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
set DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills to ( DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills + 1 ) setav variable03 1
END
;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// When we're shot, if we havent ;// already hit the radio, keep running ;// for it ;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// BEGIN ONHIT
;// if the radio has been used, attack back, otherwise, stop combat IF radioUsed == 0 stopCombat EVP ELSEIF radioUsed == 1
;// remove the proper package IF getSelf == DLCCommCenterRunnerA removeScriptPackage DLC02TechnicianAlarmA ELSEIF getSelf == DLCCommCenterRunnerC removeScriptPackage DLC02TechnicianAlarmC ENDIF
addScriptPackage DLC02TechnicianPatrol setAV variable01 0 EVP addToFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction 5 addToFaction DLC02AmericanCaptiveFaction 5
;// stop the cycle set radioUsed to -1 ENDIF END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;prevent the player from looting dead actor IF isActionRef player == 1
ENDIF
END

scn DLC02GlacierFallKillSCRIPT
; updating this to a kinder, gentler mechanic - we'll set checkpoints to return the player to as we move through.
; this will work in conjuction with a quest variable to store the checkpoint marker ;
;=============================================================
ref actionRef ; store the action ref ref checkpoint
float timer
short active ; flag for running loop
;=============================================================
begin onTriggerEnter
set actionRef to getActionRef
if active == 0 && actionRef.getDead != 1 set timer to 1 set active to 1 endif
if actionRef == player playSound3D FXRez player.pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole imod DLC02FadetoWhite ; play some fx endif
end
;=============================================================
begin gameMode
if active == 1
if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else
set checkpoint to DLC02LD.checkpoint
if actionRef == player actionRef.moveTo checkpoint ; send me to the current checkpoint player.sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ; play some fx elseif actionRef == DLC02MontgomeryRef actionRef.moveto player ; if Montgomery, send to the player else actionRef.kill ; anybody else we kill endif set active to 0 endif endif
end

scn DLC02PlayerShieldEyesSCRIPT
; experimental script to force player into a stagger anim while crossing bridge
short doOnce
begin onTriggerEnter
if getActionRef == player if doOnce == 0 player.playIdle MS11ShieldsEyes set doOnce to 1 endif endif
end

scn DLC02WoodenCreakSFXSCRIPT
; simple on-off script to player a wood creak when the player steps in a certain place
short doOnce
begin onTriggerEnter
if getActionRef == player && doOnce == 0 playSound AMBBridgeCreak ;showWarning "creeeeeak!" set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC02StrikeTeamScript
;----------GLOBALS ;used by the terminal, and in quest stages to spawn reinforcements ;DLC02Points - a pool of points available to spawn new guys, used by menu system of terminal and dialog/quest stages with Montgomery to spawn reinforcements, replenished OnDeath block of DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript ;DLC02CostInfantry - cost in DLC02Points at terminal, and cost in STForcePoints for this type of unit ;DLC02CostGrenadier - cost in DLC02Points at terminal, and cost in STForcePoints for this type of unit ;DLC02CostMissile - cost in DLC02Points at terminal, and cost in STForcePoints for this type of unit ;DLC02CostSniper - cost in DLC02Points at terminal, and cost in STForcePoints for this type of unit ;DLC02CostGutsy - cost in DLC02Points at terminal, and cost in STForcePoints for this type of unit ;DLC02CostSentry - cost in DLC02Points at terminal, and cost in STForcePoints for this type of unit
;DLC02Unit01 - what type of unit will spawn for Unit01 slot of the three person squad ;DLC02Unit02 - what type of unit will spawn for Unit02 slot of the three person squad ;DLC02Unit03 - what type of unit will spawn for Unit03 slot of the three person squad ;0 = unset ;1 = infantry ;2 = Grenadier ;3 = Missile ;4 = Sniper ;5 = Gutsy ;6 = Sentry ;NOTE: positive values mean what is about to spawn, negative value means what has spawned ;----------
short STDialogOff ;1 = supress Strike Team dialog so that quest dialog lower in stack comes through.
short STPointsExpended ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player on all types of units, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript short STPointsExpendedInfantry ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player this type of unit, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript short STPointsExpendedGrenadier ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player this type of unit, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript short STPointsExpendedMissile ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player this type of unit, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript short STPointsExpendedSniper ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player this type of unit, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript short STPointsExpendedGutsy ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player this type of unit, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript short STPointsExpendedSentry ;x = how many total force points have been used by the player this type of unit, for ease of implementation, this is updated after each time a unit rezzes out due to death or dismissal in their DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript
short STUnitCount ;0, 1, 2, 3 = how many members of strike team are there. This is used by dialog with Montgomery to prevent player from having more than three units when getting reinforcements (condition: less than three units, AND less than 5 total force point) ;incremented below when spawning ;decremented in DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript script when he does his "Rez Out"
short STDeployGo ;0 = unset, 1 = spawn units at HQ, -1 = units spawned at HQ, 2 = spawn units at Montgomery, -2 = units spawned at Montgomery
short STSpawnUnitOne ;0 = unset, 1= spawn unit, -1 = spawned short STSpawnUnitTwo ;0 = unset, 1= spawn unit, -1 = spawned short STSpawnUnitThree ;0 = unset, 1= spawn unit, -1 = spawned
ref STSpawnAtRef ;where to spawn: either at DLC02MontgomeryRef or xMarker at HQ
;Reference Variables to the Reference in Unit 1, 2, 3 slot ref STUnit1Ref ref STUnit2Ref ref STUnit3Ref
short STMontgomeryForceGreet ;0 = unset, 1 = Montogomery should forcegreet player, -1 = Montogomery done forcegreeting player
short STReqUsed ;1= Player turned his Requisition Holotape to the Quartermaster short STHaveReq ;1= Player has not yet turned in a Requisition Holotape short STHaveFT ;1= Player has Fire Team Loadout short STHaveCA ;1= Player has Close Assault Loadout short STHaveSN ;1= Player has Sniper Loadout short STHaveHW ;1= Player has Heavy Weapons Loadout
short STRallyPoint ;999 Rez Away to HQ ;0 = HQ ;1 = Mines ;2 = Listening Post ;3 = Camp ;4 = Chimera Depot ;5 = Trenches ;6 = Refinery
short STRallyPointArrived ;montgomery has arrived at current RallyPoint's trigger box (see DLC02RallyTriggerScript) short STRallyAttack ;0 = unset, -1 = attack is completed, 1 = the order to attack has been given, don't allow the player to speak with Montgomery until the attack has completed
short STMinesDone ;1= The Mines encounter area is done, making the Strike Team eligable to go to Listen Post short STCampDone ;1= The Camp encounter area is done, making the Strike Team eligable to go to Chimera Depot short STListenDone ;1= The Listening Post area is Done (for dialog flags) short STChimeraDone ;1= The Chimera Depot area is Done (for dialog flags)
;// Phil's Counter to check for complere short CMineCounter short CCampCounter
Begin GameMode
;If at the time of Deploy, check which unit slots get which units and enable them at the Barracks Marker
if ( STDeployGo >= 1 )
;----------Strike Team Unit 1 if ( STSpawnUnitOne == 1 )
if STDeployGo == 2 set STSpawnAtRef to DLC02MontgomeryRef else set STSpawnAtRef to DLC02OA3Unit01Marker endif
if ( DLC02Unit01 == 1 ) set STUnit1Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamAssaultRifle
elseif ( DLC02Unit01 == 2 ) set STUnit1Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGrenadier
elseif ( DLC02Unit01 == 3 ) set STUnit1Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamMissileUnit
elseif ( DLC02Unit01 == 4 ) set STUnit1Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSniper
elseif ( DLC02Unit01 == 5 ) set STUnit1Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGutsy
elseif ( DLC02Unit01 == 6 ) set STUnit1Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSentry
endif
;Variable09 on these guys means which "slot" of the three man team are they in -- used primarily for clearing the reference variable when they die -- they need to know which reference variable to clear ;see DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript STUnit1Ref.setav variable09 1
set STSpawnUnitOne to -1 set DLC02Unit01 to -DLC02Unit01
endif ;----------
;----------Strike Team Unit 2 if ( STSpawnUnitTwo == 1 )
if STDeployGo == 2 set STSpawnAtRef to DLC02MontgomeryRef else set STSpawnAtRef to DLC02OA3Unit02Marker endif
if ( DLC02Unit02 == 1 ) set STUnit2Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamAssaultRifle
elseif ( DLC02Unit02 == 2 ) set STUnit2Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGrenadier
elseif ( DLC02Unit02 == 3 ) set STUnit2Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamMissileUnit
elseif ( DLC02Unit02 == 4 ) set STUnit2Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSniper
elseif ( DLC02Unit02 == 5 ) set STUnit2Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGutsy
elseif ( DLC02Unit02 == 6 ) set STUnit2Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSentry
endif
;Variable09 on these guys means which "slot" of the three man team are they in -- used primarily for clearing the reference variable when they die -- they need to know which reference variable to clear ;see DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript STUnit2Ref.setav variable09 2
set STSpawnUnitTwo to -1 set DLC02Unit02 to -DLC02Unit02
endif ;----------
;----------Strike Team Unit 3 if ( STSpawnUnitThree == 1 )
if STDeployGo == 2 set STSpawnAtRef to DLC02MontgomeryRef else set STSpawnAtRef to DLC02OA3Unit03Marker endif
if ( DLC02Unit03 == 1 ) set STUnit3Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamAssaultRifle
elseif ( DLC02Unit03 == 2 ) set STUnit3Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGrenadier
elseif ( DLC02Unit03 == 3 ) set STUnit3Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamMissileUnit
elseif ( DLC02Unit03 == 4 ) set STUnit3Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSniper
elseif ( DLC02Unit03 == 5 ) set STUnit3Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGutsy
elseif ( DLC02Unit03 == 6 ) set STUnit3Ref to STSpawnAtRef.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSentry
endif
;Variable09 on these guys means which "slot" of the three man team are they in -- used primarily for clearing the reference variable when they die -- they need to know which reference variable to clear ;see DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript STUnit3Ref.setav variable09 3
set STSpawnUnitThree to -1 set DLC02Unit03 to -DLC02Unit03
endif ;----------
set STDeployGo to -STDeployGo
endif
End

ScriptName DLC02MineExplosionMarkerScript
short doonce short explosionRun
float timer
ref LinkRef1
Begin GameMode
if ( doonce == 0 ) set LinkRef1 to GetLinkedRef set Doonce to 1 set timer to 0.05 endif
if ( explosionRun == 0 ) if ( GetDisabled == 0 ) PlaceAtMe GrenadePulseExplosion 1 set ExplosionRun to 1 endif elseif ( explosionRun == 1 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) LinkRef1.Enable set explosionrun to 2 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif
End

scn DLC02OA3FuelTankAScript
short Button ;x= Button press result from messagebox short Planted ;1= Player has planted an Explosive
begin OnActivate
if ( Planted == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC02OA3FuelTankMessage elseif ( Planted == 1 ) ShowMessage DLC02OA3FuelTankPlantedMessage endif
end
begin gamemode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Planted == 0 ) && ( Button == 0 ) Playsound WPNExplosiveChargeAttach DLC02BombSoundFuelA.Enable DLC02OA3ExplosiveARef.Enable Player.RemoveItem DLC02Charges 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3GoFuelA to 1 set Planted to 1 elseif ( Planted == 0 ) && ( Button == 1 ) ;Do Nothing endif
end

scn DLC02OA3FuelTankBScript
short Button ;x= Button press result from messagebox short Planted ;1= Player has planted an Explosive
begin OnActivate
if ( Planted == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC02OA3FuelTankMessage elseif ( Planted == 1 ) ShowMessage DLC02OA3FuelTankPlantedMessage endif
end
begin gamemode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Planted == 0 ) && ( Button == 0 ) Playsound WPNExplosiveChargeAttach DLC02BombSoundFuelB.Enable DLC02OA3ExplosiveBRef.Enable Player.RemoveItem DLC02Charges 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3GoFuelB to 1 set Planted to 1 elseif ( Planted == 0 ) && ( Button == 1 ) ;Do Nothing endif
end

scn DLC02ListeningPostDragoonSCRIPT
short beginRezOut short rezOutInit short rezOutStopOnce float rezOutCounter
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
begin OnDeath
set DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills to ( DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills + 1 ) setav variable03 1 end
begin OnActivate ;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------- end

scn testPhilOutfitPeepersSCRIPT
BEGIN ONEQUIP ApplyIMageSpaceModifier testPhilNightVisionISFX END
BEGIN ONUNEQUIP rimod testPhilNightVisionISFX END

scn dlcAnchCreaturesChimeraSCRIPT
ref mySelf short combatOnce
;// the timer for throwing the player float throwCounter short throwCounterInit short throwCounterRun
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;if we're in combat set the IF isInCombat == 1
;set the tank to it's guard package IF combatOnce == 0 setav variable01 1 EVP set combatOnce to 1 ENDIF ENDIF
;if the player gets too close, slight damage, push them back IF (throwCounterRun == 0) && (getDead == 0) && (getDisabled == 0) IF getDistance player <= 300 player.damageAV health 25 pushActorAway player 10 set throwCounterRun to 1 set throwCounter to 1 ENDIF
;// run the counter ELSEIF throwCounterRun == 1
IF throwCounter > 0 set throwCounter to throwCounter - getSecondsPassed ELSE set ThrowCounterRun to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC02ElevatorSCRIPT
; this script contrls the elevator on the DLC02VSS01 side of things
short state ; 0 = not running, at top ; 1 = going down ; 2 = not running, at bottom ; 3 = going UP ref actronaut
begin onActivate
set actronaut to getActionRef
if actronaut == player if state == 2 set state to 3 DLC02ElevShaft.playgroup backward 0 ; send the elevator back up DLC02ElevGate.playgroup backward 0 ; raise the little gate .playgroup forward 0 ; play my little switch anim else ; do nothing endif else ; if not the player actronaut.activate DLC02VSStoBaileys
endif
end
begin gameMode
if DLC02LD.elevFlag == 1 ; if we're flagged to run by the global var
if state == 0 ; run once to establish correct state DLC02ElevShaft.playgroup forward 0 ; jump right into running the elevator DLC02ElevGate.playgroup forward 0 ; lower gate with it. set state to 1 endif
if DLC02ElevShaft.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ; when the anim is finished....
set DLC02LD.elevFlag to 0 set state to 2
endif
endif
if state == 3 if DLC02ElevShaft.isAnimPlaying backward == 0 DLC02VSStoBaileys.activate player ; send player through to Bailey's Crossroads set state to 0 endif endif
if DLC02ElevShaft.isAnimPlaying forward == 1 || DLC02ElevShaft.isAnimPlaying backward == 1 triggerHitShader 0.1 setRumble 0.15 0.1 0.01 ; going for a low, constant rumble endif
end

scn DLC02ElevDoorSCRIPT
; this script runs on the DOOR object elevator in bailey's crossroads and sends the player to DLC02VSS01
begin onActivate
if getActionRef == player player.scaonactor set DLC02LD.elevFlag to 1 setRumble 0.2 0.1 3 triggerHitShader 1
;While we're running this block, set any followers to Waiting so they don't wander into Anchorage
if ( JerichoRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set JerichoRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( CharonRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set CharonRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( DogmeatRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set DogmeatRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( ButchRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set ButchRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( CloverRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set CloverRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( RL3Ref.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set RL3Ref.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( MQ08FawkesRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif if ( StarPaladinCrossRef.HasBeenHired == 1 ) set StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) endif
.activate player else ; do nothing endif
end

scn DLC02FF002CaptiveScript
short imRestrained
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( getAV variable01 == 1 ) ;rescued disable else ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load set imRestrained to 0 setRestrained 0 endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( imRestrained == 0 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) set imRestrained to 1 setRestrained 1 endif endif
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH IF getIsReference DLC02FF002CaptiveWithIntel == 1 additem DLC02FF002Intel 1 ENDIF
;// the rez out variable setav variable03 1
END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLCAnchIceCampChineseSCRIPT
;variable01 ;0 = Relaxed ;1 = Alarmed ;2 = Running
ref mySelf short doOnce
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;/////////////////// ;// when we load, check to see if we should be alert ;/////////////////// BEGIN ONLOAD
set mySelf to getSelf
;are we relaxed or on heavy patrol? IF dlcAnchIceCampAlarm.getDisabled != 1 myself.setAV variable01 1 myself.EVP ELSE myself.setAV variable01 0 myself.EVP ENDIF
;// setup the ice camp guys IF DLC02ChineseIceCampSetOnceXMRK.getDisabled == 0 set DLC02StrikeTeam.CCampCounter to 11 DLC02ChineseIceCampSetOnceXMRK.disable ENDIF
END
;/////////////////// ;// if we're damaged, check to see if we should run ;/////////////////// BEGIN ONHIT
; ;if im in combat and my health is below 75%, sound the alarm ; IF dlcAnchIceCampAlarm.getDisabled == 1 && myself.isInCombat == 1 && myself.getHealthPercentage < .9 ; ; dlcAnchIceCampAlarm.enable ; ; ; check to see if we should run to the alarm ; IF dlcAnchIceCampAlarmRunning.getDisabled == 1 && doOnce == 0 ; dlcAnchIceCampAlarmRunning.enable ; myself.setAV variable01 2 ; set doOnce to 1 ; ELSE ; myself.setAV variable01 1 ; ENDIF ; ; ENDIF ; ; myself.EVP
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF getIsCurrentPackage DLCAnchIceCampChineseAlarmRunCampA == 1 && myself.getav variable01 == 1 myself.removeScriptPackage DLCAnchIceCampChineseAlarmRunCampA myself.addScriptPackage DLCAnchIceCampChineseAlerted myself.EVP ENDIF
;///////////////// ;// If the player runs through, kill all the guys ;///////////////// IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STCampDone == 1 kill
ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif ;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
set DLC02StrikeTeam.CCampCounter to DLC02StrikeTeam.CCampCounter - 1
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

ScriptName DLC02BombingRunTriggerScript
short Bomb ;flag set to 1 to trigger bombing run
float timersetting float timer
Begin OnLoad
set timersetting to 0.4
End
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if ( Bomb == 0 ) if ( DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostDone != 1 ) ;ShowMessage DLC02BombingRunTestMessage set Bomb to 1 set timer to 1 endif endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( Bomb == 1 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark1.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 2 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 2 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark2.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 3 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 3 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark3.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 4 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 4 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark4.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 5 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 5 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark5.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 6 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 6 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark6.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 7 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 7 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark7.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 8 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( bomb == 8 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02BombingRunMark8.placeatme DLC02CarpetBombExplosionPlayerBlock 1 set Bomb to 0 set timer to timersetting else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
End

scn DLC02TestChineseDeathSCRIPT
short beginRezOut short rezOutInit short rezOutStopOnce float rezOutCounter
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// REZ OUT ON DEATH IF beginRezOut == 1
IF rezOutInit == 0 pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutInit to 1 set rezOutCounter to 4 ENDIF
;// a 4 second timer, after 2.5 seconds we remove the effect, after the 4th second we disable IF rezOutCounter > 1.25 set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter <= 1.25 && rezOutCounter > 0.85
IF rezOutStopOnce == 0 sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutStopOnce to 1 ENDIF
set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter < 0.85 && rezOutStopOnce > 0 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH set beginRezOut to 1 END

ScriptName DLC02TankSpawnTrigger1Script
short Tripped
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
;If player hasn't blown up fuel tanks at depot, run this script
if ( DLC02OA3.OA3FuelTanksDone != 1 ) if ( Tripped == 0 )
;if player is passing through this trigger first, just update var
if ( DLC02TankSpawnTrig2Ref.Tripped == 0 ) Set Tripped to 1
;if player is passing through this one second, disable the tanks
elseif ( DLC02TankSpawnTrig2Ref.Tripped == 1 ) Set DLC02TankSpawnTrig2Ref.Tripped to 0 DLC02TankBlockingRef3.Disable DLC02TankBlockingRef1.Disable DLC02TankBlockingRef2.Disable endif endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC02TankSpawnTrigger2Script
short Tripped
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
;If player hasn't blown up fuel tanks at depot, run this script
if ( DLC02OA3.OA3FuelTanksDone != 1 ) if ( Tripped == 0 )
;if player is passing through this trigger first, just update var
if ( DLC02TankSpawnTrig1Ref.Tripped == 0 ) Set Tripped to 1
;but if player has already passed through other trigger, enable tanks and get them in combat with the player
elseif ( DLC02TankSpawnTrig1Ref.Tripped == 1 ) Set DLC02TankSpawnTrig1Ref.Tripped to 0 DLC02TankBlockingRef3.Enable
DLC02TankBlockingRef1.Enable DLC02TankBlockingRef2.Enable DLC02TankBlockingRef1.StartCombat Player DLC02TankBlockingRef2.StartCombat Player DLC02TankBlockingRef3.StartCombat Player
endif endif endif
End

scn DLC02GeneralChaseScript
short GoTalk ;1= Begins the breifing sequence short SafeToTalk short StartTalk
float TalkTimer
begin OnLoad
if ( SafeToTalk == 0 ) SetGhost 1 endif
if ( StartTalk < 3 ) set TalkTimer to 4 set StartTalk to 1 endif
end
begin OnActivate
if ( DLC02ChaseTalk == 1 ) ;Do Nothing endif
end
begin gamemode
if ( StartTalk == 1 ) && ( TalkTimer > 0 ) set TalkTimer to ( TalkTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( StartTalk == 1 ) && ( TalkTimer <= 0 ) set StartTalk to 2 Evp endif
if ( GoTalk == 0 ) if ( DLC02OA3.OA3Explain >= 3 ) SayTo Player DLC02OA3Brief01 1 Set GoTalk to 1 endif endif
end
begin SayToDone DLC02OA3Brief01
SayTo Player DLC02OA3Brief02 1
end
begin SayToDone DLC02OA3Brief02
SayTo Player DLC02OA3Brief03 1
end
begin SayToDone DLC02OA3Brief03
SayTo Player DLC02OA3Brief03a 1
end

scn DLC02OverlookSCRIPT
; this script is for the overall ambient events on the overlook
; main job is to handle firing the guns.
; DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunA - pre-existing variable for guns ; DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunB ; DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunC
float timerA ; timer floats for guns float timerB float timerC
begin gameMode
if DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunA == 0 ; is gun A still up? if timerA <= 0 ; do stuff triggerHitShader 4 else set timerA to (timerA - getSecondsPassed) endif endif
end

scn DLC02FFQuestScript
short FF006Warn ;0 = unset, 1 = warn player, 2=warned -- used in dialog and packages for DLC02FF006SoldierWarn, and DLC02FF006TriggerScript short FF006GoGetShot ;0 = unset, 1 = go get shot short FF006Recoil ;0 = unset, 1 = recoil from sniper victim short FF006EngageEnemy ;0 = unset, 1 = sniper is killed run to fight enemy
short FF007DoctorHeal ;0 = unset, 1 = locked controls healing scene, 2 = timer running, -1 scene done float FF007Timer short FF007FadeOnce ;0 = okay to fade, 1 = faded
short FF009Pose ;0 = wait ;1 = photographer on his way to his first mark ;2 = photographer says "get into heroic pose" (Soldiers get into position) ;3 = all the soldiers are in place, photographer says "Just like that. Hold still" walking backwards to second mark ;4 = photographer snaps photo and says "Excellent!" ;5 = photographer says "All right, try not to die out there." ;6 = everyone walks away and rezzes out
short FF009SoldierAPosing ; 0 = unset, 1 = in posing furniture marker short FF009SoldierBPosing ; 0 = unset, 1 = in posing furniture marker short FF009SoldierCPosing ; 0 = unset, 1 = in posing furniture marker
Begin GameMode
if FF007DoctorHeal == 1 set FF007Timer to 8 set FF007FadeOnce to 0 set FF007DoctorHeal to 2
elseif FF007DoctorHeal == 2 if FF007Timer > 0 set FF007Timer to FF007Timer - getSecondsPassed
if FF007Timer <= 6 && FF007FadeOnce ==0 IMod FadeToBlackISFX set FF007FadeOnce to 1 endif
else ;FF007Timer <= 0 DLC02FF007DoctorRef.sayTo player DLC02FF007DoctorDone EnablePlayerControls SetQuestDelay DLC02FF 0 set FF007DoctorHeal to -1
endif
endif
End

scn DLC02FF006TriggerScript
short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if doOnce == 0
if isActionRef player == 1 set DLC02FF.FF006Warn to 1 DLC02FF006SoldierWarnRef.evp set doOnce to 1
endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC02FatmanTroopScript
short GoForLaunch short Cull
float timer
Ref ID
Begin OnLoad
set ID to GetSelf
End
Begin OnHit
; if ( DLC02OA4.FatmanEnable == 2 ) ; StopCombat ; endif
if ( GoForLaunch == 2 ) StopCombat endif
if ( GoForLaunch == 1 ) StopCombat endif
End
Begin OnStartCombat
; if ( DLC02OA4.FatmanEnable == 2 ) ; StopCombat ; endif
if ( GoForLaunch == 2 ) StopCombat endif
if ( GoForLaunch == 1 ) StopCombat endif
End
Begin GameMode ;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if ( GetInWorldspace DLC02ChineseHQ == 1 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ) if ( cull == 0 ) Disable Set Cull to 1 endif endif
if (ID.Getav Health < 100) ID.ResetHealth endif
if ( ID == DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1 ) if ( GoForLaunch == 0 )
if ( DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.GetDistance DLC02OA4FatmanMark4 < 1500 ) if ( DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.GetDistance DLC02OA4FatmanMark3 < 1500 ) if ( DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.GetDistance DLC02OA4FatmanMark2 < 1500 ) if ( DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.GetDistance DLC02OA4FatmanMark1 < 1500 ) if ( player.GetDistance DLC02OA4FatmanMark1 < 3000 ) Set GoForLaunch to 1 set timer to 2 endif endif endif endif endif elseif ( GoForLaunch == 1 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.additem ammoFatMans 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.additem ammoFatMans 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.additem ammoFatMans 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.additem ammoFatMans 1
DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.RemoveFromFaction DLC02CombatAmericanFaction DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.RemoveFromFaction DLC02CombatAmericanFaction DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.RemoveFromFaction DLC02CombatAmericanFaction DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.RemoveFromFaction DLC02CombatAmericanFaction
DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.AddToFaction WastelandCaptiveFACTION 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.AddToFaction WastelandCaptiveFACTION 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.AddToFaction WastelandCaptiveFACTION 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.AddToFaction WastelandCaptiveFACTION 1
DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.EVP Set GoForLaunch to 2 set timer to 4 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( GoForLaunch == 2 ) if ( timer <= 0 )
set GoForLaunch to 3 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.EVP
set timer to 0.30 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( GoForLaunch == 3 ) if ( timer <= 0 )
DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.EVP
DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.EVP
set GoForLaunch to 4 set timer to 0.20 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( GoForLaunch == 4 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) Set GoForLaunch to 10 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.removeitem weapfatman 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.removeitem weapfatman 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.removeitem weapfatman 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.removeitem weapfatman 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.additem DLC02weapgaussrifle 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.additem DLC02weapgaussrifle 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.additem DLC02weapgaussrifle 1 ; DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.additem DLC02weapgaussrifle 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.EVP DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.EVP DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.EVP DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.EVP set timer to 0.2 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( GoForLaunch == 10 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) Set GoForLaunch to 11 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.EVP DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.EVP DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.EVP DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.EVP set timer to 0.2 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif
End

scn DLC02FF006SoldierHeadExplodeScript
short iShouldDie ;safety in case the sniper doesn't shoot him, pretend like he got shot float killMeTimer ;safety in case the sniper doesn't shoot him, pretend like he got shot
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnHit DLC02FF006SniperRef set DLC02FF.FF006Recoil to 1 DLC02FF006SoldierWarnRef.evp DLC02FF006SoldierHeadExplodeRef.kill DLC02FF006SoldierHeadExplodeRef 1
End
Begin OnDeath DLC02FF006SniperRef.setav aggression 2 setav variable03 1 End
Begin GameMode
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
if iShouldDie == 1 if getDead == 0 && DLC02FF006SniperRef.getDead == 0 if killMeTimer >= 0 set killMeTimer to killMeTimer - getSecondsPassed else set iShouldDie to -1 set DLC02FF.FF006Recoil to 1 DLC02FF006SoldierWarnRef.evp DLC02FF006SoldierHeadExplodeRef.kill DLC02FF006SoldierHeadExplodeRef 1
endif endif endif
End
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02FF006SniperScript
short iShouldShoot
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin GameMode
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin OnDeath
set DLC02FF.FF006EngageEnemy to 1 DLC02FF006SoldierWarnRef.evp DLC02FF006SoldierHeadExplodeRef.evp
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02ParaTrooper01SCRIPT
short DoOnce
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
BEGIN OnLoad setav health 10 END
Begin GameMode
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
End
BEGIN ONDEATH
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
DLC02ParaGaussRifleREF.enable DLC02ParaGaussRifleREF.moveto DLC02ParaTrooper01REF END

scn DLC02ParaSceneSCRIPT
; This trigger removes the Paratrooper from the chinese faction, and then the chinese soldiers start combat with him. float timer short timerOn short DoOnce
Begin OnLoad
set timer to 4
End
Begin onTriggerEnter player if (DoOnce == 0) DLC02ParaSceneChinese01REF.moveto DLC02ParaSceneMoveTo01REF DLC02ParaSceneChinese02REF.moveto DLC02ParaSceneMoveTo02REF DLC02ParaTrooper01REF.RemoveFromFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction DLC02ParaSceneChinese01REF.startcombat DLC02ParaTrooper01REF DLC02ParaSceneChinese02REF.startcombat DLC02ParaTrooper01REF DLC02ParaCollisionREF.disable set timerOn to 1 set DoOnce to 1 endif End
Begin gameMode
if (timerOn == 1) if (timer < 0) DLC02ParaTrooper01REF.kill else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC02ParaSceneMoveToSCRIPT

Begin onTriggerEnter Player if doOnce == 0 DLC02ParaSceneChinese01REF.moveto DLC02ParaSceneMoveTo01REF DLC02ParaSceneChinese02REF.moveto DLC02ParaSceneMoveTo02REF set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif End

scn DLC02FF002TriggerScript
ref myLinkedRef

endif
End

scn DLCAnchOverlookGunsSCRIPT
;// GUN A float gunATimer float gunARand float gunADistance short gunAInit float gunAShake float gunARumble float gunAFirstShot short gunAAnim short gunAAnimOnce
;// GUN B float gunBTimer float gunBRand float gunBDistance short gunBInit float gunBShake float gunBRumble float gunBFirstShot short gunBAnim short gunBAnimOnce
;// GUN C float gunCTimer float gunCRand float gunCDistance short gunCInit float gunCShake float gunCRumble float gunCFirstShot short gunCAnim short gunCAnimOnce
;////////// ;// The info for the shells ;////////// ;// tell us if the gun has been fired short gunAFired short gunBFired short gunCFired
;// gun shot timers float gunAShellTimer short gunAShellInit
float gunBShellTimer short gunBShellInit
float gunCShellTimer short gunCShellInit
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;check to see if we should be shooting IF DLCAnchOverlookGunsActive.getDisabled != 1
;//////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// GUN A ;// should we be firing gun A? ;//////////////////////////////////////////////// IF DLCAnchOverlookGunsActiveA.getDisabled != 1 IF gunAInit == 0 set gunARand to 1 + 0.05 * getRandomPercent
;// fire the first shot immediately IF gunAFirstShot == 0 set gunATimer to 6 set gunAFirstShot to 1 ELSE set gunATimer to 20 ENDIF
;// check the override IF DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunA == 1 IF gunAAnim == 0 || gunAAnim == 3 set gunAAnim to 2
ENDIF ENDIF
set gunAInit to 1 set gunATimer to gunATimer + gunARand ELSE ;// run the timer IF gunATimer > 6.5 set gunATimer to gunATimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF gunATimer < 6.5 && gunATimer > 0
;// set the fact that we're moving set DLC02LD.gunAPos to 0
;// decide which way to look IF gunAAnim == 0 && gunAAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunA.playgroup Right 1 set gunAAnim to 1 set gunAAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunAAnim == 1 && gunAAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunA.playgroup TurnRight 1 set gunAAnim to 2 set gunAAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunAAnim == 2 && gunAAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunA.playgroup Forward 1 set gunAAnim to 3 set gunAAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunAAnim == 3 && gunAAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunA.playgroup Left 1 set gunAAnim to 4 set gunAAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunAAnim == 4 && gunAAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunA.playgroup TurnLeft 1 set gunAAnim to 5 set gunAAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunAAnim == 5 && gunAAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunA.playgroup Forward 1 set gunAAnim to 0 set gunAAnimOnce to 1 ENDIF
set gunATimer to gunATimer - getSecondsPassed
;///////// ;// fire the gun! ;///////// ELSE
;// fire the A gun ; DLCAnchOverlookGunA.fireWeapon DLC02WeapOverlookCannon set gunAFired to 1
;// get the player's distance to establish screen shake set gunADistance to player.getDistance DLCAnchOverlookGunExplosionA set gunAShake to (((7000 - gunADistance)/7)*0.005) set gunARumble to (0.5 + ((7000 - gunADistance) * 0.00036))
setRumble gunARumble gunARumble 0.5 triggerHitShader gunAShake
;// reset the explosions, rumble and such set gunAInit to 0 set gunAAnimOnce to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// GUN B ;// should we be firing gun B? ;//////////////////////////////////////////////// IF DLCAnchOverlookGunsActiveB.getDisabled != 1 IF gunBInit == 0
;// fire the first shot immediately IF gunBFirstShot == 0 set gunBTimer to 7 set gunBRand to 0 set gunBFirstShot to 1 ELSE set gunBTimer to 20 set gunBRand to 1 + 0.04 * getRandomPercent ENDIF
;// check the override IF DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunB == 1 IF gunBAnim == 0 || gunBAnim == 3 set gunBAnim to 2
ENDIF ENDIF
set gunBInit to 1 set gunBTimer to gunBTimer + gunBRand
ELSE ;// run the timer IF gunBTimer > 6.5
set gunBTimer to gunBTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF gunBTimer < 6.5 && gunBTimer > 0
;// set the fact that we're moving set DLC02LD.gunBPos to 0
;// decide which way to look IF gunBAnim == 0 && gunBAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunB.playgroup Left 1 set gunBAnim to 1 set gunBAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunBAnim == 1 && gunBAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunB.playgroup TurnLeft 1 set gunBAnim to 2 set gunBAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunBAnim == 2 && gunBAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunB.playgroup Forward 1 set gunBAnim to 3 set gunBAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunBAnim == 3 && gunBAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunB.playgroup Right 1 set gunBAnim to 4 set gunBAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunBAnim == 4 && gunBAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunB.playgroup TurnRight 1 set gunBAnim to 5 set gunBAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunBAnim == 5 && gunBAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunB.playgroup Forward 1 set gunBAnim to 0 set gunBAnimOnce to 1
ENDIF
;// the countdown set gunBTimer to gunBTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE ;// fire the B gun ; DLCAnchOverlookGunB.fireWeapon DLC02WeapOverlookCannon set gunBFired to 1
;// get the player's distance to establish screen shake set gunBDistance to player.getDistance DLCAnchOverlookGunExplosionB set gunBShake to (((7000 - gunBDistance)/7)*0.005) set gunBRumble to (0.5 + ((7000 - gunBDistance) * 0.00036))
setRumble gunBRumble gunBRumble 0.5 triggerHitShader gunBShake set gunBInit to 0
;// reset the explosions, rumble and such set gunBInit to 0 set gunBAnimOnce to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// GUN C ;// should we be firing gun C? ;//////////////////////////////////////////////// IF DLCAnchOverlookGunsActiveC.getDisabled != 1
IF gunCInit == 0 set gunCRand to 1 + 0.06 * getRandomPercent
;// fire the first shot immediately IF gunCFirstShot == 0 set gunCTimer to 6 set gunCFirstShot to 1 ELSE set gunCTimer to 20 ENDIF
;// check the override IF DLC02OA2.OA2GoGunC == 1
IF gunCAnim != 0
IF gunCAnim == 1 set gunCAnim to 0
ELSEIF gunCAnim == 3 set gunCAnim to 0
ELSEIF gunCAnim == 4 set gunCAnim to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
set gunCInit to 1 set gunCTimer to gunCTimer + gunCRand ELSE ;// run the timer IF gunCTimer > 6.5 set gunCTimer to gunCTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF gunCTimer < 6.5 && gunCTimer > 0
;// set the fact that we're moving set DLC02LD.gunCPos to 0
;// decide which way to look IF gunCAnim == 0 && gunCAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunC.playgroup Forward 1 set gunCAnim to 1 set gunCAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunCAnim == 1 && gunCAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunC.playgroup Left 1 set gunCAnim to 2 set gunCAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunCAnim == 2 && gunCAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunC.playgroup TurnLeft 1 set gunCAnim to 3 set gunCAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunCAnim == 3 && gunCAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunC.playgroup Forward 1 set gunCAnim to 4 set gunCAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunCAnim == 4 && gunCAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunC.playgroup Right 1 set gunCAnim to 5 set gunCAnimOnce to 1 ELSEIF gunCAnim == 5 && gunCAnimOnce == 0 DLCAnchOverlookGunC.playgroup TurnRight 1 set gunCAnim to 0 set gunCAnimOnce to 1
ENDIF
set gunCTimer to gunCTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE ;// fire the C gun DLCAnchOverlookGunC.fireWeapon DLC02WeapOverlookCannon set gunCFired to 1
;// get the player's distance to establish screen shake set gunCDistance to player.getDistance DLCAnchOverlookGunExplosionC set gunCShake to (((7000 - gunCDistance)/7)*0.005) set gunCRumble to (0.5 + ((7000 - gunCDistance) * 0.00036))
setRumble gunCRumble gunCRumble 0.5 triggerHitShader gunCShake
;// reset the explosions, rumble and such set gunCInit to 0 set gunCAnimOnce to 0
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
ENDIF
;*********************; ;-- the shells stuff --; ;*********************;
;// the shell of gun A IF gunAFired == 1
;// set the gun timer IF gunAShellInit == 0 set gunAShellInit to 1 set gunAShellTimer to 2.5
ENDIF
IF gunAShellTimer > 0 set gunAShellTimer to gunAShellTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE ;// set the corresponding explosion depending on where the gun is facing ;// left fire IF gunAAnim == 4 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion1.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// center fire IF gunAAnim == 0 || gunAAnim == 2 || gunAAnim == 3 || gunAAnim == 5 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion2.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// right fire IF gunAAnim == 1 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion3.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// reset DLC02DistExplosionGunA.playSound3D FXExplosionGrenadeFragLow set gunAFired to 0 set gunAShellInit to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;// the shell of gun B IF gunBFired == 1
;// set the gun timer IF gunBShellInit == 0 set gunBShellInit to 1 set gunBShellTimer to 2.5
ENDIF
IF gunBShellTimer > 0 set gunBShellTimer to gunBShellTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE ;// set the corresponding explosion depending on where the gun is facing ;// left fire IF gunBAnim == 1 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion4.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// center fire IF gunBAnim == 0 || gunBAnim == 2 || gunBAnim == 3 || gunBAnim == 5 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion5.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// right fire IF gunBAnim == 4 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion6.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// reset DLC02DistExplosionGunB.playSound3D FXExplosionGrenadeFragLow set gunBFired to 0 set gunBShellInit to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
;// the shell of gun C IF gunCFired == 1 ;// set the gun timer IF gunCShellInit == 0 set gunCShellInit to 1 set gunCShellTimer to 2.5
ENDIF
IF gunCShellTimer > 0 set gunCShellTimer to gunCShellTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE ;// set the corresponding explosion depending on where the gun is facing ;// left fire IF gunCAnim == 2 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion7.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// center fire IF gunCAnim == 0 || gunCAnim == 1 || gunCAnim == 3 || gunCAnim == 4 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion8.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion 1 ENDIF
;// right fire IF gunCAnim == 5 DLC02OverlookShellExplosion9.placeAtMe DLC02GunBatteryImpactExplosion ENDIF
;// reset DLC02DistExplosionGunC.playSound3D FXExplosionGrenadeFragLow set gunCFired to 0 set gunCShellInit to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF END
;DLC02OverlookShellExplosion1

ScriptName DLC02BaseOutcast2Script
short startconv short factionflipped
float timer
Begin OnDeath
if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv == -10 )
Set DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinMutinyDead to ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinMutinyDead + 1 )
else Set DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount to ( DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount + 1 ) endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( Startconv == 0 ) if ( GetInSameCell Player == 1 ) ; if ( GetStage DLC02OA1 < 15 ) ; SetStage DLC02OA1 15 ; endif ; Set DLC02OA1.MorrillClear to 1 set StartConv to 1 set timer to 2 endif elseif ( StartConv == 1 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) Set StartConv to 2 EVP else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv != 10 ) if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 0 ) if ( IsInCombat == 1 ) if ( GetCombatTarget == Player ) Set DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile to 1 setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif
if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 1 ) if ( factionflipped == 0 ) setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif
End

Scriptname DLC02DefenderSibleyScript
short StartConv short factionflipped short McGrawTalk
short OlinConv
Begin OnDeath
if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv == -10 )
Set DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinMutinyDead to ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinMutinyDead + 1 )
else Set DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount to ( DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount + 1 ) endif
if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA1 40 == 1 ) SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA1 40 0 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( Startconv == 0 ) if ( DLC02VSS01ElevSwitch.State == 2 ) Set StartConv to 1 EVP endif endif
if ( GetStage DLC02OA1 == 40 ) if ( OlinConv == 0 ) if ( GetDistance DLC02SibleySimRoomMarker < 150 ) Set OlinConv to 1 EVP endif endif endif
if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv != 10 ) if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 0 ) if ( IsInCombat == 1 ) if ( GetCombatTarget == Player ) Set DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile to 1 setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif
if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 1 ) if ( factionflipped == 0 ) setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif
;if player has missed the post-quest conversation, update variables so the next block will run right away
if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv > 0 ) if ( DLC02ProtectorMcGrawRef.GetCurrentAIPackage != 6 ) set DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv to -1 endif endif
;set factions for post-conversation fight in DLC02OA4
if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndconv == -1 ) if ( GetCurrentAIPackage != 6 ) if ( DLC02ProtectorMcGrawREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 6 ) SetFactionRank DLC02OutcastFaction -1 SetFactionRank DLC02OA4MutinyFaction 0 DLC02BaseOutcast1Ref.SetFactionRank DLC02OutcastFaction -1 DLC02BaseOutcast2Ref.SetFactionRank DLC02OutcastFaction -1 DLC02BaseOutcast3Ref.SetFactionRank DLC02OutcastFaction -1 DLC02BaseOutcast1Ref.SetFactionRank DLC02OA4MutinyFaction 0 DLC02BaseOutcast2Ref.SetFactionRank DLC02OA4MutinyFaction 0 DLC02BaseOutcast3Ref.SetFactionRank DLC02OA4MutinyFaction 0 set DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv to -10 endif endif endif
End

scn DLC02FF005AttentionTriggerScript
ref myLinkedRef short minDistance ;how close to trigger does the linked ref need to be to have it toggle his at ease / at attention stance
;note: actorvalue variable05 0 = at ease, 1 = at attention, used as conditions on packages
;do a get distance check on the linked ref to the trigger before doing stuff, just in case he wandered away from it, probably don't intend it to still function
Begin OnLoad
set minDistance to 300 set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef myLinkedRef.setav variable05 0
End
Begin GameMode if myLinkedRef.getAv Variable05 == 1 if getDistance myLinkedRef > minDistance myLinkedRef.setav variable05 0 endif endif End
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDistance myLinkedRef <= minDistance myLinkedRef.setav variable05 1 myLinkedRef.evp
endif endif
End
Begin OnTriggerLeave
if IsActionRef player == 1 myLinkedRef.setav variable05 0 myLinkedRef.evp
endif
End

scn DLC02StrikeTeamRallyTriggerScript
begin OnTriggerEnter
if GetIsReference DLC02RallyMinesTriggerRef == 1 ;which trigger box is this? if IsActionRef DLC02MontgomeryRef == 1 ;is it Montgomery who is triggering if DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 ;is it the current Rally Point? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 1 ;then register with the quest script that they have arrived at the correct rally point endif endif endif
if GetIsReference DLC02RallyListenTriggerRef == 1 ;which trigger box is this? if IsActionRef DLC02MontgomeryRef == 1 ;is it Montgomery who is triggering if DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 ;is it the current Rally Point? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 1 ;then register with the quest script that they have arrived at the correct rally point endif endif endif
if GetIsReference DLC02RallyCampTriggerRef == 1 ;which trigger box is this? if IsActionRef DLC02MontgomeryRef == 1 ;is it Montgomery who is triggering if DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 3 ;is it the current Rally Point? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 1 ;then register with the quest script that they have arrived at the correct rally point endif endif endif
if GetIsReference DLC02RallyChimeraTriggerRef == 1 ;which trigger box is this? if IsActionRef DLC02MontgomeryRef == 1 ;is it Montgomery who is triggering if DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 4 ;is it the current Rally Point? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 1 ;then register with the quest script that they have arrived at the correct rally point endif endif endif
end
begin OnTriggerLeave
;It doesn't matter which trigger Montgomery is leaving; he isn't any ANY of the Rally Points if he leaves one of them if IsActionRef DLC02MontgomeryRef == 1 ;is it Montgomery who is triggering set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 0 ;then register with the quest script that they have left the rally point endif
end

scn DLC02ShellfieldSCRIPT
; ambience script for gun fire at shelling craters.
float timer ; vars for shelling field artillery strikes short dice short lastdice
float vertTimer ; vars for vertibird flyovers float x float y float z short VertCount short vertFlag
float bombTimer ; vars for bombing squadron flyovers float bomb02Timer float ang float ang02 short flipFlag ; simple flag to store if we are sending bombers from left or right
short Debug ; debug flag
;/////////BEGIN MAIN
begin gameMode
if getDistance player <= 5000 ; just a dumb distance check to avoid lots of manual handling. if timer >= 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) ; typical timer thing else set dice to ( 1 + 4 * (getRandomPercent / 101)) ; roll a dice 1-4
if dice != lastDice ; prevent strikes from hitting the exact same point 2x in row if dice == 1 ; launch artillery at appropriate crater DLC02ShellCrater01.placeatme FXartilleryStrike01 elseif dice == 2 DLC02ShellCrater02.placeatme FXartilleryStrike01 elseif dice == 3 DLC02ShellCrater03.placeatme FXartilleryStrike01 elseif dice == 4 DLC02ShellCrater04.placeatme FXartilleryStrike01 endif
set dice to lastDice endif
set timer to (0.5 + 2.5/99 * getRandomPercent) ; reset timer in random range
endif
if vertTimer >= 0 set vertTimer to (vertTimer - getSecondsPassed) ; timer for vertibird flyovers else if DLC02VertibirdRepeater.hasLoaded3D != 0 ; sort of a while-not-loaded loop. set x to (player.getPos X) set y to (player.getPos Y)
if vertCount == 0 ; cycle through flight paths set x to x + 7000 setAngle z 0 elseif vertCount == 1 set y to y - 7000 setAngle z 90 elseif vertCount == 2 set x to x - 7000 setAngle z 180 endif
set vertCount to vertCount + 1
if vertCount >= 2 set vertCount to 0 endif
set vertFlag to 1
DLC02VertibirdRepeater.setPos X x ; feed vertibird positional data and send it off DLC02VertibirdRepeater.setPos Y y DLC02VertibirdRepeater.enable DLC02VertibirdRepeater.playgroup forward 0
set vertTimer to (20 + 35/99 * getRandomPercent) endif endif
;// begin bombing squadron flyover loop if DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 if bombTimer >= 0 set bombTimer to (bombTimer - getSecondsPassed) else if DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.hasLoaded3D != 0 set x to (player.getPos X) set y to (player.getPos Y) set z to (player.getPos Z)
set x to (x + (getRandomPercent * 10)) ; offset set y to (y - (getRandomPercent * 10)) ; offset set z to (z + 2096) ; vertical offset
DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.setpos X x DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.setpos Y y DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.setpos Z z
set dice to (getRandomPercent + 1) ; generate if dice < 50 ; use this as a coin toss on east or west approach set ang to 0 ; east-west path else set ang to 180 ; west-east path endif
set dice to (getRandomPercent + 1) if dice < 50 set flipFlag to 0 ; this indicated a positive else set flipFlag to 1 ; this will indicate a negative modifier on flight angle endif
set dice to ((getRandomPercent + 1) / 2) ; generate a number 1-50 to help determine angle if flipFlag == 0 set ang to (ang + dice) else set ang to (ang - dice) endif
DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.setAngle Z ang ; all that data goes into the angle of flight path
DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.enable DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.playGroup forward 0
set bombTimer to (15 + 45/99 * getRandomPercent) endif endif endif
endif
; if getDistance player > 5000 && debug == 1 ; ;showWarning "out of range" ; DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShaderNoHole ; set debug to 0 ; elseif getDistance player <= 5000 && debug == 0 ; ;showWarning "in range" ; DLC02BombSquadronRepeater.pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ; set debug to 1 ; endif
end

scn DLC02VertibirdFlyoverSCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation ; THIS VERSION IS FOR DLC02 AND DOES NOT RELY ON MQ05 STAGE 85
float timer short doOnce ref linkedRef
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) set linkedRef to getLinkedRef
linkedRef.enable 0
set timer to 1
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif endif
End

scn DLC02RunningExtrasSCRIPT

begin onTriggerEnter
if doOnce == 0 if getActionRef == player
set myExtra to getLinkedRef set doOnce to 1
endif endif

end

scn testdlc02striketeamSniperSCRIPT

BEGIN ONLOAD setActorValue Variable01 0 END

;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase1DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 1 EVP set phase25DoOnce to 0 set phase1DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 1" ENDIF
ENDIF

;// check for the rally point and the proper trigger IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase5DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 5 EVP set phase1DoOnce to 0 set phase5DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 5" ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 10 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 5
;// check for the rally point and the proper trigger IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase10DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 10 EVP set phase5DoOnce to 0 set phase10DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 10" ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 15 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 10
;// check for the rally point and the proper trigger IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase15DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 15 EVP set phase10DoOnce to 0 set phase15DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 15" ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 20 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 15 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase20DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 20 EVP set phase15DoOnce to 0 set phase20DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 20" ENDIF
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 25 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 20 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase25.getDisabled == 1
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase25DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 25 EVP set phase20DoOnce to 0 set phase25DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 25" ENDIF
ENDIF
END

ScriptName DLC02OA1TriggerScript
;Used to disable player controls for mini-scene that plays out when first talking to McGraw
short DoOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( GetStage DLC02OA1 >= 10 ) if ( Player.IsInCombat == 0 ) if ( DLC02ProtectorMcGrawRef.GetDead == 0 ) if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 0 ) ; DisablePlayerControls Set DLC02OA1VSSTrigger1REF.DoOnce to 1 Set DLC02OA1VSSTrigger2REF.DoOnce to 1 Set DLC02OA1.PlayerTrigger to 1 endif endif endif endif endif elseif ( IsActionRef DLC02DefenderSibleyREF == 1 ) if ( DLC02OA1.SibleyTrigger == 0 ) Set DLC02OA1.SibleyTrigger to 1 endif endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( DLC02OA1.TrigPlayerAhead == 0 ) if ( DLC02OA1.PlayerTrigger == 1 ) if ( DLC02OA1.SibleyTrigger == 0 ) Set DLC02OA1.TrigPlayerAhead to 1 else Set DLC02OA1.TrigPlayerAhead to -1 endif endif endif
if ( DLC02OA1.TrigPlayerAhead == 1 ) if ( DLC02OA1.SibleyCRTrigger == 0 ) DLC02DefenderSibleyRef.MoveTo DLC02OA1SibleyMoveMarker endif DLC02DefenderSibleyRef.EVP Set DLC02OA1.TrigPlayerAhead to 2 endif
End
