scn DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript
;ACTOR VALUE VARIABLES ;variable02: 1 = "attack current objective", -1 = "attack completed stop attacking" -- needs to sync with DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block ;variable09: means "which slot of the team am I in?" --> corresponds to DLC02StrikeTeam.STUnit1Ref/STUnit2Ref/STUnit3Ref -- in other words which "slot" of the three man squad does this guy belong to, used primarily to reset reference variables to zero on death ;variable10: means "What is my current rally point" -- needs to sync with DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint
short myUnitType ;0 = not loaded ;1 = infantry ;2 = Grenadier ;3 = Missile ;4 = Sniper ;5 = Gutsy ;6 = Sentry
short myUnitCost
;--------------ROBOT STRIKE TEAM HANDLING VARIABLES----------------- short captureButton ;get button pressed short button
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;/////***Combat Phase Variables Make sure we only do each thing once*****//////////// short phase1DoOnce short phase5DoOnce short phase10DoOnce short phase15DoOnce short phase20DoOnce short phase25DoOnce short phase30DoOnce short phase35DoOnce short phase40DoOnce short phase45DoOnce short phase50DoOnce short phase55DoOnce
;// reset vars short resetOnce
;// the reset ammo variables short reStockMinesOnce short reStockCampOnce short reStockListenOnce short reStockChimeraOnce short reStockAmmo
Begin OnActivate
;-----ROBOT STRIKE TEAM MEMBER HANDLING---- if IsActionRef player == 1 if getInFaction DLC02RobotFaction == 1 if getAv variable03 == 0 set captureButton to 1 showMessage DLC02StrikeTeamRobotDismissMessage endif endif endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
;note: we wrap this in a check to make sure it's not a robot, for strike team only: if getInFaction DLC02RobotFaction == 0 ;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing
else ;i'm not dead activate endif
else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate
endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------- endif
End
Begin GameMode
;-----ROBOT STRIKE TEAM MEMBER HANDLING---- if captureButton == 1 set button to getButtonPressed if button > -1 set captureButton to 0 if button == 0 ;do nothing
elseif button == 1 setav variable03 1
endif endif ;/ button > -1 endif ;/ captureButton == 1 ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------------Initialize variables ;init myUnitType if myUnitType == 0
if getIsID DLC02LvlStrikeTeamAssaultRifle == 1 set myUnitType to 1 set myUnitCost to DLC02CostInfantry
elseif getIsID DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGrenadier == 1 set myUnitType to 2 set myUnitCost to DLC02CostGrenadier
elseif getIsID DLC02LvlStrikeTeamMissileUnit == 1 set myUnitType to 3 set myUnitCost to DLC02CostMissile
elseif getIsID DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSniper == 1 set myUnitType to 4 set myUnitCost to DLC02CostSniper
elseif getIsID DLC02LvlStrikeTeamGutsy == 1 set myUnitType to 5 set myUnitCost to DLC02CostGutsy
elseif getIsID DLC02LvlStrikeTeamSentry == 1 set myUnitType to 6 set myUnitCost to DLC02CostSentry
endif
endif ;------------------------------------------------------------------
;-------------SYNC ME TO CURRENT RALLY POINT ;please make sure these are implemented the same in both DLC02MontgomeryScript and DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript if getAV variable10 != DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint setAV variable10 DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint evp
;// reset the actor variable to 0 setActorValue Variable01 0 endif ;---------------
;-------------SYNC ME TO CURRENT RALLY POINT ATTACK STATE ;please make sure these are implemented the same in both DLC02MontgomeryScript and DLC02StrikeTeamMemberScript if getAV variable02 != DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack setAV variable02 DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack evp endif ;---------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1
;-----Striketeam specific processing ;DECREMENT THE UNIT TOTAL so player can get reinforcements set DLC02StrikeTeam.STUnitCount to DLC02StrikeTeam.STUnitCount - 1
;REPLENISH THE POINT POOL so player can get reinforcements set DLC02Points to DLC02Points + myUnitCost
;INCREASE THE POINTSEXPENDED totals set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpended to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpended + myUnitCost
if myUnitType == 1 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedInfantry to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedInfantry + myUnitCost
elseif myUnitType == 2 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedGrenadier to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedGrenadier + myUnitCost
elseif myUnitType == 3 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedMissile to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedMissile + myUnitCost
elseif myUnitType == 4 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedSniper to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedSniper + myUnitCost
elseif myUnitType == 5 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedGutsy to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedGutsy + myUnitCost
elseif myUnitType == 6 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedSentry to DLC02StrikeTeam.STPointsExpendedSentry + myUnitCost
endif
;reset the corresponding reference variable in the quest script: if getAV Variable09 == 1 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STUnit1Ref to 0 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STSpawnUnitOne to 0 ;so this "slot" is available to send in reinforcements, see dialog with Montgomery and quest stages in DLC02StrikeTeam
elseif getAV Variable09 == 2 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STUnit2Ref to 0 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STSpawnUnitTwo to 0 ;so this "slot" is available to send in reinforcements, see dialog with Montgomery and quest stages in DLC02StrikeTeam
elseif getAV Variable09 == 3 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STUnit3Ref to 0 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STSpawnUnitThree to 0 ;so this "slot" is available to send in reinforcements, see dialog with Montgomery and quest stages in DLC02StrikeTeam
endif ;-------end striketeam specific processing
setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else ;moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK markForDelete ;THIS IS FOR STRIKETEAM GUYS BECAUSE WE PLACEATME TO SPAWN THEM set RezOut to -1 endif endif ;-----------------------------------------------------------
;///////////////////////////////*************Start Combat Phase Section**************************************//////////////////////////////
;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// step the NPC through the coolest looking path ;///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
;// this will reset all the variables if the strike team is in transit IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == -1 set phase1DoOnce to 0 set phase5DoOnce to 0 set phase10DoOnce to 0 set phase15DoOnce to 0 set phase20DoOnce to 0 set phase25DoOnce to 0
ENDIF
;// set the NPC to go to his phase 1 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 0 && DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase1DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 1 EVP set phase25DoOnce to 0 set phase1DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 1" ENDIF
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 5 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 1
;// check for the rally point and the proper trigger IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 3 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 4 && DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 5 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase5DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 5 EVP set phase1DoOnce to 0 set phase5DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 5" ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 10 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 5
;// check for the rally point and the proper trigger IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 3 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 4 && DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 5 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase10DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 10 EVP set phase5DoOnce to 0 set phase10DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 10" ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 15 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 10
;// check for the rally point and the proper trigger IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 3 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 4 && DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 5 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase15DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 15 EVP set phase10DoOnce to 0 set phase15DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 15" ENDIF
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 20 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 15
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 3 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 5 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase20DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 20 EVP set phase15DoOnce to 0 set phase20DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 20" ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 25 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 20
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase25.getDisabled == 1) || (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase25.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase25DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 25 EVP set phase20DoOnce to 0 set phase25DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 25"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 30 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 25
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase30.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase30DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 30 EVP set phase25DoOnce to 0 set phase30DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 30"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 35 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 30
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase35.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase35DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 35 EVP set phase30DoOnce to 0 set phase35DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 35"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 40 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 35
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase40.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase40DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 40 EVP set phase35DoOnce to 0 set phase40DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 40"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 45 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 40
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase45.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase45DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 45 EVP set phase40DoOnce to 0 set phase45DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 45"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 50 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 45
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase50.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase50DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 50 EVP set phase45DoOnce to 0 set phase50DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 50"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////// ;// set the NPC to go to his phase 55 position ;////////////////////////////////// IF getAV Variable01 == 50
IF (DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase55.getDisabled == 1)
;// make sure we only EVP once per package swap IF phase55DoOnce == 0 setActorValue Variable01 55 EVP set phase50DoOnce to 0 set phase55DoOnce to 1 ; showWarning "NPC phase 55"
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;****************************** ;** the reload ammo section ;******************************
;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// check to see if its time to resupply ;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STMinesDone == 1 && reStockMinesOnce == 0 set reStockMinesOnce to 1 set reStockAmmo to 1
ELSEIF DLC02StrikeTeam.STCampDone == 1 && reStockCampOnce == 0 set reStockCampOnce to 1 set reStockAmmo to 1
ELSEIF DLC02StrikeTeam.STListenDone == 1 && reStockListenOnce == 0 set reStockListenOnce to 1 set reStockAmmo to 1
ELSEIF DLC02StrikeTeam.STChimeraDone == 1 && reStockChimeraOnce == 0 set reStockChimeraOnce to 1 set reStockAmmo to 1
ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////// ;// resupply time baby! ;////////////////////////////////////// IF reStockAmmo == 1 IF myUnitType != 0
;// grenadier ELSEIF myUnitType == 2 addItem DLC02WeapGrenadeFrag 5 set reStockAmmo to 0
;// missile guy ELSEIF myUnitType == 3 additem AmmoMissile 6 set reStockAmmo to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
END
Begin OnDeath
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02MontgomeryTalkTriggerGuns01Script
;This is a short script that handles Montgomery's comments to the Player at each artillery gun ;Using the OA2GunCount variable, we check to see which gun the Player is on

begin onTriggerEnter Player

scn DLC02MinesChineseSCRIPT
short mineKillCount
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF DLC02ChineseMinesSetOnceXMRK.getDisabled == 0 set DLC02StrikeTeam.CMineCounter to 12 DLC02ChineseMinesSetOnceXMRK.disable ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// rez out the guys on death setav variable03 1
set DLC02StrikeTeam.CMineCounter to DLC02StrikeTeam.CMineCounter - 1
END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02StrikeTeamAttackDoneTriggerScript
;used to set the attack/objective complete in the DLC02StrikeTeam quest
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if IsActionRef player == 1
if DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
if GetIsReference DLC02StrikeTeamAttackDoneTriggerCampRef == 1 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STCampDone to 1 endif
if GetIsReference DLC02StrikeTeamAttackDoneTriggerChimeraRef == 1 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STChimeraDone to 1 endif
endif
endif
End

scn DLC02BattlefieldPhasesWalkSCRIPT
;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// the block that tracks where the player is and the new positions ;// for the followers to take as well as anything special for ;// them to do ;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER Player
;*************************************** ; IF THE PLAYER IS AT THE MINES ;*************************************** IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 1 && DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
;// which trigger was hit and is the previous disabled? IF getSelf == DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase5 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase10 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase15 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase20 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase25 && DLC02MinesPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
;*************************************** ; IF THE PLAYER IS AT THE LPOST ;*************************************** IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 2 && DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
;// which trigger was hit and is the previous disabled? IF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase5 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase10 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase15 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase20 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase25 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase20.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase30 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase25.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase35 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase30.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase40 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase35.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase45 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase40.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase50 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase45.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase55 && DLC02LPostPlayerWalkPhase50.getDisabled == 1 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
;*************************************** ; IF THE PLAYER IS AT THE CAMP ;*************************************** IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 3 && DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
;// which trigger was hit and is the previous disabled? IF getSelf == DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase5 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase10 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase15 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase20 && DLC02IceCampPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
;*************************************** ; IF THE PLAYER IS AT THE DEPOT ;*************************************** IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 4 && DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
;// which trigger was hit and is the previous disabled? IF getSelf == DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase5 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase10 && DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase15 && DLC02DepotPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
;*************************************** ; IF THE PLAYER IS AT THE TRENCH ;*************************************** IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint == 5 && DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack == 1
;// which trigger was hit and is the previous disabled? IF getSelf == DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase5 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase10 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase5.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase15 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase10.getDisabled == 1 disable
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase20 && DLC02TrenchesPlayerWalkPhase15.getDisabled == 1 disable
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC02NPCBaseScript
;Please remind the team to update their scripts if anything in this script changes
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin GameMode
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin OnDeath
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02RezTriggerScript
ref myLinkedRef float myTimer short rezState ; 0 = off, 1 = on, -1 = finished rezzing
Begin OnLoad set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef
End
Begin GameMode ;if rezState is on, set timer, apply rez state, and turn off rez state after done
if rezState == 1 if myTimer > 0 set myTimer to myTimer - getSecondsPassed else myLinkedRef.sms DLC02DeRezItemShader set rezState to -1 endif
endif
End
Begin OnTriggerEnter if rezState == 0 if IsActionRef player == 1 set rezState to 1 set myTimer to 3 playSound3D FXRez myLinkedRef.pms DLC02DeRezItemShader
endif endif
End

scn DLC02CommandTentRezMeTriggerScript
short doOnce
short rezState
short rezGroup1 short rezGroup2 short rezGroup3
float myTimer ;counts up
Begin GameMode if rezState == 1
if myTimer > 1 && rezGroup1 == 0 DLCAnchUSCommandTentRezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLC02OA3CommandTentDoorRezMeRef.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader
set rezGroup1 to -1 endif
if myTimer > 2 && rezGroup2 == 0 ControlConsole03RezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader MetalBox01MilitaryRezMe2.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ToolCabinetMetalRezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader MetalBox01MilitaryRezMe3.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader HamRadio01RezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLC02MetalBox01STATICRezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ShelvesMetal01RezMe3.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader
set rezGroup2 to -1
endif
if myTimer > 3 && rezGroup3 == 0
Bucket01RezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLCAnchMilitaryTable01RezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ShelvesMetal01RezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ShelvesMetal01RezMe2.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader MetalBox01MilitaryRezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLC02Wrench01STATICRezMe.pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader
set rezGroup3 to -1
endif
if myTimer < 7 set myTimer to myTimer + getSecondsPassed
else ;STOP set rezState to -1
DLCAnchUSCommandTentRezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLC02OA3CommandTentDoorRezMeRef.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader
ControlConsole03RezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader MetalBox01MilitaryRezMe2.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ToolCabinetMetalRezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader MetalBox01MilitaryRezMe3.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader HamRadio01RezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLC02MetalBox01STATICRezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ShelvesMetal01RezMe3.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader
Bucket01RezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLCAnchMilitaryTable01RezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ShelvesMetal01RezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader ShelvesMetal01RezMe2.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader MetalBox01MilitaryRezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader DLC02Wrench01STATICRezMe.sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader
endif
endif
End
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if doOnce == 0 if isActionRef player == 1 set rezState to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC02RezFlickerTriggerScript
;this script will cause the linked ref to "rez flicker" periodically
;GLOBAL DLC02RezFlickerTime
ref myLinkedRef short flickering short flickerOnSecond ;(must be less than 100)
float myTimer ;COUNTS UP to DLC02RezFlickerTime
float timerToStopShader ;COUNTS DOWN
Begin OnLoad set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef set flickerOnSecond to GetRandomPercent * DLC02RezFlickerTime/100 + 1 ;example, if DLC02RezFlickerTime == 25, this rolls a die between 1 and 25 set myTimer to 0
End
Begin GameMode
if flickering == 1 && myLinkedRef.getdisabled == 0 if timerToStopShader > 0 set timerToStopShader to timerToStopShader - getSecondsPassed else myLinkedRef.sms DLC02DeRezItemShader set flickering to -1 endif
endif
if myTimer < DLC02RezFlickerTime set myTimer to myTimer + getSecondsPassed
if flickering == 0 if myTimer >= flickerOnSecond playSound3D FXObjectHighlight myLinkedRef.pms DLC02DeRezItemShader set timerToStopShader to 2 set flickering to 1 endif
endif
elseif flickering != 1 set myTimer to 0 set flickering to 0 ;pick a random second to start flickering next pass set flickerOnSecond to GetRandomPercent * DLC02RezFlickerTime/100 + 1 ;example, if DLC02RezFlickerTime == 25, this rolls a die between 1 and 25
endif
End

scn DLC02AmmoBoxSCRIPT
;This script handles the giving of ammo the player when he activates the ammo box, and the random flickering that occures on the box.
short hasAmmo ;Number of specific ammo the player has in his inventory short giveAmmo float disableTimer short switched
short ammoAdded
short MaxMicroFusionCell short MaxGrenadeFrag short MaxMineFrag short MaxMissile
;GLOBALS ;DLC02Max10mm ;DLC02Max556mm ;DLC02MaxFuel ;DLC02Max5mm ;DLC02Max308Caliber ;DLC02MaxShells
;-----Flickering Stuff---- short flickering short flickerOnSecond ;(must be less than 100) float myTimer ;COUNTS UP to DLC02RezFlickerTime
float timerToStopShader ;COUNTS DOWN
Begin OnLoad
set disableTimer to .5
set MaxMicroFusionCell to 10 set MaxGrenadeFrag to 4 set MaxMineFrag to 4 set MaxMissile to 4
;-----Flickering Stuff---- set flickerOnSecond to GetRandomPercent * DLC02RezFlickerTime/100 + 1 ;example, if 25, this rolls a die between 1 and 25 set myTimer to 0 set flickering to 1
End
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 )
set ammoAdded to 0
;--------10MM Weapons-------- if (player.GetItemCount DLC02Weap10mmPistol >0) || (player.GetItemCount DLC02Weap10mmPistolSilenced >0) || (player.GetItemCount DLC02Weap10mmSubmachineGun >0) || (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapChinesePistol >0)
if (player.GetItemCount Ammo10mm >= DLC02Max10mm)
;Do Nothing
elseif (player.GetItemCount Ammo10mm < DLC02Max10mm) set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount Ammo10mm set giveAmmo to DLC02Max10mm - hasAmmo player.AddItem Ammo10mm giveAmmo 1 set ammoAdded to 1 endif
endif
;--------556MM Weapons-------- if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapChineseAssaultRifle >0) || (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapAssaultRifle >0)
if (player.GetItemCount Ammo556mm >= DLC02Max556mm)
;Do Nothing elseif (player.GetItemCount Ammo556mm < DLC02Max556mm)
set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount Ammo556mm set giveAmmo to DLC02Max556mm - hasAmmo player.AddItem Ammo556mm giveAmmo 1 set ammoAdded to 1 endif
endif
;--------Flamer-------- if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapFlamer > 0)
if (player.GetItemCount AmmoFlamerFuel >= DLC02MaxFuel)
;Do Nothing elseif (player.GetItemCount AmmoFlamerFuel < DLC02MaxFuel)
set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount AmmoFlamerFuel set giveAmmo to DLC02MaxFuel - hasAmmo player.AddItem AmmoFlamerFuel giveAmmo 1 set ammoAdded to 1 endif
endif
;--------Gauss Rifle-------- ; if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapGaussRifle > 0) ; ; if (player.GetItemCount AmmoMicroFusionCell >= MaxMicroFusionCell) ; ; ;Do Nothing ; elseif (player.GetItemCount AmmoMicroFusionCell < MaxMicroFusionCell) ; ; set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount AmmoMicroFusionCell ; set giveAmmo to MaxMicroFusionCell - hasAmmo ; player.AddItem AmmoMicroFusionCell giveAmmo 1 ; set ammoAdded to 1 ; endif ; ; endif
;--------Frag Grenade-------- ; if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapGrenadeFrag >= MaxGrenadeFrag ) ; ; ;Do Nothing ; ; elseif (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapGrenadeFrag < MaxGrenadeFrag ) ; ; set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapGrenadeFrag ; set giveAmmo to MaxGrenadeFrag - hasAmmo ; player.AddItem DLC02WeapGrenadeFrag giveAmmo 1 ; set ammoAdded to 1 ; endif
;--------Frag Mine------- ; if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapMineFrag >= MaxMineFrag ) ; ; ;Do Nothing ; ; elseif (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapMineFrag < MaxMineFrag ) ; ; set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapMineFrag ; set giveAmmo to MaxMineFrag - hasAmmo ; player.AddItem DLC02WeapMineFrag giveAmmo 1 ; set ammoAdded to 1 ; endif
;--------Minigun-------- if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapMinigun > 0)
if (player.GetItemCount Ammo5mm >= DLC02Max5mm )
;Do Nothing elseif (player.GetItemCount Ammo5mm < DLC02Max5mm )
set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount Ammo5mm set giveAmmo to DLC02Max5mm - hasAmmo player.AddItem Ammo5mm giveAmmo 1 set ammoAdded to 1 endif
endif
;--------Missile Launcher-------- ; if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapMissileLauncher > 0) ; ; if (player.GetItemCount AmmoMissile >= MaxMissile ) ; ; ;Do Nothing ; elseif (player.GetItemCount AmmoMissile < MaxMissile ) ; ; set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount AmmoMissile ; set giveAmmo to MaxMissile - hasAmmo ; player.AddItem AmmoMissile giveAmmo 1 ; set ammoAdded to 1 ; endif ; ; endif
;--------Sniper Rifle-------- if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapSniperRifle > 0)
if (player.GetItemCount Ammo308Caliber >= DLC02Max308Caliber )
;Do Nothing elseif (player.GetItemCount Ammo308Caliber < DLC02Max308Caliber )
set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount Ammo308Caliber set giveAmmo to DLC02Max308Caliber - hasAmmo player.AddItem Ammo308Caliber giveAmmo 1 set ammoAdded to 1 endif
endif
;--------Shotgun-------- if (player.GetItemCount DLC02WeapShotgunCombat > 0)
if (player.GetItemCount AmmoShotgunShell >= DLC02MaxShells )
;Do Nothing elseif (player.GetItemCount AmmoShotgunShell < DLC02MaxShells )
set hasAmmo to player.GetItemCount AmmoShotgunShell set giveAmmo to DLC02MaxShells - hasAmmo player.AddItem AmmoShotgunShell giveAmmo 1 set ammoAdded to 1 endif
endif
if (ammoAdded == 1) PlaySound3d FXObjectUse ShowMessage DLC02AmmoRefill activate elseif (ammoAdded == 0) PlaySound3d QSTToneSequenceFail ShowMessage DLC02AmmoFull activate endif
pms DLC02DeRezItemShader set timerToStopShader to 2 set flickering to 1
set switched to 1 endif End
Begin GameMode
;-----Flickering Stuff---- if flickering == 1 if timerToStopShader > 0 set timerToStopShader to timerToStopShader - getSecondsPassed else sms DLC02DeRezItemShader set flickering to -1 endif
endif
if myTimer < DLC02RezFlickerTime set myTimer to myTimer + getSecondsPassed
if flickering == 0 if myTimer >= flickerOnSecond playSound3D FXObjectHighlight pms DLC02DeRezItemShader set timerToStopShader to 2 set flickering to 1 endif
endif
elseif flickering != 1 set myTimer to 0 set flickering to 0 ;pick a random second to start flickering next pass set flickerOnSecond to GetRandomPercent * DLC02RezFlickerTime/100 + 1 ;example, if DLC02RezFlickerTime == 25, this rolls a die between 1 and 25
endif
End

scn DLC02GenericVertibirdLandingSCRIPT
; This trigger just sets a variable flag on the control script if conditions are met. ; Used for the GenericVertibirdLandingControlSCRIPT
ref linkedRef short doOnce short init
;****************************************
Begin onLoad if (init == 0) set linkedRef to getLinkedRef set init to 1 endif End
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player if (doOnce == 0) ; if (getStage MQ05 >= 85) set linkedRef to getLinkedRef linkedRef.activate linkedRef 1 set doOnce to 1 ; endif endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC02GenericVertibirdLandingControlSCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation
float timer short doOnce ref linkedRef ref vertibirdLinkedRef
short init
Begin onHitWith GenericVertibirdHitWithWeaponsList
linkedRef.do 100
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate set doOnce to 1 End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode if init == 0 set init to 1 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef set vertibirdLinkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) if ( linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0 ) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 0 set doOnce to 3 endif else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set timer to 3 ; 3 seconds while vertibird is on ground before it enables its xmarker set doOnce to 4 endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) if (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) vertibirdLinkedRef.enable ;enables an xmarker whose children are the enclave lists set timer to 2 ; 2 seconds before vertibird will take off set doOnce to 5 else set doOnce to 7 endif
else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <=0) if (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.playgroup backward 0 set doOnce to 6
else set doOnce to 7 endif else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 6) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) && (getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its backward animation set doOnce to 7 endif
endif
End

scn DLC02AmericanSoldierArtilleryTargetSCRIPT
short artilleryStartOnce short artilleryFireOnce
;// the artillery timer float artilleryTimer short artilleryTimerInit short artilleryTimerStart
;;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF artilleryStartOnce == 0 set artilleryStartOnce to 1 set artilleryTimerStart to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF artilleryTimerStart == 1 IF artilleryTimerInit == 0 set ArtilleryTimer to 6 set artilleryTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
IF artilleryTimer >= 3.25 set artilleryTimer to artilleryTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF artilleryTimer < 3.25 && artilleryTimer > 0 IF artilleryFireOnce == 0 placeatme DLC02FXartilleryStrike01Large 1 set artilleryFireOnce to 1 ENDIF
set artilleryTimer to artilleryTimer - getSecondsPassed
ELSE set artilleryTimer to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// rez out the guys on death setav variable03 1
END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn FXArtilleryStrikeScriptLargeSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
Begin OnLoad Set DoOnce to 0 playgroup forward 0 End
Begin GameMode if DoOnce == 0 If isAnimPlaying Forward == 0 Placeatme DLC02LargeExplosion Set DoOnce to 2 endif EndIf
If DoOnce == 2 Disable set DoOnce to 3 endif
if DoOnce == 3 MarkForDelete endif End

scn DLC02DefaultAmericanSoldierSCRIPT
;// Rez out counter vars short beginRezOut short rezOutInit short rezOutStopOnce float rezOutCounter
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////////////////////////// ;// REZ OUT ON DEATH ;////////////////////////////////////// IF beginRezOut == 1
IF rezOutInit == 0 pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutInit to 1 set rezOutCounter to 4 ENDIF
;// a 4 second timer, after 2.5 seconds we remove the effect, after the 4th second we disable IF rezOutCounter > 1.25 set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter <= 1.25 && rezOutCounter > 0.85
IF rezOutStopOnce == 0 sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutStopOnce to 1 ENDIF
set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter < 0.85 && rezOutStopOnce > 0 moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK disable set beginRezOut to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////// ;// REZ OUT ON DEATH ;//////////////////////////////////////
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// rez out the guys on death set beginRezOut to 1
END

scn DLC02MineFacilityBattleSCRIPT
short battleInit float battleCounter
;// the do Once stuff! short explosion1Once short explosion2Once short explosion3Once short explosion4Once short explosion5Once short explosion6Once short explosion78Once short artillery1Once short artillery2Once short artillery3Once
BEGIN GAMEMODE IF DLC02MineFacilityBattleXMRK.getDisabled == 0 IF battleInit == 0 set battleInit to 1 set battleCounter to 60 ENDIF
;// run down the battle counter! IF battleCounter > 45.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// Explosion 1! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 45.5 && battleCounter > 40 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion1Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion1XMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 set explosion1Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Explosion 2! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 40 && battleCounter > 35.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion2Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion2XMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 set explosion2Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Explosion 3! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 35.5 && battleCounter > 30 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion3Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion3XMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 set explosion3Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Explosion 4! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 30 && battleCounter > 25.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion4Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion4XMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 set explosion4Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Explosion 5! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 25.5 && battleCounter > 20 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion5Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion5XMRK.placeAtMe mediumExplosion 1 set explosion5Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Explosion 6! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 20 && battleCounter > 15.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion6Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion6XMRK.placeAtMe mediumExplosion 1 set explosion6Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Explosions 7 and 8! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 15.5 && battleCounter > 14.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF explosion78Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion7XMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 DLC02MineFacilityBattleExplosion8XMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 set explosion78Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Artillery Shell 1! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 14.5 && battleCounter > 13.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF artillery1Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleArtExplosion1XMRK.placeAtme DLC02FXArtilleryStrike01Large 1 ; showWarning "France 1!" set artillery1Once to 1 ENDIF
;// Artillery Shell 2! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 13.5 && battleCounter > 12.5 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF artillery2Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleArtExplosion2XMRK.placeAtme DLC02FXArtilleryStrike01Large 1 set artillery2Once to 1 ; showWarning "Begayho" ENDIF
;// Artillery Shell 3! ELSEIF battleCounter <= 12.5 && battleCounter > 0 set battleCounter to battleCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// do Once! IF artillery3Once == 0 DLC02MineFacilityBattleArtExplosion3XMRK.placeAtme DLC02FXArtilleryStrike01Large 1 set artillery3Once to 1 ; showWarning "Duplication!" ENDIF
ELSE
ENDIF
ENDIF END

scn DLC02CrimsonStealthArmorSCRIPT
ref mySelf
BEGIN ONLOAD set mySelf to GetSelf END
BEGIN GAMEMODE IF mySelf.IsSneaking == 1 mySelf.addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ELSEIF mySelf.IsSneaking != 1 mySelf.removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell ENDIF END

scn DLC02ArtilleryBaseDragoonSCRIPT ;This script tells the dragoon what to do in certain stages of combat. It also tells him to rez out on death
float hitTimer ;Length of time after last hit that the stealth spell gets put back on float entranceTimer ;Length of time before the dragoon first turns on stealth short firstStealth ;0 - not doing first stealth, 1 - doing first stealth short firstPackage ;1 - not doing first package, 0 - doing first package short wasHit ;Was the dragoon hit? short inStealthMode ;1 - if Stealth Effect is enabled, 0 - if it isn't
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD set entranceTimer to GetRandomPercent * 1/100 + 5 ;Picks a random float between 3 and 4. set firstStealth to 1 END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead startcombat player endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
BEGIN ONHIT set inStealthMode to 0 if getDead == 0 set wasHit to 1 set hitTimer to 1.5 endif END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if (firstStealth == 1) if (entranceTimer < 0) set inStealthMode to 1 set firstStealth to 0 else set entranceTimer to (entranceTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (wasHit == 1) ;if dragoon is hit if (hitTimer < 0) ;and his hit timer reaches zero set inStealthMode to 1 ;go back into stealth set wasHit to 0 else set hitTimer to (hitTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (inStealthMode == 1) addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell elseif (inStealthMode != 1) removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell endif
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
begin OnDeath set inStealthMode to 0 set wasHit to 0
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
end

scn DLC02DefaultAmericanVertibirdEncount01SCRIPT
ref mySelf
;// Rez out counter vars short beginRezOut short rezOutInit short rezOutStopOnce float rezOutCounter short rezOutStartOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////////////////////////// ;// REZ OUT ON DEATH ;////////////////////////////////////// IF beginRezOut == 1
IF rezOutInit == 0 set rezOutInit to 1 set rezOutCounter to 3.75 ENDIF
;// a 4 second timer, after 2.5 seconds we remove the effect, after the 4th second we disable IF rezOutCounter > 3.25 set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter <= 3.25 && rezOutCounter > 1.25 set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF rezOutStartOnce == 0 playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader placeAtMe DLC02VertibirdExplosion 1 set rezOutStartOnce to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF rezOutCounter <= 1.25 && rezOutCounter > 0.85
IF rezOutStopOnce == 0 sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutStopOnce to 1 ENDIF
set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter < 0.95 && rezOutStopOnce > 0 ; moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK disable set beginRezOut to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;////////////////////////////////////// ;// REZ OUT ON DEATH ;//////////////////////////////////////
END
BEGIN ONHIT
set mySelf to getSelf
IF mySelf.getHealthPercentage <= 0.1 set beginRezOut to 1 ENDIF
END

scn DLC02TrigDisableTank01SCRIPT
; This trigger disables tank near the Ice Camps ; This trigger only gets triggered once.
ref actionRef short doOnce
Begin onTriggerEnter if (doOnce == 0) set actionRef to getActionRef if (actionRef == DLC02IceCampTank01REF) DLC02IceCampTank01REF.disable set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif endif End

scn DLC02OA4EndStep3TriggerScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) if ( DLC02OA4.EndStep == 2 ) SetStage DLC02OA4 200 set DLC02OA4.EndStep to 3 DLC02DefenderSibleyRef.Evp endif endif
End

scn DLC02HealthKitSCRIPT
;This script handles the giving of ammo the player when he activates the ammo box, and the random flickering that occures on the box.
;-----Flickering Stuff---- ;GLOBAL DLC02RezFlickerTime short flickering short flickerOnSecond ;(must be less than 100) float myTimer ;COUNTS UP to DLC02RezFlickerTime
float timerToStopShader ;COUNTS DOWN
Begin OnLoad
;-----Flickering Stuff---- set flickerOnSecond to GetRandomPercent * DLC02RezFlickerTime/100 + 1 ;example, if 25, this rolls a die between 1 and 25 set myTimer to 0 set flickering to 1
End
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) player.resethealth PlaySound3d FXObjectUse ShowMessage DLC02HealthRestore
pms DLC02DeRezItemShader set timerToStopShader to 2 set flickering to 1 activate
endif
End
Begin GameMode
;-----Flickering Stuff---- if flickering == 1 if timerToStopShader > 0 set timerToStopShader to timerToStopShader - getSecondsPassed else sms DLC02DeRezItemShader set flickering to -1 endif
endif
if myTimer < DLC02RezFlickerTime set myTimer to myTimer + getSecondsPassed
if flickering == 0 if myTimer >= flickerOnSecond playSound3D FXObjectHighlight pms DLC02DeRezItemShader set timerToStopShader to 2 set flickering to 1 endif
endif
elseif flickering != 1 set myTimer to 0 set flickering to 0 ;pick a random second to start flickering next pass set flickerOnSecond to GetRandomPercent * DLC02RezFlickerTime/100 + 1 ;example, if DLC02RezFlickerTime == 25, this rolls a die between 1 and 25
endif
End

scn DLC02SniperAmbushSCRIPT
ref mySelf ref myLinkedRef short combatOn
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
set mySelf to getSelf mySelf.addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell
set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef myself.moveTo myLinkedRef
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// check to see if its combat time! IF myLinkedRef.getDisabled == 1 && combatOn == 0 mySelf.addToFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction 5 mySelf.removeFromFaction DLC02AmericanCaptiveFaction mySelf.removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set combatOn to 1 ENDIF
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// rez out the guys on death setav variable03 1 END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
BEGIN ONHIT
IF combatOn == 0 mySelf.addToFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction 5 mySelf.removeFromFaction DLC02AmericanCaptiveFaction mySelf.removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set combatOn to 1 ENDIF
END

scn DLC02DragoonLPLeanSCRIPT
ref mySelf ref myLinkedRef short combatOn
;// rez out variables short beginRezOut short rezOutInit short rezOutStopOnce float rezOutCounter
BEGIN ONLOAD
set mySelf to getSelf set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE ;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;// check to see if its combat time! IF myLinkedRef.getDisabled == 1 ; mySelf.addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell setav Variable01 1 EVP ENDIF
;// REZ OUT ON DEATH IF beginRezOut == 1
IF rezOutInit == 0 pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutInit to 1 set rezOutCounter to 4 ENDIF
;// a 4 second timer, after 2.5 seconds we remove the effect, after the 4th second we disable IF rezOutCounter > 1.25 set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter <= 1.25 && rezOutCounter > 0.85
IF rezOutStopOnce == 0 sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set rezOutStopOnce to 1 ENDIF
set rezOutCounter to rezOutCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF rezOutCounter < 0.85 && rezOutStopOnce > 0 disable moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK
ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// rez out the guys on death set beginRezOut to 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills to ( DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills + 1 ) END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE ;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------- END

scn DLC02ElevSwitchAboveSCRIPT
; brute force script here....
;update: clear crime against DLC outcast faction the first time the player uses the elevator
short ClearOnce
begin onActivate
if getActionRef == player set DLC02LD.elevFlag to 1

endif
end

scn DLC02SpiderMineSCRIPT
ref myTarget short blowedUp
begin OnCombatEnd set myTarget to 0 end
begin onActivate ; don't allow anybody to activate me... set blowedUp to 1 placeatme fireextinguisherexplosion end
begin gamemode
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if getDead == 0 && blowedUp == 0 if IsInCombat == 1 if myTarget == 0 set myTarget to GetCombatTarget elseif myTarget != getCombatTarget set myTarget to getCombatTarget elseif getDistance myTarget < 156 set blowedUp to 1 placeatme fireextinguisherexplosion elseif myTarget.getDead == 1 set myTarget to 0 endif endif elseif getDead == 1 disable endif
end

scn DLC02DragoonLPAmbushSCRIPT
ref mySelf ref myLinkedRef short combatOn
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;// invis timer vars short invisOn float invisCounter short invisCounterInit
BEGIN ONLOAD
set mySelf to getSelf mySelf.addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set invisOn to 1
set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef myself.moveTo myLinkedRef
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE ;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;///////////////////////////////// ;// check to see if its combat time! ;///////////////////////////////// IF myLinkedRef.getDisabled == 1 && combatOn == 0 mySelf.addToFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction 5 mySelf.removeFromFaction DLC02NeutralHackFaction setAv aggression 2 set combatOn to 1
ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////// ;// the invis stuff ;///////////////////////////////// IF invisOn == 1 IF invisCounterInit == 0 set invisCounterInit to 1 set invisCounter to 5
ENDIF
;// the timer to re-invis IF invisCounter > 0 set invisCounter to invisCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSE set invisOn to 0 mySelf.addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set invisCounterInit to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// rez out the guys on death setav variable03 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills to ( DLC02OA3.OA3ListenPostKills + 1 )
END
BEGIN ONHIT
;///////////////////////////////// ;// is it time to start the combat? ;///////////////////////////////// IF combatOn == 0 mySelf.addToFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction 5 mySelf.removeFromFaction DLC02NeutralHackFaction setAv aggression 2 set combatOn to 1
ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////// ;// check to see if we should be invis ;///////////////////////////////// IF invisOn == 0 set invisOn to 1 mySelf.removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell
ELSEIF invisOn == 1 set invisCounter to 5
ENDIF
END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead mySelf.addToFaction DLC02CombatChineseFaction 5 mySelf.removeFromFaction DLC02NeutralHackFaction setAv aggression 2 set combatOn to 1 endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

ScriptName DLC02ProtectorMcGrawScript

Begin OnDeath Set DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount to ( DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount + 1 ) end
Begin GameMode
if ( GetStage DLC02OA4 < 200 ) if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 0 ) if ( IsInCombat == 1 ) if ( GetCombatTarget == Player ) Set DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile to 1 setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif

End

if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 1 ) if ( factionflipped == 0 ) setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC02BaseOutcastScript

if ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinEndConv == -10 )
Set DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinMutinyDead to ( DLC02OAFin.DLC02FinMutinyDead + 1 )
else Set DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount to ( DLC02OA1.BaseDeadCount + 1 ) endif

if ( DLC02OA1.OutcastsHostile == 1 ) if ( factionflipped == 0 ) setfactionrank DLC02OutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerOutcastFactionHOSTILE 0 set factionflipped to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn DLC02TrenchClimberTrigSCRIPT
float timer short doOnce short climbingStarted short startTimer

scn DLC02TrenchClimberTrig02SCRIPT
float timer float shootTimer ref actionRef short doOnce short beginShooting
;********************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter
if (doOnce == 0) set actionRef to getActionRef
if (actionRef == DLC02TrenchWallClimber01REF) set timer to 4 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
End
;********************************************
Begin onTriggerLeave
if (doOnce == 1) set actionRef to getActionRef if (actionRef == DLC02TrenchWallClimber01REF) set doOnce to 0 endif endif
End
;********************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) set beginShooting to 1 set doOnce to 2 DLC02TrenchWallClimber01REF.setav health 1 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (beginShooting == 1) set shootTimer to 0.01 * Getrandompercent set beginShooting to 2 elseif (beginShooting == 2) if (shootTimer <= 0) DLC02TrenchClimberShooterREF.fireWeapon DLC02WeapHIGHDMGChineseAssaultRifle ; DLC02TrenchWallClimber01REF.kill DLC02TrenchWallClimber01REF 1 set beginShooting to 1 else set shootTimer to (shootTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (DLC02TrenchWallClimber01REF.getDead == 1) || (doOnce == 0) set beginShooting to 0 endif
End
;********************************************

scn DLC02SoldierTrenchCornerLookSCRIPT
float shotCounter short shotInit short shotStart
short shotOne short shotTwo short shotThree short shotFour short shotFive short shotSix short shotSeven short shotEight
;// crouch and repeat vars short peekOnce float crouchCounter short crouchInit
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF peekOnce == 0 set peekOnce to 1 setAV Variable01 0 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;IF isIdlePlaying DLCAnchWallCoverShootRightSideAnim == 1 && shotStart == 0 IF shotStart == 0 && getSitting == 2 && getDisabled == 0 ;IF shotStart == 0 set shotStart to 1 ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE SHOOTING BLOCK ;///////////////////////////////////////// IF shotStart == 1 IF shotInit == 0 set shotCounter to 5.15 set shotInit to 1 ENDIF
IF shotCounter > 2.4 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// shot one ELSEIF shotCounter <= 2.4 && shotCounter > 2.2 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shotOne == 0 FireWeapon weapChineseAssaultRifle set shotOne to 1 ENDIF
;// shot two ELSEIF shotCounter <= 2.2 && shotCounter > 2.0 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shotTwo == 0 FireWeapon weapChineseAssaultRifle set shotTwo to 1 ENDIF
;// shot three ELSEIF shotCounter <= 2.0 && shotCounter > 1.4 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shotThree == 0 FireWeapon weapChineseAssaultRifle set shotThree to 1 ENDIF
;// shot four ELSEIF shotCounter <= 1.4 && shotCounter > 1.2 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shotFour == 0 FireWeapon weapChineseAssaultRifle set shotFour to 1 ENDIF
;// shot five ELSEIF shotCounter <= 1.2 && shotCounter > 0.9 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shotFive == 0 FireWeapon weapChineseAssaultRifle set shotFive to 1 ENDIF
;// shot six ELSEIF shotCounter <= 0.9 && shotCounter > 0 set shotCounter to shotCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shotSix == 0 FireWeapon weapChineseAssaultRifle set shotSix to 1 ENDIF
ELSE set shotStart to 0 set crouchInit to 0 setAV Variable01 1 EVP ENDIF ENDIF
;///////////////////////////////////////// ;// THE CROUCHING BLOCK ;/////////////////////////////////////////
IF getAV Variable01 == 1 IF crouchInit == 0 set crouchInit to 1 set crouchCounter to 10 ENDIF
IF crouchCounter > 0 set crouchCounter to crouchCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSE
;// reset it all! setAV Variable01 0 resetAI
set shotInit to 0 set shotOne to 0 set shotTwo to 0 set shotThree to 0 set shotFour to 0 set shotFive to 0 set shotSix to 0 set shotSeven to 0 set shotEight to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN OnDeath ;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;--------------------------------------------------------------- END
BEGIN OnActivate ;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------- END

scn DLC02FF008ObserveTriggerScript
;actorvariable08: ;0 = follow ;1 = travel to and play "observing" animation at DLC02FF008ObserveMarkerA ;2 = travel to and play "observing" animation at DLC02FF008ObserveMarkerB
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if IsActionRef DLC02FF008SoldierWalkRef == 1 if GetIsReference DLC02FF008ObserveTriggerRefA == 1 DLC02FF008MechaniceRefC.setav Variable08 1 DLC02FF008MechaniceRefC.evp endif
if GetIsReference DLC02FF008ObserveTriggerRefB == 1 DLC02FF008MechaniceRefC.setav Variable08 2 DLC02FF008MechaniceRefC.evp endif
endif
End

if IsActionRef DLC02FF008SoldierWalkRef == 1 DLC02FF008MechaniceRefC.setav Variable08 0 DLC02FF008MechaniceRefC.evp endif
End

ScriptName DLC02MineScript

ref LinkRef1

End
Begin GameMode
if ( GetStage DLC02OA4 < 20 )
if ( ExplosionRun == 0 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) Set ExplosionRun to 1 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
elseif ( ExplosionRun == 1 ) PlaceAtMe GrenadePulseExplosion 1 set Variator to GetRandomPercent if ( Variator > 66 ) set variator to ( Variator / 10 ) elseif ( Variator > 33 ) set Variator to 1 + ( Variator / 10 ) else set Variator to ( Variator / 20 ) endif set timer to 6 + Variator set ExplosionRun to 0 endif endif endif
End
