scn DLC02DeadGuyInCaveRezOutSCRIPT
;This script is a dup of the Rez In Script, but made for the guy who montgomery "kills" before dropping down the vents so that he will Rez Out. ;All Did was add a timer before the Rez Out starts.
;----MY ADDITION--- float deathTimer short doOnce
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;----MY ADDITION---
Begin OnLoad set deathTimer to 2 End
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin GameMode
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;----MY ADDITION---
if (doOnce == 0) if ( deathTimer > 0 ) set deathTimer to ( deathTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else setav Variable03 1 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin OnDeath
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02OA4PowerArmorGuysToCoverSCRIPT
;This Script sends the power armor guys from the vertibird landing point to cover in front of the minefield
;Using a timer to insure that each guy gets his variable changed and gets evp'd
short triggerOnce short doOnce short person float timer
Begin OnLoad set timer to .5 set person to 1 End
begin onTriggerEnter Player if (triggerOnce == 0) set doOnce to 1 set triggerOnce to 1 endif end
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (person == 1) if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.setav Variable05 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.evp set timer to .5 set person to 2 endif endif if (person == 2) if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.setav Variable05 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.evp set timer to .5 set person to 3 endif endif if (person == 3) if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.setav Variable05 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.evp set timer to .5 set person to 4 endif endif if (person == 4) if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.setav Variable05 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.evp set timer to .5 set person to 5 endif endif if (person == 5) if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else DLC02PowerArmorRedshirtREF.setav Variable05 1 DLC02PowerArmorRedshirtREF.evp set timer to .5 set person to 6 set doOnce to 0 endif endif endif
End

scn DLC02PowerArmorFatmanFriedSCRIPT
float animCounter short animInit short animStart short animOnce short shockOnce short unEquipOnce ref mySelf
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
setAV Variable01 0 END
Begin OnStartCombat
if ( getav Variable05 == 2 ) StopCombat endif
End
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if (Getav Health < 100) ResetHealth endif
;////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// the electrocution stuff ;////////////////////////////////////////////// IF animStart == 0 && getSitting == 2 && getDisabled == 0 && animOnce == 0 set animOnce to 1 set animStart to 1 ENDIF
IF animStart == 1 IF animInit == 0 set animCounter to 9.75 set animInit to 1 set mySelf to getSelf
DLC02FriedPowerArmorExplosionA.playgroup Forward 1 DLC02FriedPowerArmorExplosionB.playgroup Forward 1 DLC02FriedPowerArmorExplosionC.playgroup Forward 1
ENDIF
IF animCounter > 9.25 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF animCounter <= 9.25 && animCounter > 8.55 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shockOnce == 0 PMS DLC02pulseShockShader set shockOnce to 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF animCounter <= 8.55 && animCounter > 1.0 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF unEquipOnce == 0 playsound FXMineArcKill unEquipItem DLC02ArmorPowerT51bHelmet 1 1 set unEquipOnce to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF animCounter <= 1.0 && animCounter > 0 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
;// stop the shocktasticness SMS DLC02pulseShockShader
ELSE
;// turn off the explosions DLC02FriedPowerArmorExplosionA.disable DLC02FriedPowerArmorExplosionB.disable DLC02FriedPowerArmorExplosionC.disable
set animStart to 0 setav variable03 1
ENDIF ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
END
Begin OnDeath
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn testPhilFlagSwapSCRIPT
short flagInit short flagSwap float flagCounter short USFlagOn
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF flagSwap == 1
;// make sure to only do it once IF flagInit == 0 set flagInit to 1 set flagCounter to 4 testPhilChineseFlag.pms DLC02DeRezFlagStartShader
ENDIF
;// the countdown to the flag swapping IF flagCounter > 1 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 1 && flagCounter > 0.4 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF USFlagOn == 0 testPhilUSFlag.enable 1 set USFlagOn to 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 0.4 && flagCounter > 0 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF USFlagOn == 1 testPhilUSFlag.pms DLC02DeRezFlagEndShader set USFlagOn to 2
ENDIF
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 0 testPhilChineseFlag.disable
ENDIF
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
set flagSwap to 1
END

scn testPhilFriedSCRIPT
float animCounter short animInit short animStart short animOnce short shockOnce short unEquipOnce ref mySelf
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
setAV Variable01 0 END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// the electrocution stuff ;////////////////////////////////////////////// IF animStart == 0 && getSitting == 2 && getDisabled == 0 && animOnce == 0 set animOnce to 1 set animStart to 1 ENDIF
IF animStart == 1 IF animInit == 0 set animCounter to 9.75 set animInit to 1 set mySelf to getSelf testphilexplosion.playgroup Forward 1
ENDIF
IF animCounter > 8.6 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF animCounter <= 8.6 && animCounter > 8.55 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shockOnce == 0 PMS DLC02pulseShockShader set shockOnce to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF animCounter <= 8.55 && animCounter > 0 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF unEquipOnce == 0 .unEquipItem DLC02ArmorPowerT51bHelmet 1 1 set unEquipOnce to 1 ENDIF
ELSE testPhilExplosion.disable set animStart to 0 setav variable03 1
ENDIF ENDIF
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
END
Begin OnDeath
;-------------REZ ACTOR AWAY FLAG---------- setav variable03 1 ;---------------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End

scn DLC02FlagSwapSCRIPT
;// the flag counters short flagInit float flagCounter short USFlagOn short effectStart
;// 1 = mines ;// 2 = camp short flagSwap
;// the storage refs ref chineseFlag ref americanFlag
;// make sure we do each once short minesOnce short campOnce short lPostOnce short chineseHQOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////// ;// Check to see if any of the flags need to be flipped ;////////////////// IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STMinesDone == 1 && minesOnce == 0 set FlagSwap to 1 set flagInit to 0 set chineseFlag to DLC02ChineseFlagMines set americanFlag to DLC02USFlagMines set minesOnce to 1 set effectStart to 0
ENDIF
IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STCampDone == 1 && campOnce == 0 set FlagSwap to 2 set flagInit to 0 set chineseFlag to DLC02ChineseFlagIceCamp set americanFlag to DLC02USFlagIceCamp set campOnce to 1 set effectStart to 0
ENDIF
IF DLC02StrikeTeam.STListenDone == 1 && lPostOnce == 0 set FlagSwap to 3 set flagInit to 0 set chineseFlag to DLC02ChineseFlagLPost set americanFlag to DLC02USFlagLPost set lPostOnce to 1 set effectStart to 0
ENDIF
IF getStage DLC02OA4 == 40 && chineseHQOnce == 0 set FlagSwap to 4 set flagInit to 0 set chineseFlag to DLC02ChineseFlagChineseHQ set americanFlag to DLC02USFlagChineseHQ set chineseHQOnce to 1 set effectStart to 0 ENDIF
;////////////////// ;// swap out the flags! ;////////////////// IF flagSwap >= 1
;// make sure to only do it once IF flagInit == 0 set flagInit to 1 set flagCounter to 9
ENDIF
;// the countdown to the flag swapping IF flagCounter > 3 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 3 && flagCounter > 1.5 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF effectStart == 0 chineseFlag.pms DLC02DeRezFlagStartShader set effectStart to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 1.5 && flagCounter > 0.4 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF USFlagOn == 0 americanFlag.enable 1 set USFlagOn to 1
ENDIF
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 0.4 && flagCounter > 0 set flagCounter to flagCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF USFlagOn == 1 americanFlag.pms DLC02DeRezFlagEndShader set USFlagOn to 2
ENDIF
ELSEIF flagCounter <= 0 chineseFlag.disable set flagSwap to 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn testPhilElectricSwordBSCRIPT
ref mySelf
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
set mySelf to getSelf
;// check to see if we need to start the multiplier IF DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel == 0 set DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel to 1 set DLC02LD.elecSwordVictimCurrent to mySelf PMS pulseDisableFXShader
;// if someone has been hit before, make sure its us ELSEIF DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel >= 1 && mySelf == DLC02LD.elecSwordVictimCurrent
;// if we've already started damage, do more! IF DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel == 1 set DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel to 2 PMS pulseDisableFXShader mySelf.damageActorValue Health 5
ELSEIF DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel == 2 set DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel to 3 PMS pulseDisableFXShader mySelf.damageActorValue Health 10
ELSEIF DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel == 3 PMS pulseDisableFXShader mySelf.damageActorValue Health 20
ENDIF
;// if someone has been hit, but its not us, keep the count reset the victim! ELSEIF DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel >= 1 && mySelf != DLC02LD.elecSwordVictimCurrent set DLC02LD.elecSwordDamageLevel to 1 set DLC02LD.elecSwordVictimCurrent to mySelf
ENDIF
END

scn DLC02PulseFieldMineSCRIPT
short doExplosion short doTime short distance float timer
Begin GameMode
if (DLC02MinefieldSwitchREF.doOnce == 1 && doTime == 0) set distance to GetDistance DLC02MinefieldSwitchREF set timer to (distance / 1000) set doExplosion to 1 set doTime to 1 endif
if (doExplosion == 1) if (timer > 0) set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else PlaceAtMe DLC02MinePulseExplosion 1 set doExplosion to 0 endif endif
End

if DoOnce == 3 MarkForDelete endif End

scn DLC02ArmorStealthWastelandScript
short ShaderState short ShaderChange short armorEquipped
BEGIN ONLOAD set ShaderState to 0 set ShaderChange to 1 END
BEGIN ONEQUIP set armorEquipped to 1 set shaderState to 0 END
BEGIN ONUNEQUIP PMS DLC02StealthShader player.removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set armorEquipped to 0 END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ShaderState == 1 PMS DLC02StealthShader player.addspell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set ShaderState to -1
ELSEIF ShaderState == 2 PMS DLC02StealthShader player.removespell stealthBoyInvisibilitySpell set ShaderState to 0
ENDIF
;// if the armor is equipped and we are visible, stealth up IF armorEquipped == 1 && player.IsSneaking == 1 && shaderState == 0 set ShaderState to 1
ELSEIF armorEquipped == 1 && player.IsSneaking != 1 && shaderState == -1 set ShaderState to 2
ENDIF
END

scn DLC02NoActivateBaseSCRIPT
;Please remind the team to update their scripts if anything in this script changes
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 ;do nothing else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin GameMode
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
End
Begin OnDeath

End

scn DLC02ChineseHQEndBattleSpawnSCRIPT

endif endif
End

ELSEIF ( SpawnChinese == 2 ) DLC02ChineseHQChineseSpawnXMRK.PlaceAtMe DLC02ChineseHQChineseSoldier 1 set SpawnChinese to 0
ENDIF

ENDIF

scn testPhilExecuteSCRIPT
Float Timer Short DoOnce Short IsPile
float animCounter short animInit short animStart short animOnce short shockOnce short reactOnce ref mySelf
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN ONLOAD
setAV Variable01 0 END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// the electrocution stuff ;////////////////////////////////////////////// IF animStart == 0 && getSitting == 2 && getDisabled == 0 && animOnce == 0 set animOnce to 1 set animStart to 1 ENDIF
IF animStart == 1 IF animInit == 0 set animCounter to 4.5 set animInit to 1 set mySelf to getSelf ENDIF
IF animCounter > 1.6 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
ELSEIF animCounter <= 1.6 && animCounter > 1.35 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF reactOnce == 0 DLC02ChineseHQPrisoner.PlayIdle LooseDLCAnchRestrainedSitGetStabbed testPhilCaptive.PlayIdle LooseDLCAnchRestrainedSitGetStabbed set reactOnce to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF animCounter <= 1.55 && animCounter > 0 set animCounter to animCounter - getSecondsPassed
IF shockOnce == 0 DLC02ChineseHQPrisoner.pms pulseDisableFXShader testPhilCaptive.pms pulseDisableFXShader set shockOnce to 1
ENDIF
ELSE set animStart to 0 DLC02ChineseHQPrisoner.sms pulseDisableFXShader DLC02ChineseHQPrisoner.setAv variable03 1 testPhilCaptive.sms pulseDisableFXShader testPhilCaptive.setAv variable03 1
set DLC02EndBattleTriggerREF.doOnce to 1
; testPhilCaptive.SetCriticalStage DisintegrateStart ; testPhilCaptive.PMS AlienCritGlowFXShader ; testPhilCaptive.PMS effectAlienDisintegration ; Set Timer to 1.8 ; Set DoOnce to 1 ; Set IsPile to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
If DoOnce == 1 If IsPile == 0 If Timer <= 0.5 testPhilCaptive.AttachAshPile testPhilCaptive.sms pulseDisableFXShader Set IsPile to 1 EndIf EndIf
If Timer <= 0 testPhilCaptive.SetCriticalStage DisintegrateEnd testPhilCaptive.SMS AlienCritGlowFXShader testPhilCaptive.SMS effectAlienDisintegration Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed) EndIf
END

scn DLC02ChineseHQEndBattleAmericanSCRIPT
;short doonce short FreezeOnce
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
float deathtimer
;/////////// ;// rand variables ;/////////// short weapChance
BEGIN ONLOAD
;// on load give a random chance to upgrade to a missile launcher, flamer or gauss rifle set weapChance to (1 + (0.1 * getRandomPercent))
;// make sure we're not the first wave IF getIsID DLC02ChineseHQAmericanPowerArmorMelee != 1 && getIsID DLC02ChineseHQAmericanPowerArmorGauss != 1
IF weapChance == 1 addItem DLC02WeapFlamer 1 equipItem DLC02WeapFlamer 1 addItem ammoFlamerFuel 200
ELSEIF weapChance == 5 addItem DLC02WeapMissileLauncher 1 addItem ammoMissile 3
ELSEIF weapChance == 8 || weapChance == 9 || weapChance == 10 addItem DLC02WeapGaussRifle 1 equipItem DLC02WeapGaussRifle 1
ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) ;do nothing else Activate endif
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet ; if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 ; if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ; ;make them Rez in ; set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime ; playSound3D FXRez ; pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects ; set RezIn to 1 ; ; endif ; endif ; ; if ( RezIn== 1 ) ; if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) ; set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) ; else ; sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ; set RezIn to -1 ; endif ; endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;when quest var is set, freeze in place and ghost so player can't interact if ( DLC02OA4.Freeze == 1 ) if ( FreezeOnce == 0 ) SetActorsAI 0 SetGhost 1 set FreezeOnce to 1 endif endif
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;set var on trigger to spawn a replacement soldier Set DLC02EndBattleTriggerREF.SpawnAmerican to 1 ;set DoOnce to 1 set deathtimer to 3
;start the "Rez Away" (see GameMode block) setav variable03 1
END

Begin GameMode
if DLC02FF.FF009Pose >= 1 && DLC02FF.FF009Pose < 3 if DLC02FF.FF009SoldierAPosing == 0 if DLC02FF009SoldierARef.getSitting >= 2 set DLC02FF.FF009SoldierAPosing to 1 endif endif if DLC02FF.FF009SoldierBPosing == 0 if DLC02FF009SoldierBRef.getSitting >= 2 set DLC02FF.FF009SoldierBPosing to 1 endif endif if DLC02FF.FF009SoldierCPosing == 0 if DLC02FF009SoldierCRef.getSitting >= 2 set DLC02FF.FF009SoldierCPosing to 1 endif endif

endif

Begin OnTriggerEnter player
if DLC02FF.FF009Pose == 0 set DLC02FF.FF009Pose to 1 DLC02FF009PhotographerRef.evp
endif
End

ScriptName DLC02ChineseHQDoorScript
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1 == 1 ) DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.Disable elseif ( IsActionRef DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2 == 1 ) DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.Disable elseif ( IsActionRef DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2 == 1 ) DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.Disable elseif ( IsActionRef DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2 == 1 ) DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.Disable elseif ( IsActionRef Player == 1 ) DLC02FatmanTroopEnableMarker.Disable DLC02GeneralJingweiREF.enable Activate else Activate endif
End

scn DLC02CaptiveExecuteSCRIPT
short imRestrained short FreezeOnce
;---------------REZ IN VARIABLES---------------------- ;NOTE: place actor in DLC02RezInFaction if you want him to rez in
;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime
short RezIn float RezInShaderTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------- REZ AWAY VARIABLES-------------- ;GLOBALS ;DLC02RezShaderPlayTime ;DLC02RezDisableTime ;variable03: means "Rez me out now" -- set in dialog and OnDeath block
short RezOut float RezShaderTimer float RezDisableTimer ;----------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( getAV variable01 == 1 ) ;rescued disable else ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load set imRestrained to 0 setRestrained 0 endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; restrain me once I'm in position if ( imRestrained == 0 ) if ( GetSitting == 3 ) set imRestrained to 1 setRestrained 1 endif endif
;--------------------------ESCAPED THE SIMULATION SAFETY CHECK------------------------------------- if getInZone DLC02AnchorageBattleZone == 0 kill moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK endif ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ IN THE ACTOR-------------------------- ;if he is in the faction and has 3D and hasn't rezzed in yet if getInFaction DLC02RezInFaction == 1 if RezIn == 0 && HasLoaded3D == 1 ;make them Rez in set RezInShaderTimer to DLC02RezInShaderPlayTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole ;this shader should be placed on guys who might die, because the other shader breaks NPCs death effects set RezIn to 1
endif endif
if ( RezIn== 1 ) if ( RezInShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezInShaderTimer to ( RezInShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezEnableShaderNoHole set RezIn to -1 endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------REZ AWAY THE ACTOR-------------------- ;because he was dismissed or died.
if ( getav variable03 == 1 ) ;make them Rez away set RezShaderTimer to DLC02RezShaderPlayTime set RezDisableTimer to DLC02RezDisableTime playSound3D FXRez pms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 1 setav variable03 -1
endif
if ( RezOut == 1 ) if ( RezShaderTimer > 0 ) set RezShaderTimer to ( RezShaderTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else sms DLC02DeRezDeathShader set RezOut to 2 endif endif
if (RezOut >= 1) if ( RezDisableTimer> 0 ) set RezDisableTimer to RezDisableTimer - getSecondsPassed else moveTo DLC02CorpseDumpXMRK set RezOut to -1 endif endif
;-----------------------------------------------------------
END
BEGIN ONDEATH IF getIsReference DLC02FF002CaptiveWithIntel == 1 additem DLC02FF002Intel 1 ENDIF
;// the rez out variable setav variable03 1
END
Begin OnActivate
;---------PREVENT LOOTING----------------------------- ;prevent the player from looting dead actor if IsActionRef player == 1 if getDead == 1 ;if I'm dead ;do nothing else ;i'm not dead activate endif else ; it's someone other than the player activating me activate endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
;when quest var is set, freeze in place and ghost so player can't interact if ( DLC02OA4.Freeze == 1 ) if ( FreezeOnce == 0 ) SetActorsAI 0 SetGhost 1 set FreezeOnce to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC02PowerArmorFatmanBoostSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0 && DLC02MinefieldSwitchREF.doOnce == 1 && DLC02FatmanDistanceCheckREF.entered == 0 ) Set DLC02OA4.FatmanEnable to 1 DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.moveto DLC02FatmanBoost01REF DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.moveto DLC02FatmanBoost02REF DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.moveto DLC02FatmanBoost03REF DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.moveto DLC02FatmanBoost04REF DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1.evp DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2.evp DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3.evp DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4.evp set doOnce to 1 endif
End

scn DLC02FatmanDistanceCheckSCRIPT
;If any of the Fatman guys hit this trigger set "entered" to one
short entered
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef4 set entered to 1 End
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef3 set entered to 1 End
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef2 set entered to 1 End
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC02PowerArmorFatmanRef1 set entered to 1 End

scn DLC02StrikeTeamAutoAttackTriggerScript
;used to capture if a strike team member somehow makes it into the "attack area" most likely from helping the player if he gets attacked. ;which if this happens, go ahead and treat it as if the player ordered the attack to happen
ref myActionRef
Begin OnTriggerEnter
set myActionRef to getActionRef
if myActionRef.getInFaction DLC02StrikeTeamFaction == 1
if getIsReference DLC02StrikeTeamAutoAttackTriggerMines == 1 ;which trigger is this? if DLC02StrikeTeam.STMinesDone == 0 ;is the objective not done yet? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 1 ;then set the objective to this one set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack to 1 ;treat it as if the player ordered the attack setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0 ;evp the team endif endif
if getIsReference DLC02StrikeTeamAutoAttackTriggerListen == 1 ;which trigger is this? if DLC02StrikeTeam.STListenDone == 0 ;is the objective not done yet? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 2 ;then set the objective to this one set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack to 1 ;treat it as if the player ordered the attack setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0 ;evp the team endif endif
if getIsReference DLC02StrikeTeamAutoAttackTriggerCamp== 1 ;which trigger is this? if DLC02StrikeTeam.STCampDone == 0 ;is the objective not done yet? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 3 ;then set the objective to this one set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack to 1 ;treat it as if the player ordered the attack setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0 ;evp the team endif endif
if getIsReference DLC02StrikeTeamAutoAttackTriggerChimera == 1 ;which trigger is this? if DLC02StrikeTeam.STChimeraDone == 0 ;is the objective not done yet? set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 4 ;then set the objective to this one set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyAttack to 1 ;treat it as if the player ordered the attack setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0 ;evp the team endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC02ChineseGateTurretNewSCRIPT
short doOnce1 short doOnce2 short doOnce3
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce1 == 0) if (DLC02ChineseBaseGateREF.GetDestructionStage >= 2) placeatme LargeExplosion 1 disable set doOnce1 to 1 endif endif
; if (doOnce2 == 0) ; if (GetDead == 1) ; DLC02ChineseBaseGateREF.do 2500 ; set doOnce2 to 1 ; endif ; endif
End
Begin OnHit Player
if (doOnce3 == 0) setav health 1000 set doOnce3 to 1 endif
End

ScriptName DLC02FailsafeUpdateScript
;in the event that Morrill decides to go into combat, update the quest stage when the player hits this trigger so quest can proceed
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if ( GetStage DLC02OA1 < 15 ) SetStage DLC02OA1 15 DLC02MorrillCage01.Disable endif
End

Military Service #54-05C-9301 Clearance Level Gamma Begin Transmission
Be advised, Chinese field operations in occupied Anchorage in state of flux. Primary field command post appears to have moved from Elemndorf AFB to civilian refinery site, effecting a southward shift in forward line of engagement. Intercepted radio communications suggest failure of Operation Red Harvest and capture of USMC personnel. Continued artillery barrage from Chugach Overlook suggests veracity of this intelligence. High importance, be advised. Eyewitness account of Dragoon units outfitted in previously-unknown infantry armor. This armor appears to be a more recent prototype of the same HG stealth armor captured from enemy infiltrators at the Hoover Sabotage. Presence of Dragoon units suggest that General Jingwei may already have relocated to Anchorage. Stand by for confirmation of report.
ESP.TRADUIT:
军方服务系统 #54-05C-9301 许可等级3 报头
根据情报，在安克雷奇的中国部队行动处在变化之中。地面总指挥部已经从埃勒姆多空军基地迁移到民用精炼厂, 使前线向南移。截获的电台信号证实了红色丰收行动的失败和美国海军陆战队人员被俘。从楚加奇监察哨来的持续炮火遮断证明了情报的真实性。 注意，高度重要。目击报告声称龙骑兵单位装备了从未见过的新型步兵装甲。这种装甲似乎是在“胡佛动乱”中缴获的HG潜行装甲的最新样品。龙骑兵单位的出现说明精卫将军可能已经抵达安克雷奇。静候确认。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1.1c: Atmospheric Counter-Espionage Action
In compliance with Legislative Act 21-0 of 2072, Overlook AFS has been supplied with atmospheric scatter payloads.
This payload is primed and loaded identically to regular ballistic ammunition, but must be fired in strict accordance with directives provided by the ranking Intel Officer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.1c: 气象台-间谍活动
遵照2072年的21-0号法案，已向监察哨美国战地服务团提供大气驱散载荷。
这种载荷已装雷管，使用标准炸药，但开火时必须严格依照高级情报长官的指令。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1.1b: Diversionary tactics in Martial Evacuation
In the event of a military evacuation of the City of Anchorage, Overlook AFS personnel may be called upon to discharge flares. Primary flare function will be to relay short-wave radio messages in the event of wide-scale comm failure.
Flares may be used to simulate hostile exchanges only under direct order of Elemndorf AFB Commanding Officer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.1b: 军事撤退中的牵制战术
假使安克雷奇市采取军事撤退，可召集监察哨美国战地服务团的人员释放信号弹，信号弹的主要功能是在发生大规模通讯故障时转发短波电台信号。
信号弹可用于冒充敌方通讯，但必须有埃勒姆多空军基地指挥官的直接命令。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1.1a: Cooperative Action w/regional NORAD site
In the event of NORAD deployment or training exercises from Fire Island AFS, personnel will be called upon to enact Cooperative protocol routines as dictated by joint-operations Commanding Officer installed at Elemndorf AFB.
The primary function of long-range artillery in the event of a inter-continental ballistic strike is to provide localized fire support against hostile targets on potential intercept courses.
In a live-fire deployment situation, Executive Branch compliance is implied, and the AFS Commanding Officer has authorization to fire upon civilian transports refusing to provide ample identification upon first contact.
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.1a: 与北美防空司令部当地机构联合行动
一旦北美防空司令部从火岛美国战地服务团开始部署或训练演习，据就职于埃勒姆多空军基地的联合作战指挥官口述将召集人员拟定协作草案程序。
在洲际导弹攻击的过程中远程火炮的基本功能是提供局部火力支援以防止敌方目标潜在的拦截可能性。
在实弹部署时，行政部门默许，美国战地服务团的指挥官有权向在首次通讯中拒绝提供充分身份证明的民用运输工具开火。
已解码的中国军队通讯信息

ESP.ORIGINAL:
...//Begin Transcription//... 34UJCNM requisition papers have been submitted for anti-air surveillance and defense systems. To make security of Eastern cliffs, I have submitted papers third time to field command. 39KJKLm18*(.
Making all due respect, honorable Dragoons mission that took *CH3 facility in our 2AN3! attacks made use of Eastern cliffs. KJ(*D12..++ DFK989KK. Leaving this non-defensible is dangerous, as American attackers could make same use of Eastern cliffs. Further patrols are posted, but we outpost remain vulnerable to airborne drop tactics. 3KLJDR8-tek systems of surveillance and defense can help ensure against such vulnerable (state of being).
398KDI consider this request, sir. Re9*k of Chinese Republic.
...//End Transcription//...
ESP.TRADUIT:
...//翻译开始//... 34UJCNM 需求文件已提交至反空中监察和防卫系统。为保东部山崖安全，我已向野指三次提交报告。39KJKLm18*(.
恕我直言，光荣的龙骑兵利用东部山崖占领我们 2AN3! 区内 *CH3 设施的任务。 KJ(*D12..++ DFK989KK. 令此地缺乏防御极度危险，因为美方攻击部队同样可以利用东部山崖。已增派巡逻队，但我方前哨仍受空降威胁。 3KLJDR8-监视和防卫技术系统可协助加强（目前的）脆弱状况。
398KDI 请酌此项要求，长官。中华共和国 Re9*k
...//翻译结束//...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Entry 0527
Sim version 7-36-081 was scrapped last week after Chase ran through it himself. Said it didn't "feel right." It was eventually determined he was referring to hardware issues, not anything to do with the software.
Techs have been making modifications on the chair, but some ongoing issues remain problematic. Requests to administration to provide detailed schematics and hardware history have been neglected. Questions about the particular external interface requirements remain unanswered. Techs will attempt to compensate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记录 0527
上周，蔡斯亲自运行7-36-081版本的模拟程序后，这个版本被放弃了。他说“感觉不对”。最后发现他所说的是硬件问题，和软件没有关系。
技术人员们正在调整那只椅子，但是还是有一些问题。提供详细设计图和硬件历史的要求被上级忽略了。关于特定外部接口的要求的问题还是没有回答。技术人员将会继续尝试。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Entry 0540
Sim back up and running after another few days of changes. Chase is running everyone ragged, making tweaks here and there. The sim is, without any shadow of a doubt, divorced from reality. I've never seen the classified military reports, but some of the stuff Chase has added to the sim? There's no way it happened like that. Version 7-36-099 was scrapped after Chase decided his face didn't look just right. I realize progress reports aren't the place for this, but there are concerns that the man is losing it. No one confronts him because everyone is scared. After West-Tek dropped off the grid, there were lots of rumors about the military commandeering private contractors, and no one wants to give Chase a reason to do that here. But really, what's the point in running this sim over and over and over? Any tactical data was mined months ago.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记录 0540
模拟程序在又修改了几天之后，做好了备份开始运行。蔡斯让大家到处修改，每个人都十分疲惫了。 这个模拟程序毫无疑问的和现实非常不同。虽然我从来没读过机密的军方报告，但是蔡斯在模拟程序里加的一些东西是不可能发生的。 7-36-099版本程序被放弃了，因为蔡斯说他的脸在程序中看起来有些不对劲。我知道进度报告里不应该写这些，但是有人认为蔡斯快疯了。没人敢面对他，因为每个人都很害怕。在West-Tek销声匿迹以后，出现了不少军方将会强制征用其他私人承包公司的传言，谁也不想让蔡斯有借口对我们下手。但是，究竟为什么一遍又一遍地运行模拟程序呢？所有的战术信息几个月以前就采集完了。
