ESP.ORIGINAL: You've saved us. Sibley would've had the upper hand if you hadn't been here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你救了我们。如果你没来，西布利就赢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_greeting_0000c505_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be here for a while, cataloging all the tech. If you need anything, you come see us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们过会就到这里，对所有的科技进行分类。如果你有需要就来找我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_greeting_0000c505_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may not be one of us, but you're the next best thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你不是我们的一员，但你对我们很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_greeting_0000c505_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for helping. Sibley would've gotten the best of me if you weren't here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你的帮助。如果你没来西布利就击败我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_greeting_0000c506_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a damn shame about Olin, but she died well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们失去奥林真他妈的可惜，但她死得很安详。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_greeting_0000c506_2.ogg

NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oafin_greeting_0000c076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been an honor working with you. I don't think I've ever seen bravery like that on any battlefield.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你并肩作战是我的荣幸。我在任何战场上都没见过像你这么勇敢的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000cb96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully, after we mop up the mess in Anchorage, we can get together and have a couple of beers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望在安克雷奇行动结束后，我们可以聚聚，喝上一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000cb96_2.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000cb96_3.ogg
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage!
NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage!

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that's left is General Jingwei. We take him out, and we've won Anchorage. Let's do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就剩下精卫将军了。我们干掉他，安克雷奇行动就大获全胜了。我们出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000cb99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it! Throw that switch and we can send in the T-51b's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了！扔出那个开关我们就可以派出T-51b部队了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000cb9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now it's just you and me. Let's go take down the Pulse Field!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，现在只有你和我了。让我们去拿下脉冲场吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000cb9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get in there and finish this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们前进，打赢这场仗吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Power Armored Soldier [07004AB4] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000be27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll get this place opened up in no time! Stand back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们马上就要解放这块地区了！退后点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Power Armored Soldier [07004AB4] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000be28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything okay? Nothing's changed out here, so you can't be done...
ESP.TRADUIT: 进展如何？局面还没有改观，你还不能放弃…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa4_greeting_00002f45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fool! You will be crushed by the might of the Chinese Army!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这蠢货！你会被中国军队打成蜂窝的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malechinese1\dlc02oa4_greeting_00002979_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, take whatever you like. I never break my promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请便，想要什么就拿什么。我会遵守诺言的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa4_greeting_00002231_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's get this door open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们来打开这扇门吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000c504_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should be able to access the restricted areas now. Let's hope it's been worth all this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在可以进入禁区了。希望我们不虚此行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000767d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job making it through that simulation. All you have to do now is open the Armory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能通过模拟，干得好。现在你要做的就是打开军火库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000767e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, as agreed, you get your share. Feel free to take whatever you want. If our records are right, there's plenty for all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，根据我们的协议，你将得到你应得的报酬。想要什么就拿什么吧。如果我们的记录没错的话，里面的东西够我们所有人的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000767e_2.ogg

NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_greeting_00002232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've hit the targets, now the only thing left is the refinery. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你击中了目标，现在只剩下精炼厂了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000bd87_1.ogg

NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000766f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The objective's in sight, soldier! Your place is out there on the field!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看见目标了，士兵！前进吧，士兵，你属于那片战场！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000bd88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There better be somethin' good behind that door...
ESP.TRADUIT: 门后面最好有些好东西…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000ba02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what are you waiting for? Let's get this door open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你们还在等什么？我们来打开这扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa4_greeting_0000ba03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack on the Mining Town is in progress, sir. I'll give you a new update when the objective is complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前正在进攻矿镇，长官。当任务完成后我会向你报告最新战况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007204_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mining Town is crawling with Commie forces, sir. We're holding up here for the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中共盘踞在矿镇，长官。目前我们正守在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007205_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007205_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mining Town is now secured, sir. Awaiting your new orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在矿镇已被攻克，长官。我们正等待你的最新指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007206_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attacking the Listening Post as ordered, sir. I'll give you a new update when the objective is complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按计划进攻监听站，长官。当任务完成后我会向你报告最新进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_0000741c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Listening Post is up ahead, sir. I can smell the Reds from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 监听站就在前面，长官。我在这里都能感觉到红军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_0000741d_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_0000741d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listening Post secured, sir. Awaiting new orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们占领了监听站，长官。等待新的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_0000741e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attacking the Ice Camp as ordered, sir. I'll update you once the objective is completed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按计划进攻冰雪营地，长官。当任务完成后我会向你报告最新进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007207_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ice Camp's right around the bend, sir. We're holding up here for the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绕过那道弯就到冰雪营地了，长官。目前我们正守在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007208_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007208_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ice Camp secured, sir. Awaiting further orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们占领了冰雪营地，长官。等待新的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007209_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your orders for the Strike Team, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请向突击组下命令，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_greeting_0000720a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on my way out, sir.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Faction : Strike Team Faction Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest Comment (NAM2) : a relieved soldier on his way back to HQ EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02striketeam_greeting_0000bd73_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Faction : Strike Team Faction Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest Comment (NAM2) : order signaling he is ready to receive his assignment EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02striketeam_greeting_00007555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sergeant wants to speak with you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Faction : Strike Team Faction Quest : ([0700BA28]DLC02StrikeTeamOff) DLC02StrikeTeamOff EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02strik_greeting_0000ba26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sergeant Montgomery wants to talk to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蒙哥马利中士想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Faction : Strike Team Faction Quest : ([0700BA28]DLC02StrikeTeamOff) DLC02StrikeTeamOff EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02strik_greeting_0000ba27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, thank you for responding to our distress call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，感谢你回应我们的求救信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_00005026_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, follow me. I'll take you to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟着我。我会带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_00005026_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the backup? Great. Just great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来帮忙的？太好了，真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, follow me. I'll take you to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟着我。我会带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c392_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the backup? Great. Just great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来帮忙的？太好了，真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000bf5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, follow me. I'll take you to Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟着我。我会带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000bf5f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, come this way. And be careful what you touch - some of this equipment is rather delicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请走这边。请小心你碰到的东西 — 这些装备都是很精密的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : grudgingly deferential EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_000056d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you. Keep your weapons holstered, your hands to yourself, and your mouth shut. Follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，把你的武器收好，放规矩点，闭上嘴。跟我来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you, and what do you think you're doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁，来这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_000056d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here to help? Fine, then put this on, get in the chair, and we'll run the simulation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来帮忙的？好，那穿上这个，坐在那椅子上，我们来运行模拟程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_00004381_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got the suit, so put it on and get in the simulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有套装了，快穿上，然后坐到模拟器里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000bd86_1.ogg

NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this thing is some kind of training sim, near as we can figure. Guess you can tell us more when you come out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来这东西是种高真实度的模拟训练装备。我想你出来后会告诉我们你的感受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_00002eee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, let's move it. I ain't got all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点啊。我可没那么多时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_000056d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You getting in there, or what?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_00004382_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. I'll show you to the command room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点。我会带你去指挥室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_greeting_000039ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one Morrill sent down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你就是莫里尔派来的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000a79f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except you're not one of us, are you? I'll have to have a little chat with Morrill about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是我们中的一员吧？我得去和莫里尔谈下这事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000a79f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you do have that computer there on your wrist. Hmph. I can see now that Morrill made the right call. Maybe you can be useful after all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…你的手腕上确实有个电脑。现在我想莫里尔的决定是对的。说不定你会对我们有用…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000a79f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one Morrill sent down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你就是莫里尔派来的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c4bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be perfectly honest -- I'd trust a Wastelander to shine my Power Armor, and even that's pushing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是很诚实正派的 — 我相信一个废土客可以帮我擦亮动力装甲，即使是勉强的也没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c4bd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you do have that computer there on your wrist. Hmph. I can see now that Morrill made the right call. Maybe you can be useful after all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…你的手腕上确实有个电脑。现在我想莫里尔的决定是对的。说不定你会对我们有用…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c4bd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, Wastelander. I'm not sure what brings you here, but we don't like surprise visits from the local populace. You're lucky you weren't killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，废土客。我不大清楚你为什么来这里，但我们不喜欢当地平民擅闯此地。你没被打死算是走运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_000026f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... Maybe there's more to you than the average rubble dweller, hmm? That computer there on your wrist...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…也许你会比那些呆头呆脑的平民好一点吧？看你手腕上戴的电脑…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_000026f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you can be useful to us after all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说不定你会对我们有用呢…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_000026f7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a pre-war research facility. There's technology to be had, and I am determined to have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一座战前的研究设施。里面有种科技，我决心要得到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, it's locked up tight. As far as we can tell, it's linked into some kind of simulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，它被牢牢锁上了。据我们所知，它被连接在某种模拟器上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we can't access the simulator, because we lack the proper interface. Your little computer there is exactly what we're looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能进入模拟器，因为我们缺少适当的操作界面。你那件小电脑正是我们要找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I'll make you a deal. You access the simulator and get us into the rest of this base, and I'll give you a cut of what we find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们来做个交易。你进入模拟器，带我们进入这个基地，我就把找到的东西分一份给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Payment for Services Rendered." You help us, and we'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: “交易达成。”你帮了我们，我们也会帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've said my piece. If you're interested in assisting, follow Sibley to the simulation pod. Olin will help get you jacked into the sim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说完了。如果你有兴趣帮忙的话，跟西布利去模拟舱。奥林会帮你进入模拟程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c3e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one Morrill sent down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说来你就是莫里尔派来的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you've got half a brain in that head. You could be useful to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要这么心不在焉。你可能对我们有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head inside, soldier. Report to McGraw and then get back out here to help us fortify these defenses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去吧，士兵。去向麦格劳报到，再回来这里帮助我们加强防御工事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000036ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protector McGraw's inside, Sir, like I said. You'll want to speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过了，护卫麦格劳在里面，先生。你得和他谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000036bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protector McGraw's inside, Ma'am, like I said. You'll want to speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过了，护卫麦格劳在里面，女士。你得和他谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000036bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work out there, soldier. Thanks for the back-up, but where's the rest of your detachment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮，士兵。谢谢你支援我，但你的其他队员哪去了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head on into the base and talk to McGraw. I'll let him know you're coming. Don't worry, they won't shoot you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进基地去和麦格劳谈谈。我会告诉他你来了。别担心，他们不会向你开枪的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_00002d88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you have been any more useless out there? You don't deserve to wear that armor after that display! Explain yourself, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那边没事干吗？从你之前的表现来看，你还不够资格穿那件装甲！好好解释一下，士兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000189f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now who the hell are you, and what do you think you're doing wearing that armor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你到底是谁，还有为什么穿着那件装甲？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000023d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me one good reason why I shouldn't put you down right now, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个不杀你的理由，外来人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000023d2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think for one second I didn't see what you're wearing. If you hadn't actually helped out here, I'd have put you down along with these mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别以为我看不出你这身打扮是做什么的。如果你在这里碍手碍脚的，我就把你的尸体堆在变种人的上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000023d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got about three seconds to explain yourself, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有3秒钟时间解释一下在做什么，外来人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000023d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right local, mind explaining what you're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，本地人，解释一下你在这里做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_000023d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damned guard detail! That sounded like a good ruckus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的防卫细节！听起来像一堆废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Soldier addressing comrade EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c3a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go ahead and stop right there. Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以向前走，在那里停下。你到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Guarding a door. Gruff. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c3a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? You headed down or not?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Guarding a door. Gruff. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c3a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little busy right now!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_greeting_00002230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morrill will explain at the base. Focus on those mutants for now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫里尔会在基地向你解释。现在集中精神对付那些变种人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c512_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick with us until we make it through to the base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我们一起去基地！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c513_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take that elevator and report in to Defender Sibley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐电梯去向守卫西布利报到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c514_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Defender Sibley's going to want to talk with you. Take that elevator down into the base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想守卫西布利要和你谈谈。坐电梯到基地中去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c515_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defender Morrill's going to want to talk with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 守卫莫里尔想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_greeting_0000c516_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stow the chit-chat and let's take out those guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，我们去除掉那些机枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000020d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your eyes peeled for Commies. They're around, I can smell 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心中共。他们就在附近，我能感觉到他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000020d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this, a break? Keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是干嘛，想休息？继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000020d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn this place is swarming with Reds. I almost didn't make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这周围到处都是红军。我差点没命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000020d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have time for this... just get inside the base and meet me at the rendezvous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没时间了…进入那基地，在约定地点与我见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000018c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time for talk. Get inside that base and meet me at the rendezvous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间谈了。进入那基地，在约定地点与我见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000018c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll meet you at the rendezvous. Now go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在约定地点与你见面。现在去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_greeting_000018c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn fine work you did taking out those guns. Damn fine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你除掉那些机枪真是太他妈的好了！真他妈的好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_greeting_00002229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The General is waiting to speak to you... and he hates waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军正等着你和说话…而且…他不喜欢久等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa2_greeting_000022d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop gawking at me and get going, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻看着我，去干活吧，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000222a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lieutenant Morgan will give you all the details. Carry on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摩根中尉会告诉你所有细节。去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000222b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a job to do, soldier. Now hop to it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有活要干了，士兵。快去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000222c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you're in charge of Patterson's Suicide Squad, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么…你是帕特森敢死队的头头，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_greeting_000022d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem DLC02RecruitmentMarker 5 Player.AddItem DLC02Charges 2 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC02OA3 15 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA3 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA3 30 1
So... what can the Intelligence Corps do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么…有什么需要情报部队效劳的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_greeting_000022d4_1.ogg
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000443c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope the operation is going well.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000443d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd get over to the map and listen to the General's briefing if I were you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我是你，我会去仔细查看一下地图，还有听一下将军的作战指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_greeting_00004431_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should be the last of them, and the last of the bombing runs on our guys, thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那应该就是最后一个敌军了，我们不用再担心敌人的炸弹了，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000b4e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to order our men back to the Field H.Q. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算命令我们的部下回到总部阵地。在那里见面吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000b4e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: imod DLC02PlayerRezInISFX set DLC02OA3.MoveTimer to 3 set DLC02OA3.OA3MoveDelay to 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3SayDoneListen to 2
Nice work. They've been rolling those Chimeras all over us for months... good to see 'em out of commission for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。这几个月来他们一直用奇美拉坦克攻击我们…很开心能看到它们消停一会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000b645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to order the Strike Team back to the Field H.Q. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算命令突击组回到总部阵地。在那里见面吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000b645_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: imod DLC02PlayerRezInISFX set DLC02OA3.MoveTimer to 3 set DLC02OA3.OA3MoveDelay to 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3SayDoneChimera to 2
Well, looks like we're working together again, sir. General Chase assigned me to the Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看来我们又要并肩作战了，长官。蔡斯将军把我编进突击组。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000301b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And thanks to your promotion, I guess I'll be saluting you from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还升官了嘛，我想从现在想我得向你敬礼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000301b_2.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_greeting_0000301c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, soldier. Everyone back home's rooting for you. Who knows, maybe your mug will end up on the front page of the Capital Post!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，士兵。在家乡的每一位同胞都支持你。说不定你的肖像会上《首都邮报》的头版呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_greeting_0000c17e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, G.I. We're all counting on you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，大兵。我们全靠你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_greeting_0000c17f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations on making it to the HQ. It's pretty fierce out there. Here's your chem ration. I'm doctor Adami. Come see me if you need patching up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你安全回到总部。外面战况很激烈啊。给你药品配给。我是奥达米医生。如果还需要包扎就回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_greeting_0000c180_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you're not dead. That's good. Hold still while I patch you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你还没死。很好。别动，我给你包扎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_greeting_0000c181_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back again? Well, I'm glad you came in on your own, and not in a body bag. Now be still while I fix you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又回来了？啊，很高兴你是自己走回来的的，而不是躺在尸体袋被运回来的。现在不要动，我来给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_greeting_0000c182_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get you up to 100% , shall we? Uncle Sam needs you back in the fight! Hold still a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们来治好你，好吗？山姆大叔需要你回到战斗中去！坚持一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : treating a patient in a hospital ward EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_greeting_0000c183_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Look, I've got to get back to HQ. I Found some papers before I got caught. Good hunting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。听着，我得回到总部去。在我被抓之前我找到一些文件。祝你杀敌愉快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued.. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ece_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn Commies caught me with my pants down. Don't tell anyone you found me like this, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的中共在我睡觉的时候抓住了我。可别告诉别人你是这样找到我的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ecd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They took us by surprise. I was the lucky one. Thanks for the rescue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们出奇不意地抓住了我们。我比较走运。感谢你们救了我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ecf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank God! I thought I was a goner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢上帝！我还以为我没命了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ed0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I glad to see you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ed1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again! I'm out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢！我先离开这里了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ed2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really have time to stand here and chat? We've got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真有时间站在这聊天？我们还有工作要做呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ed3_1.ogg

NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : POW getting rescued EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_greeting_00003ed4_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么值得报告的，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Faction : DLC02GreetingForceGoodbyeFaction Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_greeting_0000be2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Commies don't stand a chance, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些中共没机会赢，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Faction : DLC02GreetingForceGoodbyeFaction Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_greeting_0000be2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll crush the Commies soon, won't we, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很快就要消灭中共了，对吧，长官？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Faction : DLC02GreetingForceGoodbyeFaction Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_greeting_0000be2d_1.ogg

NPC : American Soldier [07003ED7] (mod) Faction : DLC02GreetingForceGoodbyeFaction Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : greeting a superior officer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_greeting_0000be2e_1.ogg

NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_00002f1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back for a loadout change?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_0000bce1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, that gear's property of Uncle Sam. Hope you didn't get it dinged up too badly...
ESP.TRADUIT: 记往，那件装备是山姆大叔的财产。希望你别弄坏了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_0000bce2_1.ogg

NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_0000bce3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not turning over anything to you until I have that Requisition Holo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你给我装备申请表，否则我不会给你任何东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_00002f1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to get a Requisition Holo before I can hand out gear -- you should know that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得出示装备申请表我才能发放装备 — 你应该知道的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_00002f1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no Requisition Holo, no gear. This ain't a library.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，没有装备申请表就没有装备。这里不是图书馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_greeting_00002f1e_1.ogg

Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_greeting_00008297_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carry on. I've got this in hand.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_greeting_0000c38f_1.ogg

Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : a little testy, but respectful EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_greeting_0000c390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're here to help, then help. If not... back off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你来帮忙那就埋头帮忙。否则…就给我滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_greeting_0000c391_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you didn't notice, I'm busy. Get lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没看到我在忙吗。走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_greeting_00008298_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find someone else to bother, local.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_greeting_00008299_1.ogg

NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa4_hello_0000c4d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old games are no match for us Outcasts, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老把戏难不倒我们放逐者，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa4_hello_0000c4d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did us proud in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那所做的让我们感到骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa4_hello_0000c4d5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 就本地人而言，你做得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa4_hello_0000c4d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never would have thought a savage could do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从没想过一个野蛮人可以做到这个地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa4_hello_0000c4d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Just what we need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了。这正是我们需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, annoyed. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_hello_00004aac_1.ogg
Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_hello_00004aad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey... hey! Wake up. Come on... snap out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂…喂！醒醒。打起精神来…振作一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_hello_000018bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The General is very anxious to speak with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军正迫不及待的要跟你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa2_hello_0000bf57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lieutenant Thomas Morgan, Intelligence and Logistics at your service. I point, you shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是托马斯·摩根中尉，负责情报和后勤，乐意为你效劳。我为你提供敌人的情报，而你去消灭他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009bdc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next stop, Chinese H.Q. Keep it going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站就是中国军队的总部。继续前进！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009bdd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just got the confirmation that the Listening Post is ours. Now that's what I'm talking about!
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚刚得到证实，监听站已经被我们占领了。这才像话嘛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009bde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radar confirms that the Chinese Bombers are flying in circles now that we have the Listening Post. Nice one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷达证实中国轰炸机正在空中回旋，我们拿下了监听哨。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009bdf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boom! Scratch one Chimera Depot. Nice work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 砰！拿下了一个奇美拉维修站。干得漂亮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009be0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work on the Chimera fuel tanks. Half of their division is dead in the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇美拉维修站燃料罐那战打得好。敌人有将近半个师的兵力都淹死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009be1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest of the Operation should make the Artillery Guns feel like a walk in the park.
ESP.TRADUIT: 剩下的行动应该能让炮兵部队自由发挥了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009be2_1.ogg
NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009be3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else that I&L can help with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么需要I&L帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_hello_00009be4_1.ogg

NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor to patient who wandered in EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_hello_0000c184_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a job you're doing soldier. America's watching. I'm making sure of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干得真他妈太棒了。我敢肯定整个美国都在看着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_hello_0000c185_1.ogg

NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Faction : DLC02FFSaluteHelloFaction Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : soldier saluting EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malechinese1\dlc02ff_hello_00003486_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The U.S. Army needs more soldiers like you. Carry on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国陆军需要像你这样的士兵。加油。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's wrap this thing up, soldier. We're cold, we're tired and we want our goddamn oil back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来把这个包起来吧，士兵。我们现在饿寒交迫，一定要把我们该死的原油抢回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Chinese Communists are stomping all over us. Time for us to pay them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的共军的铁蹄一直在我们周围践踏。是时候算总账了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time to show those Red bastards what the U.S. Army is all about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候让那些杂种共军尝尝美军的厉害了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those targets can't secure themselves. You've got a job to do, soldier... now snap to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些目标很容易搞定。你有活干了，士兵…现在去干掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing a man's job, soldier. Keep it up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在做一件男人的工作，士兵。坚持下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf55_1.ogg

NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000bf56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any word from Washington on my latest request?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上一次向华盛顿的求援有回复了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000c04a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's our boys in the suits doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的士兵们情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000c04b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we looking at for losses if we pull this off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要取得胜利得付出多大的代价？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voices_hello_0000c04c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think I recognize your unit. Must be a new convert from old man Lyons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别以为我不知道你哪来的。肯定是刚从里昂斯老头那边投靠过来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're here to help, fine. Otherwise, out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是来帮忙的，那就好。否则给我滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_hello_0000c318_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't you be huddling in a cave somewhere?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是应该躲在某个洞里？

ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，又来一个本地人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02convoutcast_hello_0000c31b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance, mutt. No knowing what you've got breeding on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点，混球。和你没什么好说的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey... Um... Ah, nevermind... It's nothing...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to talk to you... Two minutes of your time, that's all I'm asking...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得和你谈谈…只用两分钟就行，求你了…

ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来…你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_0000360f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This waiting is killing me. I just want get out there, get it over with. How 'bout you -- doin' all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐在这干等真是烦死人了。我只想离开这里解决这一切。你呢 — 没什么问题吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_00003611_1.ogg
Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_00003612_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, the adrenaline is giving me the shakes. How you holdin' up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，肾上腺素正让我发抖呢。你怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_00003613_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you be so relaxed? Before the day is out, we'll be fighting for our lives. You do realize that... right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么可以这么放松？过一会儿就要拼命了。你应该意识到了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_00003614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at you, all calm, cool and collected. Doesn't the fact that we're surrounded by Chinese troops make you even a little bit anxious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，既沉着又冷静。我们被中国军队包围了，难道你一点都不紧张吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_00003615_1.ogg

Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System Comment (NAM2) : greeting an officer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_hello_0000c61f_1.ogg

NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oafin_goodbye_0000c073_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_goodbye_0000720b_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02striketeam_goodbye_0000720c_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Faction : Strike Team Faction Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02striketeam_goodbye_00007554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember that your Strike Team members got families too you know. Let's send 'em home alive instead of in a pine box, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 记着，你的突击组队员也有家人。我们要让他们自己走回家，而不是装进棺材被运回去，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_goodbye_00009bd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stock up on ammo at the Quartermaster's tent. You're gonna need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去军需官那里要足够的弹药。你会需要它们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_goodbye_00009bd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take out some of those Commies for Patterson and all the other guys we lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了帕特森和所有死去的同胞们，冲啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_goodbye_00009bd9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 红军死总好过你们死，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_goodbye_00009bda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You watch yourself out there... the Chinese Army is one of the best fighting forces on Earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多加保重…中国军队是世界上最骁勇善战的军队之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_goodbye_00009bdb_1.ogg

NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_goodbye_0000bf6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Affirmative, sir. I'll inform them of your, ummm, displeasure at their progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命，长官。我会向他们转告的…嗯…关于你对于进展的不满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02voices_goodbye_0000c04d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely sir. I'll make sure they're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我会确保他们都准备充分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02voices_goodbye_0000c04e_1.ogg

NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02voices_goodbye_0000c04f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm sorry if I upset you. Okay? I'll just... get back to my duties now. No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么着，如果我惹着你了，那很抱歉。行么？我现在…要回去工作了。没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dc9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that was a waste of time...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dca_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dcb_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dcc_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dcd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. I'm going. But I'm right. You know I'm right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我走了。不过我没事。你知道我没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pfft. All right. I'll leave you alone, so you can pretend everything is fine. But you're kidding yourself, you know that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啐。好吧。我不打扰你了，你可以认为一切都很好。但这纯粹是自己哄自己，你心里有数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right. Forget I said anything.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dd1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, okay, I'm sorry. I was just... kidding...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，好吧，对不起。我只是…开个玩笑…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convoutcast_goodbye_00002dd2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, now you're just babblin'. I'll talk to ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，不知道你在胡说些什么。再说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_goodbye_00003622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We live through this, and you're buying the beers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们靠这个谋生，而你只是玩票的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_goodbye_00003625_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like talking to a child sometimes, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时真像是对牛弹琴，你懂不懂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convsoldier_goodbye_00003626_1.ogg

This is a high priority message, back-up is needed at our location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是紧急信息，我们这里需要支援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) NPC : Outcast Distress Signal [070013FD] (mod) Quest : ([070013FA]DLC02RadioOutcast) Outcast Distress Call EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02radio_dlc02radiooutca_000013f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe later. I just remembered I have somewhere else to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许晚些吧。我只记得我该去哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, local. I'm trying to be reasonable with you. Don't make me reconsider that decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，本地人。我在和你讲道理。别逼我改变主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawno_00001895_1.ogg

NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawno_00001895_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Sibley will take you to the simulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。西布利会带你去模拟器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawyes_00001898_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can it, soldier! Who's in charge of this mess? I want his head on a platter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在干什么，士兵！谁负责这里的，这里看上去一团糟！我想把他脑袋放在盘子里！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, that'd be Protector McGraw... Sir. He's... he's inside. Go ahead in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，去找护卫麦格劳…先生。他…他在里面。进去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillgreet_0000189b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, that'd be Protector McGraw... Ma'am. He's... he's inside. Go ahead in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，去找护卫麦格劳…女士。他…他在里面。进去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillgreet_000036b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, the rest of the guys should be here any second now. <Lie>
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，其余的家伙应该会火速赶到这儿。<撒谎>

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, we'll probably need their help. Mutants'll be back before long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们可能需要他们的帮助。变种人很快就会回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillgreet_00001897_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get inside and check in with Protector McGraw. He's running the operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去和护卫麦格劳谈谈。他负责这个行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillgreet_00001897_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC02OA1 20 set DLC02OA1.MorrillFooled to 1 set DLC02OA1.MorrillClear to 1
I'm not one of your soldiers. I just like wearing your armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是你的士兵。我只是喜欢穿你们的装甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Just who the hell are you, some local? You got a death wish, walking around in our...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你他妈是谁啊，什么本地人？你活得不耐烦了，胆敢在我们这里闲逛…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillgreet_00001896_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a second... that computer on your wrist. You're from a damned Vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下…你手腕上戴着一个小电脑。你是从该死的避难所里出来的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillgreet_00001896_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Artillery Site? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 炮兵基地？你在说些什么啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly are we up against here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这里要对付的是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Artillery Site? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 炮兵基地？你在说些什么啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's lock and load.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，大干一场吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I have no idea where we are or what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我根本不知道我们现在的位置，也不知道发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, the... fall threw me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，这个…瀑布把我丢下来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, alright. Just give me a second to clear my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给我一点时间来整理一下思路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fine, don't worry about it. So, what's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好，不用担心。我们的计划是什么？
等等…怎么回事？这里到底发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah. See if you can keep up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，看你能不能坚持下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sweat. You're on point, rookie.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA2.OA2MontgomeryFollows to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC02OA2 20 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA2 30 1 DLC02CaveTriggerEffect02REF.disable DLC02CaveTriggerDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1
Hang on a second. Do you have any spare ammo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍等一下，你有没有多余的弹药给我一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can spare a few rounds.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem Ammo556mm 50 Player.AddItem Ammo10mm 60 Player.AddItem AmmoMicroFusionCell 10
And I'm supposed to kill the Chinese with what? Snowballs? Sorry, that's all I can give ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我用什么东西杀中共？雪球？对不起，我只能给你那么多。
