ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not enough ammo. You got any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这点弹药不够，你有多余的吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA2.OA2MontgomeryFollows to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC02OA2 20 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA2 30 1 DLC02CaveTriggerEffect02REF.disable DLC02CaveTriggerDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1
What took you so damn long?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么花了这么长时间？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah. Don't break your arm patting yourself on the back, rookie. You took the easy way in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯。别沾沾自喜了，菜鸟。你来那条路容易得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's the situation? We clear to blow the hell out of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，情况如何？我们可以炸平这地方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's cut the chatter... we've got some guns to destroy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废话少说…我们得赶紧摧毁大炮。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's the situation? We clear to blow the hell out of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，情况如何？我们可以炸平这地方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020d0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see you made it in one piece.
Yeah, I almost bought it out on the cliffs. Didn't know the Reds were so handy with a Sniper Rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我在悬崖上差点挂了。没料到红军的狙击枪使得这么好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's the situation? We clear to blow the hell out of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，情况如何？我们可以炸平这地方了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2montgomer_000020cb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure I'm ready, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我还没准备好，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you'd better be, soldier. We're running short on time and that was NOT an offer, that was an order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好快做准备，士兵。时间不够了，而且这由不得你，这是命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have three hardened targets we need your team to handle otherwise Operation Anchorage will be dead in the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要你的小队去消灭3个顽固的目标，否则安克雷奇行动将会失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002225_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me over to the situation map and I'll bring you up to speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，看看当前的局势图，我会详细讲解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002225_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 给我的命令是什么，长官？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are three hardened targets that stand between us and the Chinese Headquarters. That's where your Strike Team comes in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们与中国军队总部之间有3个顽固的目标。这就是你的突击组的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me over to the situation map and I'll bring you up to speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，看看当前的局势图，我会详细讲解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002227_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldier, you're fixing to have a size 10 combat boot shoved up your candy ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵，你的大屁股真是欠踢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chaseapol_0000221e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your attitude's just earned you a demerit. I don't want to hear that kind of talk out of you again. Is that crystal clear enough now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才的态度显示了你的低素质。我不想再听到你那样说话。听明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chaseapol_0000221e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all a bit strung out from the last Commie bombing run on our Field H.Q.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中共上次轰炸我们的战地指挥部后，我们还没喘过气来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chaseapol_00002220_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chaseapol_00002220_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官，我完全理解了，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At ease, soldier. We're all a bit strung out from the last Commie bombing run on our Field H.Q.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍息，士兵。中共上次轰炸我们的战地指挥部后，我们还没喘过气来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chaseapol_0000221d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chaseapol_0000221d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They knew the drill when they signed up, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们入伍时就做好准备了，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Commie sons-of-bitches. It'll be a cold day in hell before I let them cross Canada into the mainland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗娘养的中共。他们想跨过加拿大进入美国本土，得先过我这一关才行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_0000221f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But enough of that. I called you down here for a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说这个了。我叫你来这儿是有原因的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_0000221f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've earned yourself a field promotion, soldier. From this moment on, you're in charge of Patterson's Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你赢得了一次火线晋升，士兵。从此刻起，你就是帕特森突击组的队长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_0000221f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Red bastards... can't wait to push them all the way back to Beijing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的杂种红军…我等不及要把他们赶回北京去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002221_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I didn't call you down here for a pep talk and cigars. You've earned yourself a field promotion, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫你来不是给你鼓气或者让你抽烟的。你赢得了一次火线晋升，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002221_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From this moment on, you're in charge of Patterson's Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从此刻起，你就是帕特森突击组的队长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002221_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can do to assist, sir?
I didn't call you down here for a pep talk and cigars. You've earned yourself a field promotion, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫你来不是给你鼓气或者让你抽烟的。你赢得了一次火线晋升，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002224_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As of this moment you're taking over Patterson's Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从此刻起，你就是帕特森突击组的队长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002224_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And before you thank me, you better wait and see what your mission entails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好先等等，看完任务详情再来谢我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002224_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah... make with the next objective so I can finish the simulation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，是啊…快进行下一步吧，好让我能完成模拟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is no simulation, soldier! That's real blood you see out there on the snow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是模拟，士兵！你在雪地上看到的可是真正的鲜血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002226_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got enough to worry about without some hotshot like you breaking protocol. Now get it together... you have a job to do. Am I clear, soldier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经够烦的了，而你这蠢货还在破坏规矩。打起精神来…你有活干了。明白了吗，士兵？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002226_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We sure sent those Red Chinese packing!
Now hold on there, soldier. You see these fancy little gold stars on my uniform?
ESP.TRADUIT: 打住，士兵。你看到我制服上这些精致的金色五角星了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002228_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent a lot of time getting them, and I'll be damned if some punk like you isn't going to address me properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了很久才赢得它们，如果有像你这样的废物连跟我讲话都态度不端，我会很生气的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002228_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I appreciate your enthusiasm in this operation, there's still protocol to be maintained. Are we clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我欣赏你在本次行动中的激情，但规矩还是要遵守的。听明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002228_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to thank me. I know a genuine true-blooded soldier when I see one... and that's why I sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用谢我。如果有哪个士兵是个真正的热血青年，我一眼就能看出来…那正是我派你去的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002223_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately while you were up there climbing mountains, we were down here getting our butts kicked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，当你在上面爬山的时候，我们在下面被打得屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002223_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chinese decided to use our Field H.Q. for target practice and damn near blew us all to pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队将我们的战地指挥部作为练习目标，差点把我们都轰成碎片了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002223_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002223_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately while you were up there climbing mountains, we were down here getting our butts kicked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，当你在上面爬山的时候，我们在下面被打得屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002222_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chinese decided to use our Field H.Q. for target practice and damn near blew us all to pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队将我们的战地指挥部作为练习目标，差点把我们都轰成碎片了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002222_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost some good men including my Strike Team Commander, Colonel Patterson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们损失了一些优秀的士兵，包括我的突击组指挥官帕特森上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa3chasestar_00002222_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some more information about my objectives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些关于我的任务的更多信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, what did you need to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你想知道什么事情？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002494_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to discuss my Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要讨论一下我的突击组。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, that's what I'm here for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这正是我在此的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_00002499_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I didn't sign up for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我不是受雇来干这个的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of us did. We all just end up doing what we're supposed to do and hopefully make the enemy die in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都不是。我但我们终究还是要做该做的事，以期望能干掉敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_000022cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm here to give you a hand with Intelligence and Logistics. Whatever you need, I'm your guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我是来帮你负责情报和后勤的。有需要的话找我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_000022cf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suicide Squad? Why do they call it that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自杀小队？他们为什么这么称呼自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I really have to answer that? You aren't going after civilian targets you know... this is the big leagues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的要回答那个问题吗？你要知道，你攻击的可不是平民目标…这是场硬仗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_000022cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm here to give you a hand with Intelligence and Logistics. Whatever you need, I'm your guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我是来帮你负责情报和后勤的。有需要的话找我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_000022cc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, all I got to keep me warm out here in this freezebox is my sense of humor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，唯一能让我在这寒冷的鬼地方里取暖的只有我的幽默感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_000022ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I'm here to give you a hand with Intelligence and Logistics. Whatever you need, I'm your guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我是来帮你负责情报和后勤的。有需要的话找我就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_000022ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not looking for trouble. I'm just here because of the radio signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来找麻烦的，我是因为电台信号才在这儿的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard our signal? How'd you manage that? It's not broadcast on a standard frequency...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你收听到我们的信号？怎么做到的？我们又没有在标准频率上广播…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...oh, I see. You've got one of those wrist-mounted computers. Well, well. Isn't that interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: …哦，我明白了。你有那种戴在手腕上的电脑。好啦，好啦。很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell did you hear my signal? It's not broadcast on a standard frequency...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么收听到我的信号的？我们又没有在标准频率上广播…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...oh, I see. You've got one of those wrist-mounted computers. Well, well. Isn't that interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: …哦，我明白了。你有那种戴在手腕上的电脑。好啦，好啦。很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026b0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard your radio signal, and thought I'd come and lend a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到了你们的电台信号，觉得我该来帮下忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I had to kill a few of your guys to get a suit that looked good on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我非得杀掉一些你的人来弄一件衣服，这衣服我穿上看起来很不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You filthy fucking wastelander... You're dead, you hear me? Dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这肮脏的垃圾废土游民…你死定了，听见了没有？死定了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you some kind of idiot? Listen, little girl... hey, wait a second. What's that on your wrist there? Some kind of computer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是白痴吗？听着，小姑娘…喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just looking for my dad.
Are you some kind of idiot? Listen, kid... hey, wait a second. What's that on your wrist there? Some kind of computer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是白痴吗？听着，小伙子…喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just looking for my dad.
I suggest you turn right around before you find yourself full of holes. We've taken over this sector, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你在被打成马蜂窝之前立即向后转。这里是我们的地盘，还有…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hang on. Is that some kind of computer on your wrist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下。你手腕上那个是某种电脑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026ab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just stopped in to ransack the place. Didn't expect to find anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是顺便打一下劫。没想到会找到什么人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, this armor? I found it. Honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这装甲？我找到的它。老实说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. Well, now that you've been nice enough to return it to us...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵。你人还不错啊，居然能把它还给我们…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hey, what's that on your wrist? That's some kind of computer, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: …喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026ad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, isn't that nice of you. Looks like things have calmed down now, so why don't you just run along...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你真是太好了。看起来事情平息了，你为什么不离开呢…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hey, what's that on your wrist? That's some kind of computer, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: …喂，你手腕上那个是什么？是不是某种电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillhelpe_000026ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I just wandered in here, and it looked like you guys needed help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我只是在这儿闲逛，看上去你的兄弟需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morrill calling in... Yeah, we took care of 'em. Listen, I'm sending down a local. You'll want to talk to this one. Yeah, exactly. Morrill out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是莫里尔…嗯，我们搞定了。听着，我派一个本地人过去。你会想和这一位谈谈的。嗯，你会的。莫里尔通话完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillcalli_00002eec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the latest on the Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我脉冲场的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The problem out there isn't the Field itself... I mean, you wouldn't be foolish enough to drag robots out there with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的问题不是战场本身…我的意思是，你不会笨到带着机器人一起上战场吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel03_00002496_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The place is crawling with their stealth units... the Crimson Dragoons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里遍布他们的隐形部队…“赤龙骑兵”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel03_00002496_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you spot something out of the corner of your eye, shoot first and ask questions later or it's the last thing you'll ever see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你眼角余光看到有东西，先开枪再说，否则你就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel03_00002496_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the latest on the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我监听站的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this place is a honey pot, lemme tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那可是个带劲的地方，我告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel02_0000249d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not only is it swarming with regular ground troops, but they've put their best guys in there as well, the Crimson Dragoons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不仅充斥着常规地面部队，还有他们的菁英部队—赤龙骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel02_0000249d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear those guys start training as soldiers right from the womb, so watch yourself in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说那些人打从胚胎起就开始被训练成战士。所以你要小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel02_0000249d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the latest on the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我奇美拉维修站的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got two fuel tanks to destroy. One in the central courtyard of the facility and one near the rear gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去摧毁两个燃料罐。一个在设施的中央庭院，另一个在后门附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel01_0000248a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is one tough nut to crack. Not only do you have the Chimeras to contend with, but the place is heavily populated by infantry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要拿下那地方很棘手。不仅要对付奇美拉坦克，还要对付大批步兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel01_0000248a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for your latest intel reports.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道你所掌握的最新情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my specialty. What target did you need a report on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我的专长。你想知道哪个目标的详情？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlintel_00002491_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some new gear. Can you set me up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要些新的装备。 你能帮助我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, that's all Uncle Sam is going to issue ya. Maybe you could find some more stuff out there in the field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，山姆大叔只能给你这么多了。也许你可以在战场上找到更多的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlquarter_0000249e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can do. Just use the Requisition Terminal here in the Command Tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以。使用司令部帐篷里的装备申请终端就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : semi-sarcastic EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlquarter_0000c6f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick whatever loadout you need and the terminal will dispense a Requisition Tape. Bring it to the Quartermaster Officer and you're all set.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便挑你需要的装备，电脑会给出一份申请表。带着它去找军需官就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : semi-sarcastic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlquarter_0000c6f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The government sure loves its paperwork, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 政府就是爱搞书面活儿，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : semi-sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlquarter_0000c6f8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I lose a Strike Team member?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的突击组队员死了怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can always speak to your Strike Team squad leader and requisition a new unit if you've lost one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你损失了一个部下，可以随时和你的突击组队长说话，申请一位新的队员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_0000249b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't I just take a whole bunch of guys with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能带上一大帮人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way. The bigger your Strike Team, the bigger your footprint on all of the Chinese sensing devices. You need to think small.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行。突击组规模越大，就越容易被中国军队的仪器探测到行踪。你得往小处想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_00002497_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Recruitment Markers I gave you will recommend what size you keep your team in order to maintain the smallest footprint possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你的征兵许可会对你的小组如何保持适当的规模来降低被发现的可能性提出建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_00002497_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So to put it simply, you pick a big clunky robot, and you won't have much room left in the team for many other units. You decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单地说吧，你挑了一个又大又笨重的机器人，队里就没有太多位置留给其他队员了。你自己选吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_00002497_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I put together my Strike Team?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该怎么组织突击组？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Sam's made it really easy for you. All you have to do is use Patterson's Terminal here in the Command Tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆大叔为你考虑周详。你要做的只是使用司令部帐篷里的帕特森的终端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_0000248d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the Recruitment Markers I gave you and choose your team members any way you see fit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用我给你的征兵许可，挑选你满意的小队成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_0000248d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then head outside to the Barracks and your units will be ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后到外面的兵营去，你的部队就会准备好出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tlstriket_0000248d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you about another target.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002493_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup. If you take down the Pulse Field, we'll send the T-51b shock troops in to blast through their defenses, and then it's on to the Headquarters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。如果你除掉脉冲场，我们就会派出T-51b突击部队突破他们的防线，接着进攻他们的总部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000249f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How am I going to destroy the Pulse Field?
There's a bunker the Chinese have set up to monitor the area somewhere beyond the emitters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队在发射器那一边某处建了一个地堡来监视这一地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000249a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An operator in the bunker can deactivate the field to allow their own guys to pass through unharmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地堡里的操作员可以关掉脉冲场，以使友军安全通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000249a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can get to the bunker, you could set the field to overload and blow it out permanently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能到达地堡，就能使脉冲场过载，永远地摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000249a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does the Pulse Field do?
Well, it generates a grid-based, localized electromagnetic pulse. Anything mechanical that goes through there gets all its circuits fried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它产生一种基于电网的局部电磁脉冲。任何机械物体穿过就会烧坏所有电路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing that can punch through their defenses there are the T-51b's, so you can see the problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能突破他们防线的只有T-51b部队，所以你了解问题所在了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the urgency in securing this facility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要如此紧迫地肃清该设施？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well the Chinese Army not only uses the Listening Post to spot our forces and relay battle information, they also use it for air traffic control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队不仅使用监听站来监听我军、转达战场情报，还用它来为空军导航。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can get a hold of that facility, we can stop them from bombing the living hell out of us any chance they get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能拿下那个设施，我们就能阻止他们继续轰炸这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I expect to find inside the post?
The Chinese have a team of commandos they call their Crimson Dragoons. They're pretty much the best soldiers they've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队里有一队特种部队，被称为“赤龙骑兵”，是他们军中最强的战士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000249c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Listening Post is filled with those units. I'd be extra careful in there if I were you -- they aren't about to give that place up lightly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个监听站里全是那种部队。如果我是你，我会格外小心 — 他们可不会轻易就范。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000249c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How exactly do I "secure" the Listening Post?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切来说，如何才算“肃清”监听站？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basically, you need to clear it of all personnel and make it safe for occupation by our troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上，你必须剿清所有敌方人员，保证我们的部队安全占领。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a little bit of a rat hunt though, since you'll have to poke around inside the facility and root them out one-by-one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过会有点像抓老鼠，你得在设施里四处搜寻，将他们逐个铲除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the point of taking out the Chimera Depot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁奇美拉维修站有什么用？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't know about you, but if I was running across the main battlefield I'd like a few less of those monstrosities shooting at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你怎么认为，但如果我在战场上的话，可不想被那些怪物开炮打到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002492_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take out the Depot and they have nowhere to rearm and refuel their armor. Otherwise, they'll blast your team to bits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁兵站，他们就无处补给弹药和燃料。否则，他们会把你的小组撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002492_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I take out the Fuel Tanks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要怎么摧毁这些燃料罐？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the Explosive Charges I gave you and locate both of the fuel tanks. Just stick 'em on and boom. Couldn't be easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带上我给你的炸药，找到那两个燃料罐。只要把它们贴上去就可以引爆。再简单不过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002498_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't stand too close to admire your handiwork, though. The fireball will likely take your head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是我，就不会站得太近来欣赏你的手艺。火球会把你的头轰掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002498_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 奇美拉坦克究竟是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put simply, it's a co-opted mining rig that's been changed into an armored vehicle -- bigger and tougher than any tank we have in our arsenal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单的说，它是从原用于采矿的设备改装而来的武装军用车 — 比我们兵工厂里的任何一种坦克更大更坚固。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002488_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Chinese fitted the vehicle with multiple weapons, reinforced the armor and outfitted them for long range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队在车上装了多种武器，增强了装甲，加大了作战范围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002488_2.ogg

NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002489_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you need to know?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_0000248e_1.ogg

NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002490_1.ogg

NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3tltargets_00002495_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who cares about my Pip-Boy? I'm here to find out what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁还在乎我的哔哔小子啊？我在这儿是为了查明发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. I'm sure Protector McGraw will be happy to tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好。我敢肯定护卫麦格劳会很高兴与你说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillpipbo_000026fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you go on inside? I'll let him know you're coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不进去？我会告诉他你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillpipbo_000026fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's mine, and before you ask, no you can't have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这是我的，而且在你问之前我就可以告诉你，不，我不会给你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down there, kid. I'm not asking for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先别忙，孩子。我没要求你那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillpipbo_000026ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think, though, that you wanna talk to Protector McGraw. Head on inside; I'll let him know you're coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想你要和护卫麦格劳谈谈。进去；我会告诉他你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillpipbo_000026ac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This? It's my Pip-Boy 3000. Want to see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的哔哔小子3000。想看一下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't that fancy. Listen kid, maybe you could help us out. We've been looking for someone like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太奇怪了。听着，孩子，也许你能帮助我们。我们一直在找像你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillpipbo_000026a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you head inside and talk to Protector McGraw? I'll radio ahead and let him know you're coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为何不进去和护卫麦格劳谈谈？我会通知他你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillpipbo_000026a7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed your buddies at Fort Independence. Now it's your turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了你在独立堡的兄弟们。现在轮到你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You arrogant little shit. Outcasssttssss! We've got a hostile!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这自大的小混蛋。放逐者！这里有敌人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've dealt with your group before. Fort Independence, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之前已经处理了你的小组。独立堡，是不？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that is our main base of operations in the area. If Casdin is willing to trust you, then I hope we can work together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，那就是我们在本区行动的主基地。如果卡斯丁能够信任你，那我希望我们可以一起工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be happy to help, provided there's something in it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会很乐意帮忙，前提是我能得到些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not wrong. So for now I'll overlook the fact that you've got some of our tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。到目前为止我才注意到你拥有我们某些科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000be29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can assist us, it'll be worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肯帮助我们，我们会报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000be29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guilty as charged. But it looks like you need help just the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪如其判。但看上去你同样需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF you can help, then I suspect it will definitely be worth your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肯帮忙，我们一定会报答你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_00002d87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, who wouldn't want to help out the surly guys in scary armor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，谁不乐意帮助那些穿着吓人装甲的粗暴家伙们解决问题呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That device on your wrist. That's not our tech. That, and the fact that none of us would be stupid enough to take our armor off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上戴的那个设备。那不是我们的科技产物。我们还不会笨到把我们的护甲脱下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the part where I'd have you killed. At least, under normal circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我本可以杀了你的。至少在一般的情况下会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, it turns out you might be useful to us. If you can help, I'll forget that you should be dead for wearing that armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，看来你可能对我们有用。如果你肯帮忙，我可以原谅你胆敢穿着那护甲的死罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That device on your wrist. That's not our tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上戴的那个设备。那不是我们的科技产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the part where I'd have you killed. At least, under normal circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我本可以杀了你的。至少在一般的情况下会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, it turns out you might be useful to us. If you can help, I'll forget that you should be dead for wearing that armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，看来你可能对我们有用。如果你肯帮忙，我可以原谅你穿着那护甲的死罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. I get it. I'm not trying to intimidate you here. I just need your help, and we can both come out of this better off than we are now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。我懂了。我不会胁迫你的。我只是需要你的帮助，有事好商量嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_00002d85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That computer on your wrist there. I need that, and I need you to use it. Okay? That's it. No one's going to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上那个电脑。我需要它，而且我需要你来使用它。好吗？就这样。没人会伤害你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_00002d85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we're talking "helpful" useful, and not "tasty" useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们的谈话有助益的价值，不是有好吃的价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not an idiot. That computer you've got on your wrist there? That's not our tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是白痴。你手腕上戴的那个电脑？那不是我们的科技产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how about you tell me what you're really doing here before I have you killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我叫人杀了你之前，告诉我你到底来这里做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_0000a7a2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, of course I'm one of you... uhh, sir. <Lie>
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，我当然是你们中的一员……呃，长官。<撒谎>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do we look like cannibals? Are you really that dense?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们看起来像是食人者吗？你不会这么笨吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_00002d83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That computer on your wrist is what I'm talking about. I need that computer -- and the person attached to it -- to access the technology here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是你手腕上戴的那个电脑。我需要那个电脑 — 还有戴着它的人 — 来访问这里的科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_00002d83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must have something you want, so let's cut to the chase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这儿肯定有些你需要的，那我们就开门见山吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, all right. You're obviously sharper than the average rubble dweller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，好吧。很明显，你看起来要比那些一般的平民要聪明得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That computer you've got on your wrist is a specialized piece of equipment. I need someone who knows how to use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手腕上那个电脑是种专门的设备。我需要懂得使用它的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026fc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can be that someone, I'm willing to work with you to make your life easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肯帮忙，我很乐意和你一起工作，让你的人生更美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026fc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, my Pip-Boy makes me unique, and you need my help because of that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我的哔哔小子使我很特别，为此你需要我的帮助……

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you do have half a brain. That's good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么看来你还有点脑子。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep it simple. I need you, and I need that computer of yours. You help me out, and I'll do what I can to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我长话短说。我需要你，还需要你那个电脑。你帮助我，我就会尽我所能帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't an offer the Outcasts extend to anyone, so you really should think carefully about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般情况下放逐者不会提供这样的机会，所以你要好好考虑一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawgre_000026f8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to kill you SO MUCH.
I'll see your blood on my blade before today is done!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天，我就要让你血溅当场！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malechinese1\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4generalgr_00002978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC02GeneralJingweiRef.SetFactionRank DLC02GeneralEndBattleFaction 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerEndBattleFaction 0 setAV variable09 2 EVP
It's over, Jingwei. Surrender and lay down your arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了，精卫。 投降并放下你的武器。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malechinese1\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4generalgr_00002977_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC02GeneralJingweiRef.SetFactionRank DLC02GeneralEndBattleFaction 0 player.setfactionrank DLC02PlayerEndBattleFaction 0 setAV variable09 2 EVP
You've already lost, General. Don't throw away your dignity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经输了，将军。 别再丢掉尊严。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will never take me prisoner!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Jingwei [070018D2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malechinese1\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4generalgr_00002976_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC02GeneralJingweiREF.PlayIdle LooseDLCAnchChineseGeneralSuicide Set DLC02GeneralJingweiREF.DeathAnim to 1 setAV Variable09 5 enableplayercontrols disablePlayerControls
Maybe I should just be going.
You realize I could force you to stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我可以强迫你留下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawbac_00002d86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to do that. I hope you take that gesture as it's intended -- to show that I really do want your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会那么做的。我希望你认为那个手势是有意的 — 表示我确实需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawbac_00002d86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what do you want me to do?
Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示，在这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's VR simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_00002d84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, we don't have one. You do, right there on your wrist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们没有这样的人。而你有，就在你手腕上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_00002d84_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. You'll get a share of the gear, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。当然，你可以分一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想和你再说下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do us both a favor and walk away, and forget this conversation ever took place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行行好，走开吧，当我们从没讲过话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get away from me, moron. And pray I don't report you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，蠢货。还有，祈祷我不会告发你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh! No more. Just... no more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still here? Cause some of us have orders to follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在这里？那是因为我们有些人收到命令要跟着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc4_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Treason. That's the word, soldier. Think about it while you're getting the hell away from me. Now shoo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是叛国。听清楚了吗，士兵。当你离开我的时候好好想一下。现在给我滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough! Okay? You go down, I ain't letting you drag me down with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！好吧？你自己下去，我才不跟你一起去呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back off, troop, or I WILL report your sorry ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后，士兵们，否则我会让你们吃不了兜着走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk5_00002dc8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I know... It's just...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002dda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, get off your high horse! You see what's happening around here. We've been falling apart since we left the Citadel. I'm sick of it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，收起你的傲慢吧！你看到这里发生什么事了。自从我们离开大本营就四分五裂了。我受不了了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002ddb_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002ddc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you know I'm right! I overheard what you said yesterday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是的，你知道我是对的！昨天我无意中听到你说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002ddd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. But I just thought... You know...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢. 我只是以为…你知道的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002dde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, wait! What I MEANT to say, was that, um...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，等一下！我想说的是…嗯…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002ddf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, like you're the model of well adjustment. I see the way you eye McGraw. You'd cut and run if the opportunity presented itself. Admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，好像你是楷模似的。我看过你盯着麦格劳的眼神。一有机会你就会溜之大吉的。承认吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002de0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you'd understand. You of all people. I guess I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你会明白的。你们所有人都会明白。现在看来我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk4_00002de1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You cannot be serious. Just... stop talking. You're going to get us both killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是在开玩笑吧。别…别再说了。你会害死我们俩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you lost your mind? If the Protector hears you talking like that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了吗？如果护卫听到你这么说…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Troop, you are having a serious malfunction... Would you listen to yourself? That's treason!
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵们，你们犯了严重的错误…你会听从自己吗？那是叛国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? What are you TALKING about? Look, would you just... just get back to your assignment. I'm not listening to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？你在说什么？你可不可以…回到你的岗位上去？我不想再听这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where this is coming from soldier, but I've heard enough. Button it, or I'll report you myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这是哪里来的，士兵，但我听够了。别再说了，否则我就去举报你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! No, no, no no. You want to talk crazy, do it someplace else. I'm keeping my mouth shut and following orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不不不不。你要胡说八道的话就找错地方了。我不和你废话，按照命令办事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not again! You've got to shake this stuff off. Get your head clear. You're an Outcast, now, just like the rest of us. Deal with it already. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，又来了！你必须扔掉这玩意。清醒一点。现在你是一个放逐者，像我们一样。搞定它。明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk3_00002dd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you get the feeling that this is all just a waste of time? I mean, how do we REALLY know that simulation gives access to the tech?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不认为这是在浪费时间吗？我是说，我们怎么会知道通过那模拟程序可以找到那个科技？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just... I don't know, I feel kind of bad about that Gary guy. Not his fault the Pip-Boy didn't work. Did we really need to... you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是…我不知道，我对那个加里有不祥的感觉。PP小子没用并不是他的错。我们是不是真的要…你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we've been dropping like Bloatflies lately. How long can we keep those Frankensteins at bay? One more focused attack, and we're all dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，不久前我们就像辐射蝇一样被丢下了。我们还能挡住那些怪物多久？再受一次强烈袭击，我们都会上西天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... If Casdin were in charge, we would have had the tech and been back at Fort Independence yesterday. Protector McGraw is in over his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要…如果卡斯丁还是主管，我们昨天就能取得科技并回到独立堡了。但是现在是护卫麦格劳说了算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever wonder what they're doing? You know, back at the Citadel? I mean, sure, Lyons went off-mission... but it wasn't a bad life, was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有想过他们在做什么吗？你知道的，他们在五角大本营里做什么？我是说，当然，里昂斯放弃了任务…但那也不错，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is such a wild goose chase. Lost tech? Please. Only thing we're going to find in this tomb is canned peaches and moldy blankets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是大海捞针。战前科技？拜托。在这个墓地里能找到的只有水果罐头和发霉的毯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's say we DO find some really high-grade tech. Seems to me, a group of enterprising grunts could strike off on their own. Go... independent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我们的确找到一些相当高级的科技。在我看来，一个可以让集团自力更生的可能。争取…独立。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just hear me out. I've been thinking?imagine what a group like Talon Company could do with the two of us. Huh? You and me, goin' merc...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说。我一直在想，像鹰爪公司这样的企业会不会需要我们两个？嗯？你和我，去做佣兵…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002de9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well. I, um... Listen, when all this is over, I... I think I might go back. Not to the Citadel! I mean, all the way back. You know, back west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。我，嗯…听着，当这一切结束后，我…我想我会回去。不是去大本营！我的意思是，一直回去。你知道的，回到西岸去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk2_00002dea_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk1_00002dba_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk1_00002dbb_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk1_00002dbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got somethin' to say, say it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk1_00002dbd_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk1_00002dbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, I don't have all day. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，我没这么多时间。怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([07002DF1]DLC02ConvOutcast) Outcast Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convo_outcasttalk1_00002dbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not sitting in that thing unless you're wearing the suit for it. I'm not going to have you fry the circuits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你穿着制服，否则你不能坐在那上面。我可不想你烧掉电路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02olinpodwarni_00002eed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, that's all we're allowed to distribute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我们只能配给这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlnewloa_00002f19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have a complaint, make sure you lodge it in writing using the standard 10-78BGHCF Form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有意见，得用标准的10-78BGHCF表格书面提出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlnewloa_00002f19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah sure. Just get me a new Requisition Form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然。给你一份新的申请表。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlnewloa_00002f1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can only change your gear once, though. We've got limited weapons out here in the sticks. Anything else you'll have to scavenge from the field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你只能更换一次你的装备。我们这里武器有限。要其他东西的话得去战场上捡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlnewloa_00002f1a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help yourself. Anything you need should be in the ammo crates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请自便。你要的东西都在弹药箱里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voices_dlc02sttlammo_00002f1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to change to Heavy Weapons gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成重装强袭装备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来保管你所有的旧装备，给你新的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlquarte_00002f22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to change to Sniper gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成远程狙击装备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来保管你所有的旧装备，给你新的。
