ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好换成火力支援装备了。这是我的装备申请表。

ESP.ORIGINAL: First let's talk about what I get out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先让我们谈谈我能从中得到什么好处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wasters, always thinking of yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这种废土人，总是想着自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_00002f44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, look. I'm in a bind here. I need results from this expedition, and I need them now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是这样的，我现在陷入困境了。我需要这次远征的报告，现在就要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_00002f44_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can help us out, you get a cut of whatever we find locked up in here. You're not going to get a better deal from me than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能帮助我们，无论我们在这里找到什么东西，都会分一份给你。没有比这更好的报酬了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_00002f44_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no time for chit chat, Sergeant.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_00003017_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_00003018_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea how many lives you saved by destroying those guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你摧毁了那些大炮，拯救的生命不计其数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_00003018_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, saluting is the least I can do. Do you have any idea how many of our guys you saved by taking out those guns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，我最起码也该向你敬礼。你知道你摧毁那些大炮，拯救了多少人的性命吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000301a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have the Strike Team hold up right here.
Well, now, remember... We got a lot of damn Chinese to kill. Millions of 'em. You're gonna have to step up your game. Do some real soldierin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，现在，记住…我们要去杀大把中国人，杀他个几百万人。你们的动作要快，拿出当兵的气势来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk3_00003627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't died yet, have I? In fact, I'm startin' to think I'm indestructible. Like some kind of superhero. You can call me... "Supergrunt."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没死，对吧？事实上，我开始认为我是刀枪不入的。就像某种超级英雄一样。你可以称呼我…“超兽人”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk3_00003628_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldier, you just stick with me. We'll be the most highly decorated soldiers in the Army when this thing is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵，你跟着我就行。任务完成之后我们将会被授予军中最高的荣誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk3_00003629_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'll do whatever it takes. You know why? If I don't protect the weak -- you know, people like you -- who will?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂，无论如何我都会做的。知道为什么吗？如果我不保护那些弱者 -- 就像你这样的人 -- 谁会来保护他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk3_0000362a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I do have a sort of "secondary objective" I need to get done. My kid brother back home wants one of them Chinese guns. Things could get ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我确实有项“次要任务”需要完成。我在家乡的小兄弟想要一把中国军队的枪。有点难度吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk3_0000362b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, don't you go actin' the hero on me, all right? You'll hog all the medals, like last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂，你可别给我逞英雄啊，知道吗？你会得到大把勋章的，就像上次那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk2_00003616_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, you just remember you're not a one-man army, and you may live long enough to enjoy the victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好，你只要记住军队不止你一个人，就可以活着享受胜利了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk2_00003617_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's right. You signed up for this crap. Sometimes I forget you actually like killing people. Maybe we can just send you in by yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是啊。你主动请缨啊。有时我都忘了你喜欢杀人了。也许我们可以只派你一个人上前线就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk2_00003618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spoken like a true defender of freedom. Just don't go doin' anything stupid out there, okay? Remember, I'll be standing next to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿出个真正的“自由捍卫者”的样子来。在那边不要做什么傻事，好吗？记住，我会在你身边的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk2_00003619_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to get in there, kill a couple Reds for good measure, and then get my ass back to base camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想上战场，尽量多杀几个红军，然后安全回到营地来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk2_0000361a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is a weapon at my front and you sons o' bitches at my back. I'm ready to get this thing done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要身前有支枪、身后跟着你们这群杂种就行了。我已经准备好战斗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_0000361b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to kill me some Commies, I can tell you that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做好准备杀中共了，只能告诉你这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_0000361c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ever tell you I got an aunt lives in Anchorage? She's in there... somewhere. And God help me, I'm gonna get those Reds out of her backyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有告诉过你我有个姑姑住在安克雷奇吗？她在那里的…某个地方吧。上帝保佑，让我把红军赶出她的家园。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_0000361d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, Anchorage ain't nothin'. You know what all this is? Practice. Next stop, Shanghai. Just you wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，安克雷奇可有重大意义啊。你懂不懂？这是演习。下一站就是上海了。等着瞧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_0000361e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know me. My day ain't complete unless I've killed me some Reds. So let's start the killin' already...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你了解我的。不杀几个红军我是不罢休的。让我们来大开杀戒吧…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_0000361f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm feelin' that "twitch" in my eyebrow. You, know, that one I get when there are Commies around. Gonna be a fun day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的眼皮有点“跳”。刚才一群共匪涌过来，我放倒了一个呢。今天会很好玩的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_00003620_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good's having a weapon if they won't let me use it? Pal, I am ready to flick the safety off and engage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连武器都不让我用的话，我能干什么？伙计，我已经打开保险准备战斗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700362D]DLC02ConvSoldier) Soldier Conversation System EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02convs_soldiertalk1_00003621_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just watch yourself. The Reds up here don't take prisoners. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定要小心。红军是不会留活口的。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2monttalk0_00004365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll still meet at the rendezvous point inside as planned then we'll blow those artillery guns to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们按原计划在里面的预定地点见面，然后我们会炸飞那些火炮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2monttalk0_00004362_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still have your gear, so I'm gonna let you make the call. You can go in quiet or guns blazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你装备还在，所以我会让你选择，是悄悄地潜入，还是大张旗鼓地打进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2monttalk0_00004364_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think their patrols spotted us coming in, so at least we still have the jump on 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们的巡逻队没看到我们来了，所以我们还有机会偷袭他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2monttalk0_00004360_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a hell of a nasty fall you took. When your chute bunched up like that I thought you were a goner. I hope the other guys made it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你落地的动作可真恐怖啊。你的降落伞裹成一团时，我还以为你完蛋了。希望其他人安然无恙…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02oa2monttalk0_00004361_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, sorry. I'm just trying to figure out what's going on here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，对不起。我只是想知道这儿现在什么状况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on is this whole mission is one big rat-fuck. We've been stuck here for way too long with no results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在的状况就是，这整个任务是个天大的笑话。我们陷入了泥潭中，长时间没有进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymor_0000437b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw won't give up, so we've stooped to using chumps like you to try and get something out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳不会放弃的，所以我们才会降低要求使用像你这种傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymor_0000437b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for asking. Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉这么问。忘了我说的话吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleysor_0000437e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got loads of problems, chump. You don't want to become one, so shut up and get in the... the simulator thing there. Move it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有成堆的麻烦，废物。你别再给我添乱了，闭嘴，进那…模拟器去。快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygot_00004386_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么总是充满敌意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we ain't gonna be friends when this is all over, so the less talking we do now the happier I am, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这一切结束后我们是不可能做朋友的，所以我们越少说话，我就越高兴，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleywhy_0000437c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why exactly do you need me?
The simulation needs an external interface device to run correctly. I'm not exactly sure why, the records on that are spotty at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序需要一个外部接口设备来正确运行。我不大清楚这是为什么，关于此事的记录根本含糊不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimwh_00004376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We figured out that your Pip-Boy there will suffice. Since you're kind of attached to it, you go along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们发现你的哔哔小子能满足条件。既然你戴着它，就由你去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimwh_00004376_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be fine... Assuming you can actually get some results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该没事的…假如你真能弄出一些结果的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimwh_00004376_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I suppose if you don't mind us hacking off your forearm, we don't really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你不介意我们把你前臂剁下来，我们才不需要你呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimwh_00004377_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sim is looking for an external interface. I haven't quite figured out why, but there's no way to bypass it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序需要一个外部接口。我没弄明白那是为什么，但也没办法绕开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimwh_00004377_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Pip-Boy there is a match. So since you're the one wearing it, you're the one running through the simulation. Get it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那哔哔小子完全符合。既然你戴着它，就由你去进行模拟程序。懂了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimwh_00004377_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about what you're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我更多关于你在这儿的工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same thing we're always doing: Locating technology, preserving it, and making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是我们一直在做的事情：找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinoutca_0000437f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw thinks there's something of value here. I know not everyone agrees, but based on what I've seen I think he's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳认为这里还有些有用的东西。我知道并不是人人都赞同，但依我所见，我认为他是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're doing our jobs. Locating technology, preserving it, and making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在做本职工作。找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinoutca_0000c4d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone has to safeguard the future of the human race, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总得有人去保护人类的未来，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinoutca_0000c4d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw thinks there's something of value here. I know not everyone agrees, but based on what I've seen I think he's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳认为这里还有些有用的东西。我知道并不是人人都赞同，但依我所见，我认为他是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinoutca_0000c4d1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The same thing we always do. Recover technology and preserve it, making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是我们一直在做的事情：找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinoutca_00004380_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw's hope is that whatever's in here will give us a big advantage. I'm not convinced, but I'm on his side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳希望不论这里有什么，都能让我们受益无穷。我不大相信这个，但我站在他那边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinoutca_00004380_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this simulation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这种模拟，你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you know? This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道？这个程序展示了那个时代最重要的事件之一 — 从中国人手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not up on your history, huh? Back before the world was nuked, the Chinese had invaded Anchorage, Alaska. That really amped things up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没听过这段历史吧？在世界被核武器毁灭之前，中国曾经入侵过阿拉斯加的安克雷奇，让事态急速升温。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004378_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, the Americans went in and liberated the city, but there were heavy losses. This simulation trained soldiers for that engagement!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，美国人出兵解放了城市，但付出了沉重的代价。这个模拟程序就是为那次战斗训练士兵用的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004378_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the technology here is impressive, but something's a bit off. Records suggest even some of the people who built this didn't understand it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，这里的科技令人叹为观止，但有些东西过于玄妙了。据记载，有些建造这东西的人都无法理解它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004378_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Sigh* I find your level of ignorance disgusting... if not unexpected.
ESP.TRADUIT: *叹气* 你的无知让我感到恶心…那也是意料之中的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个程序展示了那个时代最重要的事件之一 — 从中国人手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004379_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, the Americans went in and liberated the city, but there were heavy losses. This simulation trained soldiers for that engagement!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，美国人出兵解放了城市，但付出了沉重的代价。这个模拟程序就是为那次战斗训练士兵用的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004379_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, you must brush up on your history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，你该复习一下历史了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olinsimin_00004379_4.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1outcastst_00004384_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, chump. You're here because McGraw says we need you. You're not here to make small talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，废物。你能待在这儿只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不是让你来谈天的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1outcastst_00004384_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're sure as hell not here to get anything out of me, so quit trying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从我这儿铁定得不到什么的，省省吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1outcastst_00004384_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, look. I'm just trying to get some more information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，听着，我只是想多获取点信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, hurry up then. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你快点。你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_00004375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I get it. You're doing the "tough" routine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了。你在摆“强硬”姿态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Is that some kind of joke?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_0000437d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you're only here because McGraw says we need you. Otherwise we'd have you on security outside, with the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能待在这里只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不然就让你跟其他人一样，到外面站岗去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_0000437d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Is that some kind of joke?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_0000c4d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you're only here because McGraw says we need you. Otherwise you'd be out on your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能待在这里只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不然你压根进不来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_0000c4d2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice attitude. This how you treat everyone that tries to help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好态度。你就这么对待想帮助你的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until you actually do something that helps us out, you're just one more liability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你真能帮上我们，否则你就是个累赘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_00004385_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you're going to help out, then that's great. Just don't get in my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，如果你要帮忙，那很好。不过别来烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_0000437a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, slow down! Can we just talk for a bit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嚯，慢着！我们能谈一会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I... I'm sorry. Things have been tense here lately, and I'm afraid it's getting the better of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我…我很抱歉。最近事态有点紧张，恐怕我有点应付不过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_00004383_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shouldn't be taking it out on you. Did you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不该向你发牢骚的。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingreet_00004383_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Sam's invested a lot of money turning you into a killing machine... time to pay him back. Dismissed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山姆大叔投资了很多钱把你变成杀人机器... 是时候物有所用了。解散。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief11_0000442c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA3.OA3BriefingDone to 1 set DLC02OA3.OA3ChaseDone to 1 EnablePlayerControls DLC02GeneralChaseref.Evp set DLC02ChaseTalk to 0 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC02OA3 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC02OA3 15 1
Lieutenant Morgan will be your eyes and ears for Operation Anchorage, so get everything else you need from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摩根中尉将会是安克雷奇行动的耳目，有需要就去找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief10_0000442a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me warn you now. Unless you have some sort of a death wish, I wouldn't even go near the field until the first two targets are down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告在先：在除掉前两个目标之前，不要靠近战场，除非你活得不耐烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief09_00004432_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to cross it then cause it to overload so we can mop up the place with the T-51b's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须越过它，然后使它超载，我们就可以派T-51b部队去清场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief08_0000442f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the first two targets are down, the last obstacle standing in the way is their damn Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦除掉了前两个目标，最后一道障碍就是他们那该死的脉冲场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief07_0000442d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to clear the place of personnel so we can get our intelligence boys in there to start decoding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须清除那里的敌人，我们的情报人员才能进去开始解码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief06_0000442b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your second target is all the way over here. The Chinese have set up a listening post set into the side of Calliway Ridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的第二个目标则在这里。中国军队在卡拉威山脊 建立了一个监听站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief05_00004433_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you breach the perimeter of the Depot, you need to take out both of the main fuel tanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你攻破了兵站外围，就要摧毁两座主燃料罐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief04_00004435_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first of the three targets we need to handle is their Chimera Depot over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要摧毁三个目标，第一个是他们在这里的奇美拉维修站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief03_0000442e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC02GeneralChaseRef.Playidle LooseDLCAnchBattlemapPointMiddle DLCANCHblmFieldHQRef.Playgroup Backward 1 DLCANCHblmChimeraDepotRef.Playgroup Forward 1
We've set up our new Field H.Q. down here. The area is pretty secure now that the Artillery Guns are gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已在此设立了新的战地指挥部。火炮已除，现在这里很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief02_00004434_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... pay attention, soldier. I'm only going to go through this once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…注意听好，士兵。我只说一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief01_00004430_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Sentry Bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们派个哨兵机器人来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's on its way from the motor pool as we speak, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它正在从车辆的调配场赶来，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004ff4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Mister Gutsy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们派个“勇敢”先生来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Command will send it right out to us, sir.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004ff9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Sniper.

ESP.TRADUIT: 他们很快就会到来，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004ff5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Missile Unit.
Missile Unit on its way, sir.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004ff7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us a Grenadier.
No problem, they should arrive shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，他们很快就会到达。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004ff6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have them send us an Infantryman.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004ff8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radio to base that we need replacements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用电台联络基地，说我们需要补充兵源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can do. What unit should we request?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以。我们需要什么单位？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_0000496b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have the Strike Team head for the Listening Post.
Have the Strike Team head for the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让突击组前往奇美拉维修站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's our current status on the targets?
As soon as we take out the Pulse Field, I'll radio Chase to send in the shock troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我们除掉脉冲场，我会发报给蔡斯，让他派突击部队来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're wearing the T-51b Power Armor. We'll see how well the Reds handle all of us charging into their headquarters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们穿着T-51b动力装甲。看看我们一起冲进红军的总部时，他们有何能耐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004970_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuel tanks at the Chimera Depot need to be destroyed. Then we can move on to deactivating the Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得先摧毁奇美拉维修站的燃料罐，然后就可以前去解除脉冲场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004971_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Listening Post still needs to be secured, and then the Pulse Field needs to be deactivated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍需肃清监听站，然后还要解除脉冲场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they're pretty much untouched. The Listening Post needs to be secured and the fuel tanks at the Chimera Depot need to be destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，他们基本上还完好无损。我们得先肃清监听站，并摧毁奇美拉维修站的燃料罐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, after all that's done, the Pulse Field still needs to be deactivated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，那些搞定后，还得解除脉冲场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00004973_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do this smooth and by the numbers. Follow my lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要迅速解决战斗，跟我来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. What are your orders?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000496f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get the Strike Team moving, Sergeant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让突击组行动起来，中士！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. What are your orders?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_00004976_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, where do we stand with the Strike Team?
Everyone's ready to go kick some Commie ass... sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵们都准备好杀敌了…长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000496c_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000496c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got to take out that goddamned sniper! We're pinned in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得干掉那个该死的狙击手！我们被困在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) pissed at his friend's death (emphasize God Damned) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_dlc02ff006gottodos_00004a4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's up on that ridge. Right over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就在那山坡上。就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07004A4F] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) spotted a sniper and convinced he can take him out before he gets shot EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_dlc02ff006gothim3_00004a4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McKinney! Jesus! You got a death wish?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦金尼！上帝啊！你找死啊？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American Soldier [07004A52] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : (frantic) shocked his buddy is sticking his head out where a sniper can get him EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02ff_dlc02ff006gothim2_00004a4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough. McGraw's in charge, so we follow his orders, no matter how much we don't like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了。麦格劳是头儿，所以我们服从他的命令，就算我们多不愿意都要服从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_00004dc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, man. How long you gonna let McGraw screw us over like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，伙计。你还要让麦格劳像这样搞多久？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_00004dc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, this is the last thing we need...
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这就是我们想要的最后一件东西…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_000056d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McGraw gave orders. It's that simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦格劳下的命令。就这么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_00004dc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea. Stay sharp, but don't open fire without my order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不清楚。保持警惕，但没有我的命令不许开火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_000056e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...all I'm saying is, why can't we just ice the guy and use his computer ourselves?
ESP.TRADUIT: …我所说的是，为何不能把这小伙子冰冻起来，让我们自己来使用他的电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_00004dc4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...all I'm saying is, why can't we just ice the chick and use the computer ourselves?
ESP.TRADUIT: …我所说的是，为何不能把这小姑娘冰冻起来，让我们自己来使用她的电脑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_00004dc5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...like I said, Morrill should be up top. So who the hell's in the elevator?
ESP.TRADUIT: …我说过了，莫里尔应该就在最上面。那么到底是谁在电梯里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE5] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1elevatorc_000056d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're dismissed from the Strike Team, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被逐出突击组了，士兵。

ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了就攻击敌人营地，中士。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymcg_000056d7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，守卫。你可以离开了。

ESP.TRADUIT: 她来了，护卫，如你吩咐的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here he is, Protector. Like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他来了，护卫，如你吩咐的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymcg_000056da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll be all, Defender. Thank you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymcg_000056db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like I said, sorry Sir. Not my fault he ran in here. Listen, I still don't think this is a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我说了，对不起，长官。他跑进来，不是我的错。听着，我还是认为这不是个好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymcg_000056dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like I said, sorry Sir. Not my fault she ran in here. Listen, I still don't think this is a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我说了，对不起，长官。她跑进来，不是我的错。听着，我还是认为这不是个好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were supposed to keep an eye on our guest, Defender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你本应该看着我们的客人的，守卫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir. Here he is, like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官。照你所说的，他来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymcg_000056df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir. Here she is, like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官。照你所说的，她来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleymcg_000056e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through this next structure is the entrance to the Artillery Base. I dunno what they got waiting for us, so keep a sharp watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了这个后，下一个建筑物就是大炮基地的入口。不知道会有什么等着我们，所以都给我加倍留神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000056f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I live just one more day without seeing another catwalk, I'll die a happy man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不用再和这些狭小通道打交道，我就死而无憾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000056f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're crossing that pipe? And here I thought I was the one with the death wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要穿过那个管道？我还以为只有我一个人不怕死呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000056f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyes on, we got company up ahead!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000056f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woah... watch your step near those ledges. That is a HELL of a long fall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇…在那些悬崖附近要小心。在那么高的地方摔下来可不是好玩的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000056f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha! And they all come tumbling down! Yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！他们都在屁滚尿流呢！耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02montboomsay0_000058a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's two. Let's finish the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那有两个。我们来搞定它吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02montboomsay0_000058ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah! Take that you Red bastards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的！尝尝这个，你们这群杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02montboomsay0_000058a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last gun! Blow that thing off the map!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一门大炮！把那玩意炸飞吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger1_000058a5_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger1_000058a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plant that thing and let's go!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger1_000058a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alrighty chief... we got three of those things to take down. You lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，长官…我们要摧毁3个目标。请带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger1_000058a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the Front down there. These guns are pounding on our guys. Let's take 'em out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那下面就是前门了。这些大炮一直在轰炸我们的部队。我们去摧毁它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger1_000058aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah.... so I was wrong. Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯…原来我错了。我们继续走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger1_000058a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Looks like the Commies are getting low on ammo for the big guns. Maybe we didn't even need to come up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。看来中共的大炮没多少弹药了。可能我们都不用来这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000058a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There! See 'em down there? That's their damn Chimera tanks. Don't worry, they're well out of range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那！看到下面了吗？那就是该死的奇美拉坦克。别担心，我们现在并不在射程之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000058a8_1.ogg

NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000058a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the entrance. Place is probably swarming with Reds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是入口。可能到处都是红军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009BF]DLC02OA2) The Guns of Anchorage EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa2_dlc02monttrigger0_000058ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00007202_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scope out the enemy at the Mining Town. Have the team wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去侦察一下矿镇的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Mining Town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻矿镇的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the enemy in the Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击冰雪营地中的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻奇美拉维修站的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_0000741b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack the enemy in the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击奇美拉维修站中的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send Team to Rally Point: Mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 派遣队伍前往集合点：矿井。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Mining Town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在矿镇等你。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00007201_1.ogg

Wait for me just outside the Mining Town on the way to the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在去监听站路上的矿镇外等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done with Ice Camp. Send Team to Rally Point: Chimera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冰雪营地清剿完毕。派遣队伍前往集合点：奇美拉维修站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在奇美拉维修站等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00007413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 4 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 0 setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0
Now that the Ice Camp is out of the way, head up to the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然冰雪营地已经解决，前往奇美拉维修站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done with Mines. Send Team to Rally Point: Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 矿井清剿完毕。派遣队伍前往集合点：监听站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在监听站等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00007414_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 2 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 0 setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0
Now that we've dealt with the Mining Town, head to the Listening Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然矿镇已经解决，前往监听站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send Team to Rally Point: Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 派遣队伍前往集合点：冰雪营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Ice Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在冰雪营地等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([07002D0A]DLC02StrikeTeam) Strike Team Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02strik_dlc02sttlmontgo_00007415_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPoint to 3 set DLC02StrikeTeam.STRallyPointArrived to 0 setStage DLC02StrikeTeam 0
Wait for me outside the Chinese Ice Camp on the way to the Chimera Depot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在前往奇美拉维修站路上的中国军队冰雪营地外等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I done? Is the simulation over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完成了？ 模拟结束了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got an attitude problem, soldier, and this simulation is going to recommend a swift kick in the ass to correct it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的态度有问题，士兵，模拟程序建议我踢爆你的屁股纠正你的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000766e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, you've more than made up for it by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us so I'll overlook your attitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你取得了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划，将功补过，我可以原谅你的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000766e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you've completed the training, it's time to report to your commanding officer for your debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你完成训练了，那就是时候去向你的指挥官报到听取简报了。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000766e_3.ogg

You've got an attitude problem, soldier, and this simulation is going to recommend a swift kick in the ass to correct it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的态度有问题，士兵，模拟程序建议我踢爆你的屁股来纠正你的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000bf6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you've completed the training, it's time to report to your commanding officer for your debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你完成训练了，那就该去向你的指挥官报到听取简报了。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000bf6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: imod DLC02PlayerRezInISFX set DLC02OA4.ChaseDone to 1 set DLC02OA4.MoveTimer to 3 SetStage DLC02OA4 50
What, that's it? I was just starting to have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这就玩了？ 我刚开始觉得有点意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This concludes the simulation, and this portion of your training. But if you're thirsty for more, soldier, your commanding officer can oblige.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟程序以及你的本部分训练均告结束。但如果你想进行更多的训练，你的指挥官会满足你的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've shown that you've got what it takes. There's a possible promotion in your future, if you keep your head on straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你表现得很出色。保持下去，你的前途无限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007671_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've also gone above and beyond the call of duty by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us. Again, well done soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还超常履行了军人的职责，获取了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划。再说一次，做得好，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007671_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work, soldier. When you exit the simulation, report to your superiors for debriefing. Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你训练的这一部分结束了。离开模拟程序后，向你的上级报到听取简报。解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007671_4.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000bf6e_2.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_0000bf6e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: imod DLC02PlayerRezInISFX set DLC02OA4.ChaseDone to 1 set DLC02OA4.MoveTimer to 3 SetStage DLC02OA4 50
With the General's death, our boys can secure this refinery and be on their way to Anchorage proper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将军一死，我们的士兵就能攻占精炼厂，光复安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007670_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've helped pave the way for taking the city back from the Reds, soldier. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为我们从红军手里夺回城市铺平了道路，士兵。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007670_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've also gone above and beyond the call of duty by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us. Again, well done soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还超常履行了军人的职责，获取了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划。再说一次，做得好，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007670_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll complete this portion of your training. Report to your superior for debriefing and your next assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你训练的这一部分结束了。向你的上级报到听取简报，准备下一项任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4chasegree_00007670_4.ogg
