ESP.ORIGINAL: imod DLC02PlayerRezInISFX set DLC02OA4.ChaseDone to 1 set DLC02OA4.MoveTimer to 3 SetStage DLC02OA4 50

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4endtalk_00008cb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are some abandoned mines along the route, so keep your eyes and ears open. It's a great place for an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路线上有一些废弃的矿井，保持高度警惕。那可是伏击的绝佳地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief05a_00009bd4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful on your approach, you're going to have to get through the Enemy Camp on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接近时要小心点，你会经过敌人营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3brief03a_00009bd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: About damn time the reinforcements showed up! Fall in, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 援军来的正是时候！冲啊，士兵们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillforce_00001899_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got multiple hostiles between here and the base camp. We're sweeping the area to secure it. Let's move!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里到敌营之间有很多敌军。我们正在横扫此处消灭敌人。出发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillforce_00001899_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC02OA1 15 DLC02MorrillCage01.disable DLC02MorrillCage02.disable DLC02DefenderMorrillRef.SetAV Aggression 1
You got a death wish, walking through a war zone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就这么横穿战区，不想活了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillforce_0000189a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, local, if you want to be of use, help us clear the mutants between here and our base camp. If not, stay the hell out of our way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，本地人，如果你想发挥点作用，帮我们清除这里和我们营地之间的变种人。否则就给我滚远一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02morrillforce_0000189a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC02OA1 15 DLC02MorrillCage01.disable DLC02MorrillCage02.disable DLC02DefenderMorrillRef.SetAV Aggression 1
Fine, then get out and let me do my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那就走开，让我好干活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleyoli_0000a79e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, whatever. Just make some progress, okay? We're all looking to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，随便吧。弄点进展出来，好吧？我们正等着离开这里呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleyoli_0000b576_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to hell, Sibley. You know that wasn't my fault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去死吧，西布利。你知道那不是我的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleyoli_0000b577_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep. Let's hope you treat this one better than the last guy, huh? Heh heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。希望你对待这个人比对上一个好点，哼？嘿嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleyoli_0000b578_1.ogg

NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleyoli_0000b579_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knock knock, Olin. Got a new best friend for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在吗，奥林。向你介绍一个新的好朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleyoli_0000b57a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The stuff you have is okay, but I need something with more... punch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给的玩意儿都还行，但我需要一些更…带劲的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, you earned a lot of respect with the soldiers for what you did to those Chinese artillery guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，你摧毁了那些中国军队火炮，赢得了很多士兵的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlquarte_0000b4e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... take this extra gear with you, requisitions be damned. If anyone asks, it fell off a truck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧…拿上这个附加装备吧，去他的申请表。如果有人问到，就说是从卡车上掉下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Quartermaster [07002D22] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02voice_dlc02sttlquarte_0000b4e6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Physician's Log, Doctor Adrienn Adami, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska forward base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 内科医生日志，艾德林·奥达米医生，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加前线基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Considering what's at stake, General Chase and I both feel the chem codenamed "Psycho" can be of significant use during this operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到目前的危机，蔡斯将军和我都认为在此次行动中可大规模使用代号为 疯狂药的化学药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b561_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've read the early clinical trials, and there are certainly some possible side effects -- dementia, psychotic aggression. And of course addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之前我读过临床实验报告，当然会有些可能的副作用 -- 导致痴呆或者具有攻击倾向。当然还会上瘾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b561_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the adverse effects do seem limited. Okay, I do realize the chem was developed by Chase's R&D division, but if the thing works it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但反作用看起来确实有限。好吧，我的确意识到这种药物是蔡斯的研发部门开发出来的，但如果它有效的话就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b561_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we really afford to be picky at this point? Some of these groundpounders have family in Anchorage. I'll give them any boost I damn well can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不要在这一点上争论不休好不好？这些人当中在安克雷奇是有家庭的。我会尽最大努力的鼓励他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b561_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope my Hippocratic Oath is still speaking to me when this whole mess is over with...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望当这一切都结束时我的《希波克拉底誓言》还有用…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b561_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly, I'm... I'm okay. Everything's fine. I was found, but not by the Chinese. It was the Captain, he found me. Cap says everything will be okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫利，我科学怪人我没事。一切安好。有人找到我了，但不是中国人，是队长，他找到了我。队长说一切都会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b562_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been a few hours, and I'm tired, but I wanted to let you know I'm all right. I'm in the refinery now, resting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了几个小时了，我有点累，但我想告诉你我很好。我现在正在精炼厂里休息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b562_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cap brought me here. We snuck around the Chinese and made it in. It's the last place they haven't taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是队长把我带到这里的。我们躲过了中国人来到这里。这是他们唯一没有占领的地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b562_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got... I got shot, Molly. In the shoulder. And back. When Cap and I evacuated the mountain. It's not bad. Just a few bullets. Souvenirs, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…中枪了，莫利，肩膀和背上。就在我和队长撤退到山里的时候。不算太糟，就中了几颗子弹而已，还可以当成纪念品呢，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b562_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cap jabbed me with a bunch of meds, so I can't feel much of anything anymore. He patched me up pretty good, too. Still bleedin', but that'll stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 队长给我打了几剂医疗针，现在感觉有点麻木。他还给我包扎得很好。还有点出血，但很快就会止住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b562_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can hear Cap and the others out in the yard, fighting. So much gunfire. They'll kill those Chinese bastards, and then we can all come home...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以听到队长和其他人正在外面的院子里战斗着。枪声很激烈。他们会杀光那些中国杂种，然后我们就都可以回家了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Drugged up and tired. You've been shot several time, and are dying, but don't feel a thing, and have a generally positive (if sleepy) attitude. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeas_0000b562_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Molly... I'm sorry. I am so sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，莫利…对不起。真对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b564_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't do this. I'm so afraid, Molly. I don't want to die. Oh my God, I don't want to die...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我坚持不住了。我很害怕，莫利。我不想死。天哪，我不想死…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b564_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We held them as long as we could, I swear we did. Then Ciello asked for a magazine, and when I turned to give it to him, a shell hit, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们竭尽全力抵挡他们，我发誓我们确实这样做了。那时候切罗向我要一个弹夹，当我要拿给他时，一个炮弹打了过来，然后…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b564_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gone, Molly. He was there one second, and then he wasn't. His blood... and, and... bits of him... Ohh... my God, he's all over me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了，莫利。前一秒钟他还在那里，后一秒他就不在了。他的血…还有，还有他的…断手断脚…哦…我的天，散落在我周围！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b564_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please, please, let them leave, let them leave, let them leave. I just want to come home. I just want to be with you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，求求你，求你了，求你了，让他们走，让他们走，让他们走吧。我只想回家。我只想再回到你身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b564_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hiding now. The Chinese are everywhere. I'm a coward, I'm a coward I know. But I don't care. If they find me, I'm surrendering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在躲了起来。到处都是中国人。我是个胆小鬼，我知道我是个胆小鬼。但我不在乎。如果被他们发现了，我就投降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : This is a taped recording of someone hiding from enemy soldiers. He's whispering, and half crying, and afraid. Very emotional. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b564_6.ogg

NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Captain Zachary Lloyd, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska security detachment!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是扎卡里·劳埃德上尉，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加防卫特遣队！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are approximately two hours into the Chinese assault on this outpost!
ESP.TRADUIT: 中国军队已经连续2个小时不断进攻我们这个前哨了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are being shelled non-stop, indiscriminately! The entire base is under bombardment from the Chinese ships, and they don't care who they hit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们遭到不停的地毯式轰炸！整个基地都遭到来自中国军舰的炮击，而且他们不分敌我胡乱开炮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All accounts indicate they've actually killed more of their own men than ours! They just do not seem to care about their own troops, at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有情报表明他们已经杀了不少自己人，比他们杀我们的人还要多！他们好像完全不在乎自己的士兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At this rate, the entire mountain will be a graveyard in less than an hour, and then the Chinese will just move in and set up shop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 照这样下去，在不到一个小时之内，整座山头就会尸横遍野了，然后中国军队就会冲进来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God help us! God help America!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑我们！上帝保佑美利坚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b563_7.ogg

NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Captain Zachary Lloyd, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska security detachment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是扎卡里·劳埃德中尉，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加防卫特遣队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Approximately 23 minutes ago, Chinese Communist forces set foot on Anchorage soil, despite our soldiers' best efforts to prevent that landing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约23分钟之前，中国军队冲破我们士兵的全力防守，踏上安克雷奇的领土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As expected, the Chinese have launched a two-pronged attack - one aimed at occupying Anchorage proper, and the other at securing this base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我们所料的，中国军队兵分两路发起进攻 - 其中一路目标是攻占安克雷奇本身，另一路则是攻占本基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to our entrenchment, U.S. casualties here on the mountain are currently minimal, but that's not going to last for long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得益于我们坚固的防御工事，目前美军在山上边的伤亡在最小限度内，但坚持不了太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's not going to last for long. Chinese reinforcements appear to be... endless. It's just a matter of time before we're overrun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但坚持不了太长时间。中国军队的援兵看起来好像…源源不绝。我们被击溃只是时间问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll die today, but by God we'll give those Communist sonsabitches a black eye they'll never forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天我们难免一死，但上帝会保佑我们给予杂种中共一次永生难忘的羞辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_7.ogg

NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b566_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly, I hope this tape gets to you, someway, somehow. I don't have a lot of time, but you need to know what happened to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫利，我希望你有机会收到这盒带子。我没什么时间了，但我想让你知道我的经历。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The early reports weren't bullshit. The Chinese are here. As in, they're invading Anchorage, in force. Right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前的报告还算准确。中国军队确实在此。他们正在武力入侵安克雷奇。就是现在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the real deal. It makes Pearl Harbor look like an academy exercise. I've never seen so many goddamned warships.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这回可是来真的。日军偷袭珍珠港事件与它相比，简直是小巫见大巫了。我从没见过这么多的军舰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sergeant Lowry has ordered the platoon to assemble in the mess in fifteen minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳里中士已经下令全排士兵在15分钟内到前线集结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The plan is to dig in on the cliffs, and slow the Chinese advance until the civilian contractors can evacuate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行动计划是在悬崖上挖掘工事，拖慢中国军队的前进速度，以使平民安全撤离。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then... Then we hold the line, for as long as we can. I talked to Durney, Ciello and Dallas, and we all agreed - surrender is not an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后…我们守住防线，守得越久越好。我和德尼、切罗、达拉斯谈过了，一致同意：宁死不降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never told you, but... that night in Cleveland? On the ferris wheel? That was when I fell in love with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没告诉过你，但是…还记得在克利夫兰，弗雷斯大转轮上的那一晚吗？从那一晚开始，我就爱上了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_7.ogg

NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Private First Class Henry Hodges, signing out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一等兵亨利·霍奇斯，留言结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [07004DE6] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapegu_0000b565_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, put me in the chair.
Okay, guess I'll get to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我会着手去做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, good luck. And don't worry -- we'll be right here when you get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，祝你好运。对了，别担心 — 你出来的时候我们仍会在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingoodb_0000b9e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't forget to put the Neural Interface suit on first. We can't hook you up until you're wearing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了先把神经接口服穿上。否则我们没法将你接入系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingoodb_0000b9e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, great. The sooner you're done, the sooner we can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，太棒了。你越快完成，我们就能越早离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingoodb_0000b9e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First you need to put on the Neural Interface suit, and then you can get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要先穿上神经接口服，才能继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1olingoodb_0000b9ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someplace you locals ain't supposed to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们本地人不该来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, ah... Since you're down here, let's go have a chat with the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，啊…既然你下来了，我们去和头儿谈谈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice place you've got here. Mind if I look around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这儿真是个好地方。介意我随便转转吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Matter of fact, I do mind. I mind enough to put a few rounds in you. Get me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我很介意。介意到想让你尝几颗子弹。懂了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and me, we're going to see the boss, so he can decide what to do with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我，我们一起去见头儿，好决定如何处置你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoops, this isn't the Vault. Silly me, must've made a wrong turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呦，这不是避难所。我真傻，一定是转错弯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You a wiseass, or just stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个机灵鬼，还是个白痴？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, stupid, let's go see the boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，白痴，我们去见头儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, sweetie. I'm kind of lost. Can I talk to whomever's in charge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，甜心。我有点迷路了。我能和管事的谈一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, sure. Sure thing, miss. I'll take you to Protector McGraw right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然。当然，小姐。我立即带你去见护卫麦格劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1sibleygre_0000b9fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough! There has to be a way to halt this simulation. A passcode or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！ 肯定有办法来暂停这场模拟战。 一个口令或什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simulation? What the hell are you talking about? This is as real as it gets, G.I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟？你在说什么？这里是现实，大兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And thanks to you, a lot of guys are still vertical. Those artillery guns were pounding the crap out of our soldiers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你，很多人活了下来。之前那些没完没了的火炮打得我们透不过气来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba46_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't even presume to argue with this simulation's A.I. subroutines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不会去跟这个模拟程序的人工智能子程序争论呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Subroutines? This is an Army gig, not the Navy. You sure those artillery guns going off didn't shake something loose up there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 子程序？这是一种陆军导弹，不是海军的。你肯定那些大炮没把什么东西轰下来吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... we all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba45_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just drop the whole thing, okay?
Fine. I guess we have a job to do, so let's get to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我想我们有事做了，出发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose. Let's just get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相是的。我们，快结束这事吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. We WILL get through this. I'll be there every step of the way to give you a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。我们会结束这事的。我会一直在旁边提供帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba41_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你说得对。很抱歉，本杰！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now onto bigger and better things, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有更宏伟的目标了，唉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba44_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These soldiers aren't even real. This is all a sham.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些士兵根本就不是真人，都是些虚拟的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, this place must really be getting to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢，这地方对你打击不小啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... we all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba42_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never asked to be a role model. I just want to get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想过做大家的榜样。 我只是想快点结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, Benji. I'll make officers out of all of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心，Benji。我会把他们都培养成指挥官。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now onto bigger and better things, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有更宏伟的目标了，唉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba3f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You save some, you lose others. Who cares as long as the job gets done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有得必有失，只要能完成任务，谁会在意呢？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lemme take a close look at you. Hmmm. Nope, I don't see any tin plating. You don't look like a robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我仔细瞧瞧你。嗯。没有，我没看到你身上有什么金属零件。你不像是个机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba3d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. You have no idea what kind of a role model you are for these boys. They look up to you now. You need to set an example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托。你不知道你在大伙儿眼中有多么伟大。他们现在很敬仰你。你要以身作则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba3d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All in a day's work, Benji.
All in a day's work he says. Yeah sure... every day I wake up and single-handedly infiltrate a Commie infested base on a suicide mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说这是家常便饭。嗯，当然…每天我起床就孤身潜入中共巢穴，进行自杀式任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a role model like you, our boys are gonna turn into killing machines!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你这样的榜样，我们的士兵会变成杀人机器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess I did kind of save the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想我算是扭转了的局面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh ho! Listen to this guy!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : said in a friendly, needling way EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of a role model do you expect to be for your men with that kind of hot air coming out of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你这番大话，会给自己的同伴树立什么样的榜样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way Comment (NAM2) : said in a friendly, needling way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3montgomer_0000ba43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't have me killed if you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你死了你就不能杀我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try me, reject. Ouutcassttsss! Hostile in base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放马过来，废物。放逐者！基地里有敌人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawexp_0000bf5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm just here to help. I heard your radio broadcast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我只是来这儿帮忙的。我听到了你们的电台信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you're certainly not the help that Morrill had in mind, but from the looks of you, you might be useful in other ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然不是起着莫里尔所想的那种作用，但从你的外表看来，你在其他某些方面有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawexp_0000bf60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just exploring. I didn't mean to intrude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在探索。我不是故意闯入的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Under different circumstances, that wouldn't be nearly enough of an explanation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在不同的情况下，那还不能构成一个解释。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawexp_0000bf5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... I think you can be helpful, and so I'll overlook it for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…我想你是有用的，现在我就可以预见到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawexp_0000bf5d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you tell them that if they want their viable liberation contingency ready in case Operation: Anchorage fails, they need to get off their asses!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你告诉他们如果想在安克雷奇行动失败时准备好可行的方案，他们就得马上动身！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voice_dlc02voicestalk_0000c050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, tell those men they need to be ready. As soon as the Pulse Field is down, we need them cocked, locked and ready to rock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，让那些人准备好。一旦脉冲场关掉后，要他们立即出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voice_dlc02voicestalk_0000c048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, good. Keep monitoring the battlefield and let me know when we've punched through the Pulse Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好。继续监控战场，突破脉冲场立刻告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : General Chase [070009C1] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquegeneralchase\dlc02voice_dlc02voicestalk_0000c046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry sir, they said the technicians are still dragging their heels a bit on the fusion power plant issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官，他们说技术人员还在忙着修理核融发电站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02voice_dlc02voicestalk_0000c045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The T-51b units are at 95 percent readiness level. We've had a bit of trouble adapting them to the cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: T-51b部队已有95%准备就绪了。他们在适应寒冷气候时遇到一点困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02voice_dlc02voicestalk_0000c049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say about 20 percent, sir. But that number significantly decreases if we can get the tin cans in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以说是20%了，长官。如果我们能把动力装甲部队送进去，这个数字会显著降低。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([0700766A]DLC02Voices) DLC02 Voices Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02voice_dlc02voicestalk_0000c047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some equipment in need of repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些需要修理的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'd never consider this, but I probably wouldn't be alive if it weren't for you. I'd say that warrants an exception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般情况下我不会考虑此事，但没有你的帮忙我可能已经死了。所以可以破一下例。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oafin_dlc02olinrepair_0000c077_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's take a look.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oafin_dlc02olinrepair_0000c078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see what I can do.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oafin_dlc02olinrepair_0000c079_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should be able to help.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Specialist Olin [07000E22] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oafin_dlc02olinrepair_0000c07a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right boys, I'm going to make you famous. Get yourselves into a heroic pose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，孩子们，我要让你们扬名天下了。给我摆个英雄的姿势出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_dlc02ff009photosay_0000c176_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02FF.FF009Pose to 2 evp DLC02FF009SoldierARef.evp DLC02FF009SoldierBRef.evp DLC02FF009SoldierCRef.evp
Okay. That's it. Just like that. Hold still.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_dlc02ff009photosay_0000c177_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! The Capital Post thanks you! Who knows, maybe someone will turn this photo into a statue one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！《首都邮报》感谢你们！说不定哪天会有人用这张照片做一座雕像呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_dlc02ff009photosay_0000c178_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you boys try not to die out there, okay? God bless you, and God bless the U.S. of A!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你们这些年轻人可要努力活下来啊，好吗？上帝保佑你们，上帝保佑美利坚合众国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : American War Correspondent [0700C188] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : grizzled war correspondent EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02ff_dlc02ff009photosay_0000c179_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02FF.FF009Pose to 6 evp DLC02FF009SoldierARef.resetai DLC02FF009SoldierBRef.resetai DLC02FF009SoldierCRef.resetai
There we go. Stay safe out there, okay?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor encourage a healed patient to get back into the fight EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_dlc02ff007doctordo_0000c17b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All patched up. Now get back into the fight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 都包扎好了。现在回去战斗吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor encourage a healed patient to get back into the fight EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_dlc02ff007doctordo_0000c17c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're fine now. Just be careful out there, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在好了。小心行动，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Adami [0700B56E] (mod) Quest : ([070034DA]DLC02FF) DLC02FF Comment (NAM2) : doctor encourage a healed patient to get back into the fight EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femalegeneric1\dlc02ff_dlc02ff007doctordo_0000c17d_1.ogg

NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts Comment (NAM2) : Confrontational as in "Yeah, maybe you should." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgoodbye_0000c39e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you guys are almost as fun to kill as the mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你们这些家伙杀起来几乎和变种人一样有趣。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guarddisguis_0000c39f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, hell of a fight. Mind if I head in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，一场苦战。介意我加入吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, of course. Go on through.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guarddisguis_0000c3a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morrill radioed ahead. I'm supposed to meet Protector McGraw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫里尔在前边收发电台信号。我想应该会见到护卫麦格劳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard about you. Behave yourself down there, or you'll have me to answer to on the way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我听说过你。在这下面你放规矩点，否则你出来时我会让你吃不了兜着走。

ESP.TRADUIT: 下去吧，但你的伙伴得留在这上面。

ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我收到命令让你过去。但机器人得留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some nerve bringing Lyons' bitch here. You go down. Alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然敢带里昂斯的婊子来这里，胆子不小啊。你只能一个人下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3b3_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clear to enter, but leave your pet monster here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以进去了，但把你的宠物怪物留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head down, but the sidekick stays topside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下去吧，但把你的同伴留在这上面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I got word to let you by. Can't take the bot with you, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我收到命令让你过去。但机器人得留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got some nerve bringing Lyons' bitch here. You go down. Alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然敢带里昂斯的婊子来这里，胆子不小啊。你只能一个人下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No dogs allowed. Head down, but leave the mutt with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不能进去。你下去，但把狗留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [0700C3C8] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric1\dlc02oa1_dlc02guardgetby_0000c3c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Let me guess, more psychotic little girls...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了。让我猜猜，那些太神经质的小女孩们……

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. It was a pretty significant event in American history, according to our Scribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。根据我们的历史记载，这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're talking front line, heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说的是在战场上，战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA1.McGrawTalked to 1 SetStage DLC02OA1 40 DLC02DefenderSibleyREF.EVP
So it's a computer game. I get it. Sounds like fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是一个电脑游戏。我明白了。听上去很有趣！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it's not. It's a hyper-realistic military training simulation of the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不有趣。那是一种高真实度的军事训练模拟程序，模拟美军从中国军队手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is heavy combat -- safety protocols off. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest. Sim death... real death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了… 你的肉体的心跳也会停止。在模拟程序中死了…等于在现实中也死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA1.McGrawTalked to 1 SetStage DLC02OA1 40 DLC02DefenderSibleyREF.EVP
Don't be so sure. It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. A pretty significant event in American history, I'm told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么肯定。这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。据说这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e2_2.ogg
