ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3e2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA1.McGrawTalked to 1 SetStage DLC02OA1 40 DLC02DefenderSibleyREF.EVP
If you've got a paying job, I'm in. What's the situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有什么能付我钱的工作，我加入。什么情况？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so you're a mercenary. Suddenly everything has become much clearer... All right, I'll get right to the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这么说来你是个佣兵。突然之间所有事情都清楚了…好吧，那我就直说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You guys treat outsiders like shit, but you still beg for help. Typical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些家伙对待外来人像狗屎一样，但你仍然向他们祈求帮助。很有代表性。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apologize for the gruffness of my men, but as you can see, everyone's under quite a bit of... duress. Maybe if I explain our situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的人说话很没礼貌，真是抱歉，但你可以看到，每个人都有点…压力。介意我解释一下状况吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's VR sim program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simulation? Like... a computer simulation? Of what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 模拟？像是…电脑模拟？关于什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. It was a pretty significant event in American history, according to our Scribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是从中共手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。根据我们的历史记载，这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't lie to you. It's heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不骗你。战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3df_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawsim_0000c3df_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC02OA1.McGrawTalked to 1 SetStage DLC02OA1 40 DLC02DefenderSibleyREF.EVP
Spit it out, McGraw. I ain't got all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有话快说，麦格劳。我可没时间陪你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasting your time, am I? You're in MY house, reject. You'd do well to remember that. Now shut up and listen. This could be worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在浪费你的时间吗？你可是在我的地盘里，蠢货。你给我好好记住。现在给我闭嘴，仔细听好。这是很值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有记录显示，在这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1mcgrawhow_0000c3e5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tell General Chase I don't need a Strike Team... I work alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以去告诉蔡斯将军，我不需要什么突击组…我喜欢独立作战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha! Cocky bastard, aren't ya? You planning on taking on the whole Red Army alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！你真是个自大的混蛋。你想自己一个人去消灭一整支红军？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c4a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just stick with Sergeant Montgomery. He'll be your squad commander and he knows all the in's and out's of the team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着蒙哥马利中士。他是你的小队指挥官，对小队了如指掌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c4a0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need anything, like reinforcements or status reports, just speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有需要，比如关于援军或状况报告，找他就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c4a0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what else can I do for you before you hit the field?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，在你上战场之前，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c4a0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you know more about this Strike Team, cause I sure don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你了解这支突击组，因为我完全不了解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about it. Sergeant Montgomery will be your squad commander and he knows all the in's and out's of the team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。蒙哥马利中士是你的小队指挥官，对小队了如指掌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c49e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need anything, like reinforcements or status reports, just speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有需要，比如关于援军或状况报告，找他就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c49e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what else can I do for you before you hit the field?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，在你上战场之前，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c49e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Strike Team... I've never led troops like that before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这突击组…我之前从没领导过这样的队伍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about it. Sergeant Montgomery will be your squad commander and he knows all the in's and out's of the team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。蒙哥马利中士是你的小队指挥官，对小队了如指掌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c49f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need anything, like reinforcements or status reports, just speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有需要，比如关于援军或状况报告，找他就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c49f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what else can I do for you before you hit the field?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，在你上战场之前，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Morgan [070009C3] (mod) Quest : ([070009C0]DLC02OA3) Paving the Way EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric2\dlc02oa3_dlc02oa3morgansta_0000c49f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outcasts, we've got to secure those ruins before we can reach the base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放逐者，我们得先占领那些遗址才能到达基地！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fightinto_0000c4c5_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fightinto_0000c4c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yessir. Heading uphill, wiping out some green.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。向山上一边前进一边清除敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fightinto_0000c4c7_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fightinto_0000c4c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All mutants have been put down. Outcasts, proceed to the base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有变种人都消灭了。放逐者，向基地进发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoba_0000c4cd_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoba_0000c4ce_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoba_0000c4cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the last of them. Moving to base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是最后一个。返回基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoba_0000c4d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point secure. That just leaves these mutants in the ruins. Outcasts, move out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里安全了。把这些变种人的尸体留在遗迹里吧。放逐者，出发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02malegeneric3\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoru_0000c4c9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了。让我们向遗址进攻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoru_0000c4ca_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoru_0000c4cb_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Morrill [07000E26] (mod) Faction : DLC02 Outcast Faction Quest : ([070009BE]DLC02OA1) Aiding the Outcasts EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02femaleuniqueolin\dlc02oa1_dlc02oa1fighttoru_0000c4cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely. You're always welcome to trade with us at any time. We pick up odds and ends from all over the Wasteland, so keep checking back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对是的。任何时候我们都欢迎你和我们做交易。我们在整个废土上收集零碎东西，所以请你经常来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_dlc02mcgrawsell_0000c510_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Certainly. Take a look at what we've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。请随意看看我们的货物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_dlc02mcgrawsell_0000c511_1.ogg

NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c507_1.ogg

NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c508_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're not going to get away with giving up the tech we risked our asses for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们舍命换来的科技却被你这么轻易的就放弃了，这事情不会就这么结束的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c509_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Treason, Sibley? Really? You're not going to get away with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西布利是叛徒？真的？你别想逍遥法外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c50a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir, but it IS my call now. I'm not taking orders from you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，长官，现在由我做主了。我不会再听从你的命令了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c50b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've made it quite clear that it's not your call. A deal's a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说得很清楚，现在你无权决定了。别再说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c50c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, sir. Now IS the time. There's no way in hell I'm letting this... local... walk out with anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，长官。现在是时候了。我决不可能让这个…本地人…就这么离去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c50d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit Sibley, now's not the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，西布利，现在不是时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protector McGraw [07000E23] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemcgraw\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c50e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, McGraw. This has gone on long enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，麦格劳。不能再这样下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Defender Sibley [07000E24] (mod) Quest : ([07002233]DLC02OAFin) DLC02 Post-Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquesibley\dlc02oafin_dlc02finsibleym_0000c50f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...<laughs>You almost sound like a sympathizer - you really feel sorry for the poor saps?
ESP.TRADUIT: …<大笑>你听起来很像是个同情者 - 你真的为那些可怜的家伙感到难过？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_1.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, exactly. They're in for a long haul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，确实。他们会长期加入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_3.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think, but they're not like us. Their boys are drafted and left to rot on whatever shit assignment they're handed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以这么想，但他们不像我们。他们的人接到任务后就没人管了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_5.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no - it's not that at all. I get that the Chinese occupation in Alaska is strictly military, but don't you think they'd settle in a bit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不 - 完全不是那样。我了解到中国军队是军事占领阿拉斯加，但难道你认为他们不会在那里殖民吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c521_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea? We can talk about how many times he made me re-work the way his coat looks in the sim...
ESP.TRADUIT: 咦？我们可以谈谈他不断让我重做他在模拟程式中衣服模样的事…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_1.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but the idea of the Chinese developing something similar isn't out of the question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，但中国开发类似东西也不是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_3.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chimera Tanks? Come on, man, even you have to admit these are sheer fantasy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇美拉坦克？拜托，伙计，即使是你也会承认那些东西完全是虚幻的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_5.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, this is the job. Most of these scenarios will never happen, but if they do, we'll have a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这就是工作。这些设定大部分不可能采用，如果采用了，我们得详细计划一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_7.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear, if Chase comes to us with another ridiculous contingency scenario...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，如果蔡斯又带来其他可笑荒唐的设定…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c522_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and me both. The General gets any more comfortable here and there going to be lot more all-nighters for everybody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我都是。将军在这里过得很舒服嘛 ，每个人都要通宵加班了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_1.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear Chase is having them deliver his personal effects, including an overnight cot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说蔡斯叫他们运送私人物品，包括一张过夜用的帆布小床。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_3.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between us, I think the General's taken a little too much interest in the project. You know how the CO's office is usually a formality?
ESP.TRADUIT: 相对我们，我想将军对计划更有兴趣。 你知道指挥官通常都是很古板的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_5.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...yeah, got to. These bombers Chase requested; we're pushing the system to the brink with all this crap.
ESP.TRADUIT: …嗯，应该是的。蔡斯所要求的轰炸机；我们正用这些烂东西把系统推向崩溃边缘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_7.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see, if I can just re-allocate some of the... yeah, that frees up memory for the bombers, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看，如果我能重新分配一些…嗯，那就可以释放出一些内存给轰炸机，然后…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c51f_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...yeah, I can. Don't know who exactly this simulation is supposed to benefit, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: …嗯，我可以。但不知道究竟是谁会因这个模拟而受益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_1.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, are these guys serious? Why would they bring that kind of hardware with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，这些人搞什么啊？他们为何要带着那种硬件？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_3.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got word from brass at the Pentagon. We're going to need to modify the RoE on the Chinese to match this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 五角大楼的混蛋们传过话来了。我们必须调整中国军队的RoE来和这个相配。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_5.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We just got more field reports from DoD. Hey, Rick. You busy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们刚从国防部那里得到战地报告。嗨, 里克。你有空吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Overheard office chatter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapeof_0000c520_7.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapega_0000c10b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, son, I know Morrill was rough on you. I'm sorry, I really am -
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，孩子，我知道莫里尔对你不好。我很抱歉，真的很抱歉 -
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapega_0000c10b_2.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapega_0000c10b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. You can drop the act, now. I'm not here to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对。你现在别再演戏了。我不是来伤害你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapega_0000c10b_4.ogg

NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapega_0000c10b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <heavy sigh> Look, just remove the PIP-Boy and we can part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: <沉重的叹气> 这样吧，把你的哔哔小子拿下来，我们有话好商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. NPC : Audiotape Voice Gary [0700C339] (mod) NPC : Audiotape Voice 1 [0700C337] (mod) Quest : ([0700B567]DLC02AudioHolotapes) Anchorage Holotape Infos Comment (NAM2) : Use the innocent sounding one from base game with sawing and wet sounds in the background. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02holotapevoice\dlc02audio_dlc02holotapega_0000c10b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? Fuck this. Hand me that saw - and turn off the recorder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，他妈的，把那锯子给我 - 还有把录音机关掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Montgomery to Field H.Q. We are go for the attack! Send in the tin cans! I repeat, we are go for the attack!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蒙哥马利呼叫战地指挥部。我们开始进攻了！派出动力装甲部队！重复，我们开始进攻了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery [070009C2] (mod) Quest : ([070014F6]DLC02OA4) Operation: Anchorage! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\anchorage.esm\dlc02maleuniquemontgomery\dlc02oa4_dlc02oa4montgomer_0000cb95_1.ogg

Report to General Chase for debriefing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向蔡斯将军作任务报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the VSS Armory and take whatever you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入VSS军械库并随意挑选你所需的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Speak to Sergeant Montgomery to command your Strike Team.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)与蒙哥马利中士交谈要求其指挥你的突击组。

ESP.ORIGINAL: U.S. Army Historical Archives: Anchorage, Alaska was invaded by Communist Chinese forces in the winter of 2066.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国军队历史档案：阿拉斯加州安克雷奇在2066年的冬天遭到中国共产势力侵略。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading Anchorage, Alaska simulation. Motion sickness is normal, and will subside momentarily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿拉斯加安克雷奇模拟程序读取中。不适的感觉是正常的，将会很快消失。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading Anchorage, Alaska simulation. Mission: The Liberation of Anchorage Alaska from Communist Chinese forces. Safeties: Disengaged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿拉斯加安克雷奇模拟程序读取中。任务：从中国共产力量手中解放安克雷奇。安全性：未定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Anchorage, soldier! Fight like you mean it, and we'll have you home by Christmas!
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到安克雷奇，士兵！好好作战，我们就能够在圣诞节前送你们回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood Outcasts now control the VSS Facility, and hope to gain access to the advanced technology contained within.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会放逐者现在控制着VSS设施，希望获取其中储存的先进科技。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The VSS Facility, like those operated by many civilian contractors before the nuclear war, was eventually acquired by the U.S. Army and adapted for practical military applications.
ESP.TRADUIT: VSS设施，和许多战前民营承包商运作的设施一样，最终被美国军队征用并转用于军事用途。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've recovered all the hidden intel from Operation:Anchorage. Good work, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经发现了安克雷奇行动中的所有隐藏情报。干的好，士兵！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Explosive Charge has been planted. You can not remove it or stop the timer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸装置已经安装完毕。你不能将它拆下，也不能停止倒计时。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is one of the Chimera Depot Fuel Tanks. Once you plant an Explosive Charge, you have 20 seconds to reach a safe distance before it explodes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是奇美拉维修站的燃料罐之一。安装完爆炸装置后，你只有20秒时间逃到安全距离外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must complete the briefing with Lieutenant Morgan before continuing the simulation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你继续进行模拟战斗之前，你必须向摩根中尉进行任务报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Explosive Charge has been planted. You can not remove it or stop the timer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸装置已安装完毕。你不能将它拆下，也不能停止倒计时。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is one of the massive enemy Artillery Guns. Once you plant an Explosive Charge, you have 20 seconds to reach a safe distance before it explodes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是敌人庞大的火炮之一。安装完爆炸装置后，你只有20秒时间逃到安全距离外。
机器人紧急手动控制器

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must wear a Neural Interface Suit in order to use the simulation pod.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须穿上一件神经接口服才能使用虚拟舱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the terminals to requisition a Strike Team and personal Gear Package before leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在离开前，使用终端来申请作战装备和组建突击组。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A new radio broadcast has been heard across the Capital Wasteland. It sounds like a distress call, but seems meant for certain ears only...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个新的电台开始向整个废土广播。它听起来似乎是个求救信号，但却向某些特定的人求救...

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have found %.0f of %.0f pieces of intelligence. Keep up the good work, soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经找到了%.0f箱秘藏箱。继续努力，士兵！
